reviews.comments: Phòng rất đẹp, đầy đủ tiện nghi vượt ngoài sức tưởng tượng của mình, mình sẽ và chắc chắn sẽ quay lại, đã giới thiệu cho tất cả bạn bè. Chủ nhà rất nhiệt tình hướng dẫn, tất cả các dịch vụ đều đã bao gồm trong phí thuê, không thu thêm, không cần lưu ý thêm gì, rất thuận tiện ra vào, ngay trung tâm nên mình rất ưng ý!!!

This hotel is excellent. Room is exactly like the photos. Everything was very clean, including the bathroom. Robert was very responsive when I messaged him. Also, the bed is super comfortable! I wouldn’t hesitate to stay here again when in Ho Chi Minh City. Thanks Robert!
Rất tốt

If i could give more than 5 stars, i totally would for Cubicity. the place is new and super clean, has an elevator, and the neighborhood’s really chill. it’s in a small alley but still close to the main road. There are tons of restaurants and cafes around too. Not too crowded, just nice and comfy. The staff are super friendly, there’s a free washing machine, and you can hang out on the rooftop. Loved everything about it, plus it’s really affordable. Thanks! I’ll definitely be back when I’m in HCM again.

The accommodation is new and clean, with spacious, comfortable, and convenient rooms. There are plenty of local eateries nearby, offering dishes like banh mi, pho, and rice. It's suitable for both tourists and business travelers.

Great location and it’s the newest building within Cubicity properties.
I stayed for 3 nights and booked again for 4 nights to explore to area during the Unification Day.
The AC in my room broke during my last night staying there but Robert and his team handled it like pros.
Definitely recommend. Can’t wait to book my next stay.
Thank you!!

No hot water
Place is clean.
But so noisy middle of night. The noise from mid night til morning. Sound like lift broken or what. Cannot sleep at all.
주변은 조용하고 근처에 맛있는 음식점이 많아요.
Good, clean, and accessible place.
Perfect
Clean and quiet hotel
推荐！
非常好

Chị chủ nhà đón tiếp rất nhiệt tình và chu đáo. Phòng + toilet sạch sẽ. Có điều phòng hoàn toàn không có cách âm. Phòng kế hoặc bên trên nói gì là nghe như kế bên ồn không ngủ được luôn. Đi lại thôi mà cũng ồn nữa. Với lại mình thấy phòng san sát mà hẹp không biết có an toàn mảng Pccc ko vì toàn là gỗ có sự cố ko biết sẽ thế nào. Cửa rất khó đóng và còn bị hư mình đóng lại r mở không dc may mà chị chủ nhà nhiệt tình hỗ trợ. Giá rẻ vị trí cũng tốt.

The hostel looks exactly as it does in the pictures. The room was clean and comfortable. The bathroom and kitchen were also clean and easy to use. The owner was very proactive in responding to every query, which was really helpful. The location is quiet, and there's plenty of local food nearby. In conclusion, it was worth staying here for me. I stayed for more than five days and had a good experience.

Everything is perfectly fine but just my neighbor make me can’t sleep the whole night and the early morning around 8-9am they do maintenance I can’t sleep again but still fine cuz i like the room and environment there
非常好，适合转机的时候休息一下，离机场近，房间很干净，我凌晨两点抵达，也给我办理入住了，很幸运👍

I stayed here as a solo traveler and had a pleasant experience. The space is very tiny, but it’s clean and thoughtfully arranged—great if you just need a simple place to rest. The staff were incredibly friendly and welcoming, which made a big difference. The door was a bit hard to shut, but not a major issue. For the reasonable price, it’s a solid option for solo travelers looking for a compact and cozy stay.

I am very satisfied with the attentive guidance at this homestay. Before my arrival, I was given clear directions, which made traveling convenient. Upon check-in, I received detailed instructions on how to use the in-room facilities as well as the shared amenities outside the room. This made me feel very comfortable and easily adapt to the space. A wonderful experience!
Vị trí gần các cửa hàng tiện lợi, phòng đúng như mô tả, tiện cho những người du lịch ngắn ngày
Phòng nhỏ nhưng sạch sẽ, rất phù hợp với giá tiền. Ở quận 10 dễ di chuyển đi lại qua các quận khác, anh chủ nhà thân thiện
Very comfortable stay . Had great sleep till late in morning . It's not a proper room though , it's like a private bunk bed space . But still it was amazing . Highly recommended .

I really liked the modern style Japanese hostel rooms. The rooms were simple and small but they were affordable, came with all the essentials and were exactly as described on Air BnB. Rooms were also very clean! It was really nice to have my own space. I wanted to have some time away from socialising at hostels and this was exactly what I needed.
Quang also offered a deal with giving a discount at his wife’s dentist. Coincidentally I had a dental emergency and Quang was very helpful in getting me a last minute appointment. Thank you very much! I will be coming again if I am in HCMC in the future.
Amazing experience! Everything was clean and easy to access. Strongly recommend it! Great location!

The host is highly responsive and promptly addresses any questions or requests. Ms. Na is excellent at managing real-time requests efficiently. The space is clean and well-maintained. If you’re traveling solo, packing light (as the space accommodates a queen-sized mattress and a suitcase), and simply need a comfortable place to rest, this option offers great value for its price range and location. Situated in a prime area, it provides convenient access to food, shopping, and etc.
Phòng ở rất mát mẻ, giá cả hợp lý, lần tới sẽ đặt tiếp hehe
Very good environment, a person's space is not disturbed, nor does it disturb others.
Tôi cảm thấy vui và thoải mái
I was very satisfied with my stay..
impressive service. Highly recommend
Все было отлично. В позднее время встретил, все объяснил показал, заселение прошло отлично, хоть я и улетал на следующее утро 👍🏻
全体的にとても清潔でよかったです。部屋は想像以上に小さいです。シャワーは夜は水しか出ません。
ドミトリーと変わらない。すごく狭くドアロックがチープすぎてない様なもの。荷物置き場もなし
Clean, peaceful, nice room
great place to stay. like capsule hotel.
Great place for a convenient night

J'ai prolongé et je n'ai pas regretté.
Toujours propre, accueillant.
Endroit recommandé

I stayed with Cuong and Mon for 18 days, and they are some of the best hosts I’ve ever met. Our conversations felt just like chatting with friends. The hosts were responsive and very helpful. The place looked exactly as described which easy check-in, clean, and well-equipped with good amenities. Highly recommend for both short and long stays!

Being couple I don’t find it comfortable.
If u want to enjoy your time more in the room , this place is surely not fit for it .
If you have to use the room only for a sleep this place is worth it .
Phòng như hình,bạn chủ nhà siêu thân thiện, nhà hỗ trợ khách hết mức lun… lần tới quay lại Sg nhất định sẽ quay lại đâyy

Even though it was a shared apartment, the place was clean and the room looked exactly like the photos with a great view. They also had recommendations for food stops and attraction sites which we appreciated very much.

Great value for money to stay with! Hosts are welcoming and very friendly! The place is exactly the same as what it indicated in the pictures. They also have a suggestion of activities to try to, very helpful.

Great stay in this private bedroom.  I think I was the only person using the hallway bathroom, which was a nice surprise.  Excellent views of the city as it's in a tall(est?) building in the area.  TY to the hosts for having me.
Anh chị chủ nhà thân thiện, support rất nhiệt tình, có cảm giác như ở nhà
Great place to stay during my trip. Host help me a lot when I arrive early and let me leave luggages there when I fly away late on that day.
Warm, cozy place with amazing view. Squeaky clean and very friendly host. Feels just like home.
Clean and cozy living space. Shared with host, but very tidy and accessible. Able to come in and out at any time with minor rules mostly not interrupting with stay.
房间在一个公寓楼里，透过窗户可以看到城市景观。卫生间是共用的。楼下就是便利店，附近越南饭馆多，生活便利。

Wunderbarer Ausblick über die Stadt für einen guten Preis.
Nette und freundliche Gastgeber.
Die Klimaanlage war nicht zu laut.
Ich konnte mit Grab und zu Fuß gut alles erreichen, was ich sehen wollte.

Nous sommes arrivés plus tôt que prévu au logement et ayant prévenu notre hôte, il nous a directement dit quand le logement était disponible, nos hôtes ont été très accueillant et très gentil. Nous avons séjourné une nuit seulement et nous avions une visite de prévue le lendemain mais ayant des valises qui nous encombrait, notre hôte nous a trouvé une solution pour pouvoir stocker notre bagage en sécurité. Nous avons pu le récupérer en fin de journée alors que le check-out était passé. Encore un grand merci à eux pour l’accueil, je recommande ce logement !

Very responsive hosts, nice view from the room. The room is very well decorated and just like the photo. Even though it says live with hosts but we have a lot of privacy. One small thing is that that sheets and beddings are not very clean with many spots. Good stay regardless!

Coung isna great person, warm and friendly. He was super responsive with all the queries. His place feels homely and is well equipped with all the needs. Made our stay super comfortable and convenient. will definitely come again when I'm in Ho Chi Minh next.
Host was super friendly had great recommendations and I absolutely enjoyed my stay here

Ich habe in dem Zimmer sehr gut geschlafen – das Bett war bequem, das Zimmer ruhig und die Aussicht einfach fantastisch, sowohl tagsüber als auch nachts. Das gesamte Haus hat viel zu bieten: Es gibt ein schön bepflanztes Dach, das man nutzen kann, einen sauberen Pool und insgesamt ist es angenehm ruhig und sogar barrierefrei!
Das Badezimmer war selten belegt und hatte eine sehr gute Dusche – in Vietnam keine Selbstverständlichkeit. Auch das Zimmer selbst war sehr praktisch eingerichtet: Es gibt einen Schreibtisch, genug Ablagefläche und kostenloses Trinkwasser zum Nachfüllen. Ich konnte flexibel ein- und auschecken, was mir sehr geholfen hat.
Der Gastgeber war sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit. Er hat mir interessante Einblicke in sein Business gegeben und mir sogar ausgeholfen, als ich kurzfristig ein Problem mit meiner Bank hatte – dafür bin ich sehr dankbar.
Ein kleiner Verbesserungsvorschlag wäre vielleicht eine zusätzliche kleine Lampe im Zimmer neben dem Bett zu installieren.
Great place with a high view, friendly host that would love to come back soon :)

Cuong & Trang Mong are very kind
and the room is very clean. There are many restaurants and convenient shops around the place.
We felt right at home. The room and bathroom were very clean. The host was friendly, and their recommendations were really helpful.
Had a great time and the hosts are lovely and great, willing to give good tips about local life.

Staying at Cuong’s place was an absolute pleasure! Both Cuong and Trang Mon were incredibly friendly and welcoming, which made our experience even more enjoyable. Their hospitality and warmth really stood out and made us feel right at home. The space itself was comfortable, clean, and perfectly located, but it was their kindness that truly made the difference. We couldn’t have asked for a better hosts, and we’d happily return in the future. Highly recommend!

I feel like a local in his place. The area is silent during night, but you can see the chaos in the street during the day which is so fun when going out with Uber.Local foods are just walking distance from the area. 🇻🇳⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

良かったです。値段が安くて、大家さんと一緒にいるですが、部屋が綺麗で値段が安くて、オススメです。
またベトナムに戻ったら、よろしくお願いします

I was there twice for my staycation. They were always such my best staycation ever when booking here. This cozy room made me recharge and fulfill my energy by the styled design of the room yet their service. Highly recommended for a couple or a date to yoursef on weekend.

A perfect choice for city travel or a staycation right in the heart of town!
The room was spotless, tastefully decorated, and filled with natural light while still staying cool - which kept me energized throughout my stay. The host responded quickly and provided super helpful instructions.
There are tons of charming cafés and local shops around, all within a comfortable walking distance.
And even though it’s right in the center of District 1, the place was incredibly quiet at night. I especially loved the lighting in the room after sunset. It created such a peaceful vibe that I had the most restful sleep.
Would I come back? Absolutely!
Giang rất thân thiện và chủ động hỗ trợ nhận nhà sớm hơn lịch vì bố mẹ tôi đến HCM khá sớm lúc 6 am. Phòng ốc sạch sẽ và bày trí tiện nghi, location rất tuyệt vời.
Phòng óc sạch sẽ. Đầy đủ tiện nghi và host rất thân thiện và trả lời rất nhanh.
Phòng nhỏ nhưng đủ tiện nghi & hoàn toàn thoải mái cho 1 người. Phòng sạch sẽ, y hình. Check in & check out đều dễ & nhanh chóng. Rất hài lòng với thời gian ở đây
Phòng rất sạch sẽ, chỗ ở tiện nghi, nhỏ nhưng đầy đủ tất cả mọi thứ. Lần sau quay lại chắc chắn mình sẽ book tiếp

Had a great time staying at Latibule. Very friendly host and extending my stay was no problem. Also a night guard who is very friendly. Definitely recommend staying here! Thank you for having me guys!

The area is at the heart of District 1. Very accessible. 10 minutes away from every attraction. The place is very quiet and not that chaotic. Check in and check out is very easy! Host is very responsive as well and gave simple instructions. I loved the room also! Very cozy and good for solo travelers.

I had an absolutely amazing time at Latibule Home. I was greeted by your security guard, who was extremely friendly and helpful with everything I needed. The room was as described and absolutely pristine. The value for money at Latibule Home was amazing and the check in and out procedures were very clear and informative. The host was very responsive and helpful to a few queries I had. If you need somewhere to stay, close to the heart of District 1, look no further than Latibule Home. it's right in the name, I felt right at home and welcome the second I stepped in. thank you so much for your hospitality, and the memories I've created in HCMC will stay for decades to come. Please do yourself a favour and book here, you will not regret it! Cảm ơn bạn rất nhiều vì mọi thứ!
My stay at Latibule was great. From check-in to check-out, the instructions were clear and concise. The room was also clean and everything was in order.

Chambre moderne mais minuscule et sans fenêtre. Très propre mais froid et impersonnel, dans un long couloir avec une enfilade de chambres. Points positifs : la propreté et la facilité à échanger avec un hôte qu'on ne voit pas mais qui donne des instructions claires et détaillées.

Hôtes réactifs, personnel attentionné. C'est tout petit, mais difficile de trouver aussi bien pour ce prix.
J'ai apprécié mon séjour
A small room, but it has everything needed for a comfortable stay. Very cozy, clean, and quiet
Thank you so much for having me there. I liked it and would stay again  if i needed. The place was clean and host was very responsive even late at night. Felt safe and secured.

Absolutely loved this apartment! Tiny but it had everything I needed located right in the centre of HCMC. I walked everywhere, but grab is available and so cheap too! I will definitely be back within the next year! Thank you for having me!

This Airbnb was perfect for my (first) solo trip to Vietnam. The room had everything I needed – comfortable bed, strong Wi-Fi, and even a small rooftop. I also enjoyed the bathroom plus the shower! The location was fantastic, with easy access to public transport and tons of nearby restaurants and coffee shops! As a first-time solo traveler, I felt safe and comfortable throughout my stay.
The host was incredibly helpful and responsive! I would definitely stay here again, soon. Thank you, Latibule home! 🤗🤎
There aren’t any windows in the room if that’s a concern for you but other than that the room was nice and clean. Has everything you would need. Super responsive as well.

Chỗ ở tuyệt vời cho du khách đi một mình. Phòng nhỏ, không có cửa sổ nhưng không bí bách mà ấm cúng. Có cả tủ lạnh nhỏ. Mọi tiện nghi đều đầy đủ. Có máy giặt trên sân thượng và chỗ để xe dưới hầm (phải dùng hệ thống cầu nâng). Sạch sẽ, thoải mái. Giao tiếp với host vô cùng dễ dàng và hữu ích.
Small, basic, but very comfortable and good value.
Very responsive and supportive. Will go back later
Great place to stay and everything was super clean
Clear, good location, safe and quiet
A blanket was like a towel. Otherwise, everything is good.
Great location , very helpful host and security guard was very friendly despite the language barrier , would definitely return
The place is simple and provides most of single visitor needs. Host is responsive and fast reponse.

Nice location, room as described; clean and comfortable even if it was small a little bit.
The host responded me immediately 👍 Thanks again 🙏
Bạn host trả lời nhanh và hỗ trợ thông tin nhiệt tình, chỗ ở phù hợp với đi du lịch 1 mình, phòng tắm sạch sẽ, chuẩn bị đầy đủ mọi thứ.
Good place! Very clean and fresh. Would recommend for other.
Nice & conveniet place to stay

i never knew the screen was the thing i needed the most during my stay — netflix after strolling HCMC. the room was also beautiful, it’s very comfortable and affordable for that kind of room. would glady recommend this if you’re in HCMC!

Các home chị Hạnh cho thuê ở đây khá đẹp và giá cũng hợp lý . Chị chủ take care phản hồi nhanh những cái mình cần , phòng ốc giống trong hình , cũng chim ưng , sạch sẽ gọn gàng . Chỉ có máy chiếu ở phòng mình hơi cũ thì đã góp ý chị chủ nâng cấp máy để trải nghiệm tốt hơn, Nhìn chung thì mọi thứ oke á , lần sau mình sẽ quay lại để trải nghiệm phòng khác của chị

Phòng ở sẽ hơi khó tìm 1 chút nhưng chủ nhà có hướng dẫn và nhân viên lầu dưới cũng thân thiện chỉ dẫn lên trên nên ok k ảnh hưởng gì, xung quanh rất nhiều hàng quán, tiện di chuyển đến các nơi cần đi, phòng yên tĩnh, sạch sẽ, chủ nhà phản hồi nhanh, trải nghiệm 2 đêm rất ok ạ!

Phòng đẹp, sạch sẽ, trong trung tâm thành phố, yên tĩnh, đi lại thuận lợi. Chủ nhà cởi mở, luôn sẵn sàng giúp đỡ. Trước đó tôi đã ở đây 2 đêm và vì thích chỗ này tôi đã ở lại thêm 2 đêm nữa. Cám ơn chủ nhà nhiều nhé. Năm tới trở lại Saigon tôi sẽ về lại đây nữa.

The location was excellent—very central and convenient for getting around. The bedroom was cozy and clean, making it a pleasant space to relax in. Hanh was a very responsive host and helpful throughout the stay, which made things much easier. However, the mattress was a bit too firm for my liking, which affected the comfort slightly. Also, just a heads-up for future guests: the entrance to the property is through a clothing store, which was a bit unexpected at first but manageable once you get used to it. Overall, a decent stay with great location value and a helpful host!
had a great stay! The place was clean, comfortable, and exactly as described. Hanh was helpful and responsive, which made everything smooth. I’d definitely recommend it to others
We stayed for two nights. Everything was very clean and pleasant. The design of the room was very cosy and welcoming. Since it was a side alley it was quiet for a big city.

Cool spot! Lovely vibe in the room, A/C, water bottles / tea / instant coffee provided. Walkable location to plenty of stuff in HCMC.
Things to note: You have to walk through a clothing store to get to the room (side door only).
Entire bathroom is a shower; rubber shower shoes are provided. You will spray water all over the toilet seat. It was novel to shower not in a booth/tub.
Bed is firm firm. I liked it personally.
Overall five stars!

Great stay! Very pretty cosy place. It is a little strange having to enter through a shop I must say, but aside from that it was very good. The location is also excellent, walking distance of everything.

She was very helpful and responded almost immediately. Her place was beautifully decorated. The location is perfect and there is lots to do and to explore near by. We felt right at home. Would come back any time.
房间很不错，跟图片上一样，卫生干净房东也很细心引导，就是房间要穿过衣服店才能到，会复杂一点点，其他都很好～

This is a great stay in HCMC- close to Ben Thanh and lots of things to do within walking distance. Very clean and comfortable.
Hanh was a great host- she communicated very well with us and was very attentive to our needs.
The only downsides were that we didn't realise the stay is located within a clothing shop, and that we literally had to walk through a store to get to our place. I feel that could have been communicated better. Also, there were people being extremely loud within the apartment staircase and outside our door during the middle of both our nights which woke us- but hopefully that's a one off.
l'accessibilité n'est pas super génial. avec une grosse valise c'est compliqué de monter des escaliers. un peu petit mais pour une nuit ça fait le job même si le matelas est vraiment trop dur.

Hanh's place was just as presented in the pictures. An affordable place in a very central location. The bathroom could benefit from a curtain to keep the shower from wetting all the space. Thanks for the hospitality!

anytime I travel to Saigon, I have to stay at Hanh's house. I dont think there is anywhere else with great price but you get more than what you pay for. Close to everything. there are many cool eateries around which make my business time here in Saigon so easy

Hanh’s place is conveniently located to access the city and was a comfortable base for us. Although very hard, the bed was actually comfortable once lying down and we had a good nights sleep.
The apartment was smaller than we thought (although not a problem) and there were several ants around the bed. We got rid of the ones we could see and luckily had no further problems. Hanh was a good host and responsive when we couldn’t access the main door when we arrived, providing us with another passcode.

방도 너무 예쁘고 특히 호스트분이 새벽인데도 바로 응답 주시고 너무 친절하고 좋았어요. 금액도 만족했고요.
체크인 하러 가는 방식이 조금 헷갈리긴 한데 상점 안을 통과해서 올라가야 한다는 좀 더 명확한 설명이 있으면 좋을듯^^;
실수로 여자 피팅룸 커튼을 제껴버렸어요..하마터면 변태될뻔 ㅠㅠ

pros -
great location near to many things in district 1
beautiful bohemian designed room
responsive hosts
luggage drop off facility
self checkin digital passkey works properly
cons -
you have to go through a fashion store from the side door
stairs are very narrow and difficult to carry heavy luggage
horrible balcony
for a short stay, the place is perfect. But not goos for a long stay.

Beautiful stay with a cute little standing balcony. It is just as it was shown in the photos and is super close to almost all top spots of the city and walkable to all key landmarks. The room is very cozy and comfortable. Loved the stay.
Homestay thiết kế độc đáo, gần trung tâm rất thuận tiện. Chủ nhà trả lời nhanh.
Chỗ ở sạch sẽ gọn gàng, chủ nhà chu đáo. Phản hồi nhanh chóng

Loved my stay here! The room is so beautiful, it's perfect for a cosy and comfortable rest. The room is above a shop and you have to go upstairs through two curtains that look like dressing rooms to get to the room - quite fun. I had a couple of issues but Hanh was very responsive, helpful and kind, and everything is sorted. Lovely room, lovely hosts!
well furnished, good place. sounds of dogs and birds early in the morning are a bit annoying, which is the only disadvantage.
Can't beat this for the price.  Easy to find.  Host very responsive to any situation that may arise.
Great stay! Beautiful interior with lots of art. Bathroom was boiling hot because it’s sort of like a shed on the roof but it cooled off in the evening.

Wonderful Stay – Highly Recommended!
I had an amazing stay at Doat's apartment! She is incredibly friendly and made the whole experience smooth and welcoming. The apartment itself is absolutely beautiful – very clean, stylish, and thoughtfully designed.
The view from the apartment is stunning and made every morning special. It’s fully equipped with all the amenities you could need, which made it feel just like home. Plus, the location is perfect – very convenient and close to everything.
I truly enjoyed my time here and would definitely love to come back. Highly recommend staying at Doat’s place if you're visiting the area!
Phòng sạch sẽ, đầy đủ tiện nghi, hỗ trợ tốt. Có dịp sẽ quay lại.

Comfortable, clean and total value for money!
The staff and host were very nice people- totally recommended!
Comfy stay

Ben was a very proactive and helpful host. The room was clean, comfortable, and located on the fourth floor. The location was perfect and made our stay very convenient. It is close to the airport, which was a big plus. Highly recommended! Thank you!
Chủ nhà thân thiện, phản hồi cũng nhanh nữa. Lần tới mình sẽ vẫn tiếp tục ở đây lần 3 ạ ⭐️
It was very clean, very easy to find, there were no problems in communication. In total it was a very nice experience, but the walls are very thin so you can hear everything.

It was great stay. Really enjoyed it. Ben is a fantastic host and very commutative

Very good affordable stay in Ho Chi Minh! Ben communicates well and the place was just as described. No complaints! 😊😊

Sincèrement, les photos ne rendent pas suffisamment hommage au magnifique studio que j’ai occupé : la vue depuis la superbe fenêtre est incroyable.

Sécurisé, avec un ascenseur, une facile d’accès pour les Grab (voiture, moto) à proximité de tout.

This is a perfectly located property; most of the city is noisy and crowded, but this is in a quiet very upmarket area that is actually peaceful. The room was lovely, very quiet (difficult to get here!) in a new build complex. The security was outstanding, discreet and yet very attentive and watchful, always ready to smile and open the door - he even leant my friend and iPhone charger! The hosts are amazing, they work as a team and there is always someone available even reaching out to me at 3am after a late booking. Cheap Grab taxis can take you to the most popular parts of the city quite quickly; you'll likely need to use them, but darting around by Grab is the local culture and as you'll be doing that anyway it's better to stay somewhere a bit quiet I think.

Absolutely loved staying here, our host made sure everything was perfect and checked in regularly if we needed anything extra.
Thank you again ☺️

We recently stayed in a delightful apartment in Ho Chi Minh's District 2. Impressively clean and conveniently located, it offered a tranquil environment while still being close to the city's vibrant centre. The facilities, including a pool, gym, and sauna, were excellent, adding a touch of luxury to our stay. Highly recommend for a comfortable and enjoyable visit.

Great place to stay. Great location because it’s outside the city so it’s quiet at night. Amenities were great.

Great added service was the ability to store luggage if you arrive early before check in time or depart late after checkout. It helps a lot. Would book again.

I had a wonderful stay at the Metropole. It’s located in District 2 and across the bridge from District 1 which is convenient and generally more quiet. The host is responsive and they have someone to welcome you which is quite nice. I would highly recommend this for a stay in HCMC.

Für uns war die Lage optimal! Doch etwas ruhiger gelegen aber alles schnell erreichbar. Minimarkt und Apotheken zu Fuß direkt zu erreichen. Die Kommunikation war 1a spitze!! Danke hierfür! Für jede Frage etc. gab es in kürze direkt eine Rückmeldung. Wichtig zu erwähnen wäre noch, dass sie dieses airbnb in einem Haus befindet, wo unten eine Schneiderei ist. I was looking for a calm, peaceful, and inspiring place to recharge, and I was immediately charmed by the photos of Soulful House. The apartment is even better than in the photos, with a lovely view of the city. The place was very clean and had a pleasant scent, and the bed was also very comfortable. I loved the Japanese-style toilet; it was a very enjoyable experience. Hannah was very responsive and proactive in communications, and she provided good recommendations based on my needs. I will definitely return and I recommend it 100%. Thank you, Hannah, for this haven of peace.
Rất tuyệt vời, sẽ quay trở lại

Sau nhiều lần ở các khách sạn, homestay trong có chuyến đi chơi ở SG, đây là căn hộ mà chúng tôi có được những trải nghiệm tốt nhất. Phòng ốc được dọn dẹp sạch sẽ, mang lại cảm giác thoải mái và dễ chịu ngay từ lúc bước vào. Tiện nghi trong căn hộ cũng đầy đủ và tiện lợi, từ bếp, nhà tắm cho đến phòng ngủ, phòng giặt – tất cả đều hoạt động tốt và phục vụ tốt nhu cầu của tôi, đặc biệt còn có máy chiếu rất chill. Phòng còn đẹp đúng như hình ảnh quảng cáo, không có sự khác biệt, đặc biệt là view từ phòng thực sự xuất sắc, mang đến trải nghiệm tuyệt vào mọi thời điểm trong ngày. Hơn hết, chủ nhà rất nhiệt tình, luôn sẵn sàng hỗ trợ khi cần. Đây là một lựa chọn hoàn hảo cho chuyến đi chơi vừa rồi của tôi, và chắc chắn tôi sẽ quay lại nếu có dịp <3.

1. Mở cửa bước vào nhà thì ban công có 1 đóng lá ẩm ướt kiểu như là chưa được dọn dẹp sạch sẽ. Rất thiếu thẩm mỹ
2. Sofa có 1 ổ kiến lửa và cắn bạn mình sưng ù cả lưng. Tụi mình ko dám nằm lên sofa ngay sau đó
3. Host có trang bị RẤT NHIỀU nến thơm nhưng ko sử dụng được vì đã dùng cạn đáy, ko còn 1 cái nào có thể dùng được(kiểu là cho có thôi chứ dùng ko được)
4. Phòng giặt đồ để đồ dùng rất lộn xộn nhìn rất thiếu thẩm mỹ
5. Host nên trang bị giá treo để máy chiếu, phòng có 2 vực cod thể dùng máy nhưng phaie khá tốn thgina để tụi mình setup. Trong phòng ngủ thì ko setup được
Nhìn chung vs căn này ngoài view thì ko có gì cả, mình đã trải nghiệm rất nhiều staycation nhưng trải nghiệm ở đây là thấy ko ưng nhất và chi phí khá cao dù bạn book ngày thường hay lễ thì chi phí này so với trải nghiệm là quá tệ, phòng ốc cũng ko được vệ sinh sạch sẽ, mạng nhện, bụi đóng đầy khe cửa kính, rèm cửa màu trắng mà nó ố vàng . Host nên chỉn chu hơn nếu thật sự thu phí với mức này. Bọn mình có hình ảnh.

đèn toilet tự động tắt nên nhiều khi đang tắm thì tắt mất, hơi sợ.
