The house is small but cozy and comfortable. The evening view is very beautiful, especially when it rains. What's special is that it's on a high floor but not noisy at all; it's very quiet and perfect for resting, studying, and working.

Overall, I had a pleasant stay. The host was very kind and communicative, and the self check-in process was a breeze – the instructions were crystal clear and easy to follow. The apartment was also very clean, which I appreciated.
However, there was one significant issue that impacted my stay. The balcony door lacked curtains, which meant the living room was flooded with sunlight throughout the day. This made it difficult to use my laptop or enjoy the projector that was provided. If curtains were added to the balcony door, this would be a fantastic place to stay.
Chủ nhà phản hồi nhanh, chỗ ở sạch sẽ, tiện nghi và thoải mái.

I had an unforgettable experience here! The place was amazing – comfortable, cozy, and peaceful. The Christmas decorations were absolutely adorable, adding a festive touch to the atmosphere. The space was spacious and spotless, making it even more enjoyable. Will definitely come back!

The place was actually better than the photos listed in Airbnb. The host was very caring throughout stay and easy to communicate with.
Quite and peaceful residential location, great view of the city from the window, fairly new building so everything was clean.
Although this new place needs some attention from the host in detail place to make it more home-like, I would recommand for any travellers looking for comfortable local stay in Saigon.
I think soulfould describes it really good, it has an amazing view , a comfortable bed and couch and convenient location. Will come again.

The air bnb was dirty and dusty. The house had a stinky smell to it. The house needs a house cleaner to clean the house. There are lots of spiders and spider webs at that airbnb. Plan to celebrate New Years with partner but sadly it was a disappointment.
Đẹp sạch sẽ và dễ thương

Căn hộ rất sạch sẽ, được trang bị đầy đủ đồ dùng cá nhân (có cả nến thơm nữa). Ban đầu nhìn hình ảnh thì cảm thấy ko tin tưởng lắm, sợ là ảnh bị chỉnh quá nhiều nên mới đẹp được vậy nhưng sau khi nói chuyện với Dani (chủ căn hộ) thì mình tin tưởng hơn nên thử book 1 ngày. Ko ngờ rằng khi nhận thì nó giống ảnh hoàn toàn luôn ạ. Mình rất thích những căn chill cũng như có gu thẩm mỹ do tìm những căn như vậy rất khó và ở đây đã đáp ứng được điều đó. Cảm ơn Dani đã hỗ trợ mình nhiệt tình nhé.
Nice and peaceful place. Friendly host.
Wonderful place, very supportive Host
This home is so cozy, suitable for 2 people or those who want to enjoy the weekend.
Excellent experience! The host was kind and communicative. The home was spotless and peaceful. Would stay again.
Nice little apartment on the 24th floor 😌
The space is cozy and filled with candles, extremely suitable for a couple to relax, also cute Christmas decoration
Dani has a lovely place, it’s really clean and looks like the photos :) it’s really nicely decorated and only about 15min by car to Thảo dien and district 1.

Máy lạnh và nước nóng ổn. Nhà gần khu ăn uống, siêu thị nên khá tiện lợi. Chủ nhà nhiệt tình, hỗ trợ thêm đồ dùng khi cần. Đối với một người thường xuyên di chuyển khắp nơi và ưa thích áo quần thơm tho, sạch sẽ như mình thì việc sử dụng máy giặt thoải mái là một điểm cộng. Địa chỉ định vị trên bản đồ chỉ mang tính tương đối, khi cần bắt taxi hay grab nên đi ra quán Ốc Đào gần đó sẽ dễ dàng cho tài xế hơn.
everything good！ recommend！

🥰 Nhà ở gần các trục đường lớn, nhà gọn gàng, sạch, yên tĩnh và an ninh, tiện nghi cơ bản, chủ nhà thân thiện và tận tình hết mức!!
👍 Cần cải thiện thêm về: máy lạnh đặt ở vị trí chưa hợp lý nên làm mát lâu, ổ khoá cửa chính hơi khó mở, cần thêm dụng cụ vệ sinh cá nhân (bàn chải, sữa tắm…), chỗ để xe máy ở chung cư nên khó tìm
Overall mình cho 3.5⭐️ mình dễ tính nên chỉ cần chủ nhà vui vẻ giúp đỡ là okie ❤️❤️

Một nơi như là nhà.  Luisa là người host đáng yêu nhất mà tôi từng gặp . Chị tiếp đón tôi , chào đón tôi . Mọi thứ trong nhà đều mang lại cảm giác thoải mái như ở nhà của mình.Tôi đã có 1 khoảng thời gian rất đáng nhớ .
在这里住一个晚上感觉很棒，屋主非常友善，对我们的提问回答耐心，我很喜欢她家的香皂，她也很大方地送了我一块非常感谢。我和我朋友度过了非常不错的一晚，感谢Luisa的招待！

Our stay at Luisa’s was so perfect for what we needed, it was a peaceful place away from the busy city! nice and quiet. The mezzanine was private away from other people & there was air-con and a fan to keep us cool. Luisa was lovely & helped even with any stupid questions we had! would definitely recommend, especially for people on a lower budget that want something cosy in a neighbourhood that’s got some nightlife and authenticity. It was a 15 min grab from the city aswell so about £1.70. Would definitely recommend
Nice artsy room and property located just outside of district 1, only a 10 minute grab away from the city centre. Luisa was lovely and extremely accommodating, thank you for having us!

Luisa war sehr freundlich und hat uns gute Empfehlungen für die Umgebung gegeben.
Nur als kleine Info, wir hatten das Zimmer, welches ein Durchgangszimmer ist. Das war für uns aber kein Problem, da Luisa uns vorher darüber informiert hat.
Der Rest der Unterkunft war sehr geschmackvoll eingerichtet und durfte auch genutzt werden.

Luisa was such a charm to meet, she’s always open for a chat and getting to know you and very respecting in dealing with you, she has such a joyful vibe and will do everything she can to make you feel at home

I really like the architecture here. It's very quiet, very French, and makes people calm down. The landlord is very discerning and aesthetic, super fashionable, and very friendly. I will definitely come back to Ho Chi Minh City to stay again next time I come back

Our stay at Luisa’s airbnb was the best way to start our honeymoon in Vietnam. The neighbourhood is great with a lot of street food and cafes.
The house is beautiful and decorated with really good taste. Luisa is really nice person
Thanks a lot and all the best

This place like hidden gem in Ho Chi Minh City , I was lucky to come cross to this little heaven.
I liked the kitchen so much, I wish it’s mine. I recommend the place to everyone who’s visiting the city.

Lusia’s house is a hidden gem in Saigon, during my visit I stayed in two different rooms and they are all very beautiful and special oriented.  The kitchen there has all equipment u need if u love hospitality, you could tell the house is very well decorated with love and care. Luisa is very helpful and caring person, very easy to talk to, beautiful and charming  just as how the house represents. And I love her soaps, the best in the world!! I highly recommend people to stay here!🌿🌱

Luisa was very welcoming and kind. The space was clean and decorated nicely. It is situated in a good neighbourhood, with plenty of things to do nearby. The air con and fan was a life saver in the heat! Thank you so much for having us, Luisa :)
We loved our stay at Luisa’s place. She was super friendly and accommodating (allowing us to check in early and leave luggage there). The place is beautiful and has lovely character.
Trải nghiệm tuyệt vời chủ nhà rất thân thiện

We absolutely loved our stay at Case Co Core! The location was perfect—tucked away from the busy backpacker streets in a more authentic, local part of Saigon, which gave us a real sense of the city’s everyday life. Luisa was a fantastic host—warm, responsive, and full of great recommendations. We followed most of her tips, from delicious street food to cozy coffee spots, atmospheric bars, and vibrant markets, and every single one was a gem.
Her home is a beautiful reflection of her artistic and creative spirit—full of greenery, inspiring details, and thoughtful touches that made us feel completely at home. It was the perfect base for our Saigon adventures. Highly recommended!
Lots of love from Kathleen and Nimrod

Luisa's place feels like home, even when you are away from home, she has curated such a safe haven and she is so kind to show you each and every aspect of the place and has made her personal recommendations list, just incase you feel lost, loved my time there. All the best to you🌸.

What a gem! The space is truly gorgeous. Luisa is an amazing host, responsive, direct, and considerate.
I stayed at a mezzanine and it was super comfortable, can be hot in the summer but the AC and fan hugely helped.

Luisa’s place is great if you’re looking for a great location and a friendly host. I stayed at the mezzanine, bear in mind that it’s not 100% comfortable but it’s a good deal for the price and the location

Luisa’s place had lots of character and had a beautiful soul. Luisa was very helpful and responsive and accommodated us last minute. Her recommendations were spot on too! Would definitely love to stay with her again. ❤️

Luisa mezzanine was a wow experience for me. She decorated the house in a very unique style, the shared spaces are spacious, cozy and a blended with nature  elegance. She's very friendly and I enjoyed my stay overall.

Schon die Anreise zum Flughafen war unproblematisch. Dank Luisas Informationen.
Die Unterkunft hat Stil ist nett eingerichtet. Das Bett und die Matratze war gut. Schön war auch diese große Küche, in dem wir uns unser Frühstück selbst zubereiten konnten endlich mal nach langer Zeit… Wir wünschen Luisa noch viele tolle und gesunde Jahre.. ihr Sprit und ihr Elan waren uns eine Freude ist auch typisch sie kommt aus Italien.

chambre en mezzanine ouverte avec salle de bain partagée avec la chambre d' à côté.
Luiza est pleine de bon conseil et accueillante.
Elle a bien voulu garder mon bagage le temps que je voyage aux alentours, cela m'a beaucoup soulager.. encore merci
le quartier est sympa des coins animés et bruyants et d'autres plus chill et calme, quartier populaire sympa et a 5 min en taxi du centre pour 1€

A little hidden gem in the busy city of Saigon. Italian/Japanese vibe with lovely interior was something we wouldn’t have expected before visiting. Luisa was very welcoming and shared her recommendations of the neighbourhood. Five stars from here.

Lulu was extremely hospitable and useful, she makes you feel right at home. If you are looking for an alternative place while in HCMC, you should definitely try staying over at hers. She’s got a cool rustic house surrounded with many restaurants, cafes and bars. I found a pharmacy right on the same street, which was useful for me.

Anh Minh - host của home, là một người rất nhiệt tình, hỗ trợ khách mọi lúc và dễ thương.
Nhà vệ sinh sạch, phòng có hệ đèn rất đẹp, hợp lý cho những chuyến đi cần một chỗ ở tiện di chuyển gần trung tâm Sài Gòn và với một mức giá hợp lý.
Mình và bạn đi cùng đều đồng tình là sẽ quay lại!! Cảm ơn anh Minh ạ.

The place is in a super convenient area — close to everything and easy to get a Grab. Minh was friendly and very responsive. He recommended some great local food spots, and his pho recommendation near the Airbnb was hands down — the best pho I had during my whole trip!! Definitely worth staying here!
Sạch sẽ, yên tĩnh. Nếu đi xe máy sẽ hơi khó dẫn vào nhà. Nhìn chung tốt.

I had a great stay! The place was cheap, clean, and cozy, just as described. It’s in a walkable location, which made exploring super easy. Most importantly, the host was very hands-on—he responded quickly and even helped me find my way to the place. I really appreciated the warm hospitality. Highly recommend!
Cảm ơn đã giúp mình có kỳ nghỉ hoàn hảo
整体还不错，就是早晨能够偶尔听到摩托车经过的声音，房主回复很及时，遇到问题能够及时解决，整体来说体验感不错，房间与照片一致。
Nhận phòng rất oki. Anh chủ siêu dễ thương

Very good budgeting option in the beautiful location right in the centre of city. Beautiful room's decor with cozy and aesthetic vibes that comforted my night. The area is quiet with delicious local and vegetarian restaurant around.
The place is in a really good location, close to the main road, near food shops, and it’s easy to catch a bus to explore the city. Overall, we had a great stay and we’d love to come back again!

The place was nice and looked exactly like the photo. Host was responsive and gave us local recommendations which were really yummy. However, it can get quite noisy at night/early morning as it is on the second floor.

很好的一次住宿体验！！！
房间很私密，晚上也很安静，房东热情，而且主要是独行女性住宿也很安全！周围咖啡店以及换汇都很便宜，而且走路出行也很方便

Surprisingly Amazing Stay!
Didn’t expect much when I walked in from a small alley but wow, what a hidden gem!
The room was clean, cozy, and full of personality. Loved the unique decor, soft lighting, and even found a book from my home country such a nice touch!
Bed and AC were super comfortable. Bathroom was spotless and even had a bidet spray. Host Minh was super responsive and friendly.
Would definitely stay here again next time I'm in Ho Chi Minh!
很赞！！！老板是个帅哥！人也特别的好！民宿也特别的棒！很干净和安静！以后来胡志明还住在这！还会推荐我的朋友住！

ที่พักตรงตามในรูปเจ้าของที่พักให้คำแนะนำที่ดี และตอบข้อความค่อนข้างไวมากๆและที่พักอยู่ในแหล่งร้านอาหารและสิ่งอำนวยความสะดวก เพื่อนบ้านค่อนข้างเงียบมากในตอนกลางคืน และไม่ไกลจาก walking street เดินทางสะดวก แต่ประตูเปิดและล็อคค่อนข้างยาก และแขกที่เข้าพักค่อนข้างเสียงดังในตอนตี1-2 ซึ่งเป็นเวลาพักผ่อน แต่เจ้าของก็แก้ไขให้ โดยรวมดี
Dịch vụ ổn, chủ thân thiện nhiệt tình ạ

This place feels like a second home, without a doubt! Everything from the decorations and facilities to the surroundings, it’s got a unique vibe that you won’t find anywhere else. And the host is super cute, responsive, and supportive whenever I need anything. Plus, I didn’t have to meet anyone during check-in or check-out, so it’s perfect for those who prefer a more private and introverted experience.
Chổ ở tiện nghi, phòng đẹp, giá cả hợp lí.

This is my third time using Airbnb, and this has been the most satisfying experience so far. I’m Vietnamese, but I’m leaving this review in English so that international travelers can read it. The room was clean, tidy, and thoughtfully prepared by the host. The host was friendly, responded immediately whenever needed, and always checked in to make sure I was comfortable. The location is incredibly convenient—perfect for those without personal transportation, as everything you might need is available nearby
Chỗ ở ok

NICE PLACE TO STAY
--
The room is great to stay.
First of all, this is value for money.
Secondly, the design is matching with love couple.
Also, the evening sound is amazingly quite.
Minh is a very friendly person and the room is beautiful and clean, but the road leading there is quite narrow and hard to drive up. I feel like it’s very easy to fall.

It was a little confusing to find at first but it was okay overall.
Room feels cozy and the lighting is a really nice touch to it.
Thank you for letting us stay. 🤍
Lovely bedroom, shared kitchen! Very close to city center! Bathroom was cleaned and he provides all the ameneties needed! Recommended
the room is somewhat small for a couple but other than that everything was perfect

Chủ nhà khá thân thiện, hỗ trợ nhiệt tình. Phòng ốc tiện nghi sạch sẽ, ngay mặt đường dễ tìm, gần sân bay. Điểm trừ duy nhất là phải nt nhờ chủ nhà mở cửa mỗi lần ra vào nên hơi bất tiện nếu ra vô nhiều nhưng chủ nhà hỗ trợ mở cửa rất nhanh nên mọi thứ đều okila, xứng đáng giá tiền
Không gian rộng rãi  phù hợp với số tiền bỏ ra. Chủ nhà thân thiện
Sẽ quay lại và gthieu những người bạn khác
Good house ~

Tất cả mọi thứ rất ổn, trừ đường đi xuống hầm cảm giác rất nguy hiểm mong bên cho thuê có thể làm lại đường xuống. Phòng tầng 2 mình thuê có gián và mùi gián nhẹ ở bếp nhưng tất cả điều ổn và tuyệt vời.

Phòng đẹp, nhiều đồ dùng cần thiết, chủ nhà có hỗ trợ nhiệt tình các đồ dùng. Có cái là đường đi xuống hầm để xe nó dốc 🥲 đi lên đi xuống mà hai đứa thẫn thờ lun, còn lại đều rất okila, thiết bị trong phòng đều còn tương đối mới và sử dụng dễ dàng

Phòng rất sạch đẹp giống hình.
Chủ nhà dễ thương và hỗ trợ nhiệt tình. Phòng rông rãi, sạch và có ban công riêng. Vị trí thuận lợi khi di chuyển ra các khu vực trung tâm.
Giá phù hợp và phòng đẹp. Nhất định sẽ book tiếp khi quay lại Sài Gòn.
Thanks Tâm, phản hồi nhanh, linh động, phòng ở đầy đủ, ổn…lần tới chị sẽ ghé nữa nhé.
Phòng đẹp tuy không lung linh hoàn toàn như trên ảnh nhưng vẫn ok , một số chỗ vẫn còn vụn tóc .. nhìn chung 8/10chấp nhận được, đáng để ở
khá là tuyệt vời
Nice and comf
The location is very strategic. Easy to get grab. The host is also very kind and helpful. Eventhough there is no lift to go to our room and they only have stairs, we are okay with it.

Petit studio très mignon et bien équipé, excellent rapport qualité prix, emplacement fantastique. Légèrement bruyant la nuit (seulement les bruits de la rue, mais boules quies fournies).
Cuisine bien équipée, lave linge à disposition et vidéo-projecteur qui fonctionne.
Nous recommandons !!
We had a fun stay at the homestay, the home is well-equipped and clean, cost efficient for group of 4-5. Would definitely book again.
素晴らしかったです！

I had an amazing stay at this apt!!! apartment was clean .!!Stylish, and comfortable. Host was super friendly, and location was ideal for exploring the city. With so many great restaurants nearby. I’ll definitely be back!!
Great host and very accommodating.  Place is very clean and would highly recommend!
Host is super proactive and very helpful.

Beautiful apartment, which is very close to the centre of the city. There is little to no traffic noise which made it very peaceful.
The communication was easy and very fast!

Amazing, Accommodating, and Kind host. This Airbnb is located in the perfect spot. Everything is within 10 to 15 minutes. I felt right at home and the host communicated super efficiently proved to be extremely helpful when needed. I would definitely recommend booking with this host at this location. I felt very secure with the gate that leads to the Airbnb, and there was plenty around me to walk to whether it was food, a spa, coffee or ATM. 10/10 would book again. Thank you for such a wonderful stay 💕

Very comfy bed, strong AC, beautiful workstation and great location that's away from noisy streets. Was a little confusing to find at first because of the construction but the host respoded immediately.
Perfect place for commuting back and forth to HCM activities in District 1. Check in was very easy, and the place was spotless! Would highly recommend booking for anyone wanting to see HCM.

Had a lovely stay here! The apartment was super clean, homely and had everything we needed. The projector at the end of the bed was really cool, and our host was so friendly and helpful - responding immediately to every message we sent.

Great stay, very modern and clean. Comfy bed and decent shower. Projector was a nice touch!
Had one issue which the host resolved immediately. They were always very helpful.
Really good little coffee shop just outside the alley (Lac).
It’s worth noting the location is out of the busy area of HCM, about 20-30 mins walk or a very cheap grab bike away. We appreciated being in a quieter area, but it’s just outside of the pick up area for most tours so bear in mind you may have to walk 10 mins for pick up.
Overall a great stay 😊

Die Unterkunft war sehr schön eingerichtet und viele Sehenswürdigkeiten waren in unmittelbarer Nähe.
Leider wurde die Wohnung vor Bezug nicht gereinigt. Nachdem wir Alida kontaktiert hatten, um sie darüber zu informieren, hat sie sich schnell um eine Reinigung am nächsten Morgen gekümmert und uns eine Nacht erstattet.
Alida 提供的入住說明與圖片使我順利自助入住。Studio 經濟實惠，位於安靜的小巷內，目前鄰居有施工，對或影響不大。我出入都使用Grab叫車。Alida 熱心善意回應我。
The place is really comfy, clean and very quiet, it’s perfect for a good rest and it’s very close to any popular place in city by walk

We hebben een nacht extra geboekt. Super mooi interieur en een heerlijk bed. Ook de warme douche was heerlijk. Koffietentje en wat restaurants in de buurt maar niet in de mega drukte. Deze is overigens heel makkelijk op te zoeken met de grab. Zeker een aanrader

The apartment looks great and is exactly like on the photos. The host always responds when you need him. Clean, quiet and adequate for a short trip. Not too close to the center but very convenient to move to tourist attractions.
Will definitely recommend to my friends and I will also come back when I have the chance.
Nice and cosy apartment good facilities and walkable to restaurants and attractions
Had a great stay at Alida place, everything is flexible and smooth, definitely recommend for fellow travellers.

Unterkunft sieht aus wie aus den Fotos und ist gemütlich eingerichtet. Küche ist einfach, aber ausreichend. Bad ist „typisch südostasiatisch“ dabei aber sauber und praktisch aufgeteilt. Lage ist etwas außerhalb vom Kern des District 1, dafür sehr ruhig und entspannt. Beamer mit Netflix ist ein tolles Add-On. Alles in allem sehr zu empfehlen.
非常に丁寧に対応頂け快適に過ごせました。場所は奥まっているので、最初は少し心配でしたが、小道も夜は灯りが付いていたりするので心配はありません。室内はとても清潔で気持ちよく過ごせました。
Không

벌레가나오지않아요 가장중요한점입니다
숙소들어가는길이 공사중이라 보내주신 사진과달라요 업데이트가 필요할듯합니다 잘쉬다갑니다

The place was very well designed and the room felt like a nice art cafe. The highlight was the drop down screen and projector arrangement.
Overall the room looked exactly like it’s shown in Airbnb.
Location is a bit inside from Main Street but definitely not a deal breaker.

Great place to stay, everything as described. Also safe and quiet (you won't hear any car horns)
This place has super fast wifi (400-500Mbps). The host also responded super quickly to any questions. There are lovely cafes around.
Will definitely come back in the near future.
Lovely place, clean, comfy able and great location
Very clean and secure area to stay in! Will book again next time I’m in Ho Chi Minh.

Nice place to stay :)
I really love this room. Thanks for your instructions.
All is so good in this place
Great stay and location!

Siêu recommend home của chị Như và anh Tiến cho người đi du lịch, công tác 1 mình hoặc nhóm 2 người. Chỗ ở nhỏ, ấm cúng, đầy đủ tiện nghi, sạch sẽ. Ấn tượng nhất là khi mất điện, chủ nhà đã không ngần ngại mà chi trả cho khách 1 buổi cafe bên ngoài vì trong nhà lúc đó nếu không có điều hòa sẽ hơi nóng. Anh chị chủ trả lời tin nhắn nhanh và cực kỳ hỗ trợ. Chắc chắn sẽ tiếp tục ủng hộ nếu có dịp vào lại Sài Gòn 🤩🤩🤩

Phòng nhỏ nhỏ xinh xinh, decor rất dễ thương, có đầy đủ tiện ích cơ bản. Có bàn ủi hơi nước nữa. Điều mình wow nhất là quầy snack có cà phê, bánh snack, nước ngọt, bia sẵn tại phòng. Dùng bao nhiêu trả tiền bấy nhiêu rất tiện để chill chill Netflix. Xung quanh cũng nhiều cửa hàng ăn uống, cf nữa. Nói chung là ok lắm. Chắc chắn sẽ quay lại.

Trải nghiệm tốt, cảm thấy relax trong kì nghỉ ngắn tại đây, phòng ốc khá sạch sẽ, ngăn nắp, giống mô tả.
Chủ nhà phản hồi khá là nhanh chóng, được miễn phí giặt đồ (điểm cộng)
Gần Bùi Viện, tối đi quẩy rồi về ngủ ngon lành, xung quanh cũng nhiều hàng quán ko sợ đói.
Lần sau sẽ ghé lại.

Phòng này nhìn xinh hơn trong hình nha. Bếp và dụng cụ nấu nướng ăn uống đầy đủ, có sẵn dầu ăn, muối, đường, bột nêm. Phòng theo style Bohemian dễ thương ấm cúng. Điểm cộng lớn là có máy chiếu rõ nét và máy lạnh rất mát. Bạn chủ thân thiện, nhiệt tình và luôn trả lời ngay lập tức, cảm ơn bạn nhé ❤️

phòng siu thơm, bố trí nhìu đèn nhỏ, phòng không quá rộng nma cảm giác không hề ngột ngạt hay tù, mà rất ấm cúng luôn huhu, chăn siu to siu ấm, vibe hơi boho xí, dễ thương sạch sẽ 10đ hêhhehehe i ll be back asap

Phòng nhỏ nhắn, xinh xắn và dễ thương hơn mình kì vọng với giá thuê này. Có đủ các tiện nghi và sạch sẽ, vị trí khá thuận tiện cho việc di chuyển lại có quán trà đậm vị take away ngay đầu ngõ hợp gu mình. Cô chủ thân thiện. Mình sẽ quay lại nếu có dịp thăm SG.
dịch vụ tuyệt vời, anh chị chủ cực kỳ thân thiện và giúp đỡ khách khi cần, phòng cực kỳ sạch sẽ và ấm cúng
Nơi ở ok, Như hỗ trợ tận tình và rất tuyệt vời. Một nơi đáng để trải nghiệm nếu như có dịp ghé thăm SG
giá ok phòng đẹp ấm cúng

先说缺点，需要爬楼梯，对行李比较重的客户比较不友好，投影仪不是很清晰清楚且需要自己去调试，还有早晨时不时的敲打声影响睡眠，可能是窗户隔音太差导致，洗衣机感觉不是特别干净，没有烘干机。
其余都是比较满意的，能看得出来房东是一位女性，很多细节方面处理的很好，还有零食柜，价格便宜，除了民宿该有的一些东西之外，女生的一些必需品也有，非常的赞，适合短期旅游的客户。
美好的入住体验，下次还会再来。附近很多本地好吃的
非常漂亮的房间，东西齐全
除空调声音大，房间有点异味外其它不错

Super!
À une prochaine fois !

Phòng nhỏ nhưng với giá này thì mình thấy xứng đáng cho khách nào chỉ cần chỗ ngủ, đầy đủ tiện nghi bàn ủi, máy sấy, bàn chải. Tủ lạnh được cắm sẵn trong phòng giúp tôi bảo quản được đồ uống, có sẵn đá. Home rất chu đáo chuẩn bị lược, tăm bông trên bàn. Sạch sẽ check in dễ dàng, home hơi khó tìm, mình nghĩ home nên để bảng có đèn để dễ tìm hơn vì mình check in buổi tối. Chị chủ rep nhanh và tôn trọng khách.
Phòng nhỏ xinh, tuy nhiên k có cửa sổ. Địa chỉ ban đầu tới thì hơi khó tìm do biển hiệu nhỏ và bị chìm so với xung quanh. +1đ cho chị chủ homestay cực nice, hỗ trợ nhiệt tình và rep tin nhắn nhanh
Phòng ok thật sự. Bạn chủ rất nhiệt tình và hỗ trợ hết mình luôn
Tôi đã có trải nghiệm tuyệt vời
Mình đã có 1 kì nghỉ thoải mái, ngủ rất ngon. Ở ngoài giống ảnh và mọi thứ sạch sẽ gọn gàng
Phòng ốc sạch sẽ, gọn gàng, mọi thứ đều ok trừ cái bàn hình bông hoa hơi nhẹ 😅 mình có chút việc phát sinh vs đc  bạn chủ support mình rất nhiệt tình, rất ok luôn
The host is really responsive and we really had a great time in our stay here. Very accessible and the location is easy to find. The room is clean relaxing. Thank you!
Không có gì để chê ngoài điểm 10 chất lượng 🙆🏻‍♀️
Great budget friendly stay, for backpackers like us. I'll definitely book again in future if i visit vietnam again. fs.

the place was located in a good area & the host was very responsive to my messages. she also accomodated my requests & offered to store my bags since my flight was in the evening & check out was at noon. the staff/cleaner was also very helpful! ^^

I'm happy and comfortable staying with AnhDuong's  place except that there's no window to get fresh air but still not of a big deal  as we are always outside.                        Fits right on my preferences such as close to local neighborhood where you can eat local food, walkable to affordable local restaurant, convenient store, public market and public bus going to D1 and terminal bus if your going to Danang and Hue. She also let me use their laundry machine and detergent soap at the rooftop.🙂

she was a care and good host, very responsive when I was difficulty to find the key when checking in. . it was cozy and warm rooms with bathroom inside. strategic place, you can find food, coffe, minimart nearby this place.
thanks ❤🙏

First, I’d say I enjoyed Vietnam even for just 2 days!
What makes me convenient is that I had a place to stay that’s near to all famous attractions. Cozy and clean place, complete amenities and responsive host. Thank you so much Ms. AhnDuong for the warm welcome and accommodation. Nice seeing you also and for the token gift. I really appreciate it! Had to come back soon to explore more places and Vietnamese food! God bless you and looking forward to see you again! 😍😍😍
rất hợp để ở

Tout d’abords nous souhaitons remercier l’hôte nous ayant permis de s’installer avant l’heure prévue, nous ayant donné plusieurs recommandations de choses à faire à saigon !
L’appartement était plus que propre, une odeur incroyablement agréable s’en dégager à notre arrivée.
Bien qu’un peu petit, l’espace est très bien aménagé ce qui le rend agréable et facile à vivre
L’hôte est très réactif et plus qu’amical, encore un grand merci
Si vous êtes seul ou à deux, nous recommandons ce logement pour votre voyage à OCMC !

J'ai passée un très bon séjour ici avant de retourner en France. Le lieux était impeccable, la chambre sentait très bon à mon arrivée, c'était très agréable !
J'ai juste eu de la difficulté à trouver l'emplacement mais mon hôte a été très réactif pour m'aider 🙏
Great
Amazing place 👍🏻
excellent. highly recommended
A great cosy option in a great location
Cozy, comfy and overall a lovely stay

The place is quite small and best suited for a solo traveler like me. Although it’s located in District 1, it feels a bit far from the main areas. However, bus stops are nearby, requiring a 6–10 minute walk. The accommodation provides basic amenities, and the host is very responsive, which is a big plus. One issue I noticed was the presence of small insects in the restroom and mosquitoes in the bed area, which can be bothersome if you’re sensitive to bugs. Also, there are no windows, which might make the space feel a bit suffocating, especially if you’re staying for more than a few days. However, you can go up to the rooftop to get some fresh air and enjoy a view of the neighborhood, which is a nice breather and a good place to relax for a while. Despite these minor concerns, the stay was decent overall. If you’re looking for a budget-friendly option for a short trip, this place is okay for a quick stay. It’s not perfect, but for the price, it’s a reasonable choice.
AnhDuong is very helpful and provided us all the needed information before our check-in. The place is exactly the same as advertised. Will surely book this place again.
Rất tuyệt vời, vào trong không gian rất thơm, cảm giác sạch sẽ, mang lại cho tui sự thoải mái, sẽ quay lại vào lần khác
Home rất gọn gàng, sạch sẽ, đặc biệt chị chủ nhà support rất nhiệt tình, hỗ trợ rất nhanh luônnn, 100000đỉmmm
Phòng vs c chủ nhà dễ thương . Xứng đáng 5 sao nhé mn
hài lòng lắm ạ
Very responsive and helpful host, good value for money apartment, even with 2 short power outages i would definitely consider staying here again. Building manager was lovely as well
Good
Vị trí tốt, phòng đẹp, chủ nhà hướng dẫn nhiệt tình. Hơi bất ngờ vì không có khăn tắm, nên hãy chuẩn bị khăn mặt khăn tắm đầy đủ.
Nhân viên hỗ trợ tích cực nhiệt tình, phòng đẹp sạch sẽ, thiết bị đầy đủ. Rất tốt.

Lovely apartment only 5-10 minutes from the airport. The location is very quiet though. The WiFi worked well which was great for working on my laptop. Bed and pillows very comfortable. Good ac & shower pressure. The apartment looks exactly like the pictures. The host even accommodated a very last minute stay after my original hotel did not work out. I felt at right home and will return when back in Ho Chi Minh!
Near airport, full amenities included washing machine & laundry dryer.
Everything was cool and the host was very generous and on time with questions. Although the A/C could be fixed for cooler air.
Nice host, beautiful and clean room
Все хорошо
Nice. Ngủ rất ngon
Very good place. Comfy
Great place. Very private.
ok

Phòng rộng rãi, sạch sẽ, tuy nhiên có một vài con muỗi.
Chủ nhà thân thiện, reply nhanh chóng.

I had a wonderful stay! The place was very clean, well-equipped with all the necessary amenities, and exactly as described. It’s located just minutes away from the city center, which made getting around super convenient. The host was incredibly supportive and responsive — always quick to answer any questions and made me feel very welcome. Highly recommend this place for anyone looking for a comfortable and hassle-free stay!
Phòng sạch sẽ, gọn gàng, bồn tắm chill, thang máy nhanh, chủ nhà phản hồi nhanh chóng và tích cực, rất đáng để trải nghiệm
Mình được chủ nhà cho check in sớm 1 tiếng và ko thu thêm phí gì cả. Phòng sạch sẽ và như hình. Vị trí thuận lợi ngay trung tâm

The first day I stayed on the 1st floor and It was okay. Although It felt kinda stuffed so on the 2nd day I moved to this room, and it was not a good experience. The room was at the top of the building and it was boiling inside. The AC ran on 18oC, all the fans were on but we couldn’t breathe. It only got better after the sun set. The bathroom was literally a sauna. The hotel staff was super helpful but the room itself needs lots of upgrading to block the heat. Anyways, I would come back but definitely not roof top.
Really had fun staying at Ha Nam’s place! Great location and almost near to everything. Can easily book Grab as well to HCM’s nice landmarks. Would definitely recommend ❤️

Pros:
Location(close to all the attractions)
Clean and well organised .
Easily commutable .
Cons:
Room on top floor was extremely hot ( but owner let us keep the AC switched on even when we left the room).
Bad smell from the washroom .
Low pressure in the shower.

The room is exactly as described: giant bed, large bathtub and on the top floor of the building. Security was top notch and the building was accessible for 24/24. Great location for either a business trip, solo traveller or couple, and the Notre Dame Cathedral could be visible from the window as a bonus. Highly recommended for a short or medium length trip to Ho Chi Minh city.
Tôi đã có kì lưu trú rất vui tại đây
Phòng sạch sẽ, riêng tư, rất thoải mái
Phòng ok, sạch sẽ, nhất định sẽ quay lại

We reached this property early and they wer soo kind to provide us place to keep our luggage and give us early check in..
highly recommended
Clean and exactly as the pictures. Great view from the room and a nice balcony. The bathroom was lovely with a huge bathtub and powerful shower.
1층에 호스트가 상주합니다. 밤에도 1층에서 주무시더라구요. 다들 너무 친절하고 좋았어요. 숙소도 마음에 들어서 하루 연장했습니다. 그리고 근처에 카페도 있고, 바로 앞에 경찰서도 있어요. 위치도 괜찮은 것 같습니다.

Not only look liked photos, the room has some unexpected goodness for me as well.
As for the hosts, they were just amazing, responsiveness and warmly welcome.
The room, i stayed, is on the top of the building, with lots of light (preferred). And i almost forgot about the bathtub, believe it or not, having a bath after a long day adventuring and exploring is just a hit. Finally, the location is quite convenient (near center) and has a lot of places that can be reached on foots.
Highly recommended, definitely coming back once i have a chance to visit HCMC again.

Thank you so much for a wonderful stay at this hotel! I arrived early in the morning at 5am and despite the early hour the check in process was flawless. The staff was incredibly friendly and answered all my questions. The whole hotel is clean and cozy, you really feel at home here.
The convenient location allows easy access to all the main attractions, which is a must for my trip. I definitely plan to come back here again as everything about this hotel was top notch. Thank you so much for the warm welcome and great service!

Top Lage, einfaches Check-in, gute Kommunikation und sehr hilfsbereites 24/7-Personal. Das Apartment ist leicht zu finden, die Aussicht wunderschön und die Klimaanlage funktioniert gut – wichtig, da Dachgeschoss. Leider wirkt das Apartment auf den Fotos größer als in echt. Es war relativ laut, und die Toilette hat unangenehm gerochen – das ließ sich aber gut lösen, wenn man die Tür schloss und das Fenster im Bad öffnete. Beim Duschen lief Wasser unter der Badewanne aus, was den Aufenthalt etwas beeinträchtigt hat. Außerdem waren einige Ameisen im Raum. Die Vorhänge mussten meist geschlossen bleiben, da es sonst sehr schnell aufheizte, wodurch man die schöne Aussicht nur eingeschränkt genießen konnte. Trotzdem: Die Rezeption war jederzeit freundlich und hilfsbereit, auch kleine Dinge wie Getränke waren unkompliziert erhältlich. Für den Preis war die Unterkunft in Ordnung – wenn das Badezimmerproblem behoben wird, wäre es wirklich rundum gut.
Die  Lage ist Top! Das Zimmer war in Ordnung für den Preis. Negativ aufgefallen sind unangenehme Gerüche aus dem Bad und kleine Armeisen überall.

Хорошее местоположение в центре города с панорамным видом из квартиры и ванной комнаты. Но к сожалению нулевая звукоизоляция как снаружи, так и внутри: ночью каждый день был шум как снаружи от города, машин и так далее, так и от кого-то внутри отеля. Но в общем стоит своих денег

We had a wonderful stay at this Airbnb in Saigon. The place was incredibly cosy and had such a warm, homely vibe that made us feel right at ease. Everything was spotlessly clean and beautifully decorated, with lovely plants that added a refreshing touch.
Being on the top floor, the apartment offered stunning views and a serene atmosphere that perfectly captured the Saigon vibe. The bathtub and hot water were a delight, making it easy to relax after a day of exploring. The AC worked perfectly, and the kitchenette was great for making morning coffee.
Overall, a fantastic place to stay! Highly recommended for anyone looking for a comfortable and charming base in Saigon.
Highly recommend. Nice staffs and the room is tidy. The area is right in the heart of city , everything is very close by. Will be back when we go to Hcmc again
Lovely apartment (albeit a little smaller than expected) with spacious bathroom, excellent wifi speed
The view was great, the room was clean and comfortable, and the host was very helpful. We had a great stay.
We loved the apartment and the bath makes it an incredible place! a bath with a lovely city view!

Chị chủ dễ thương, support nhiệt tình lắmm. Uống nước ở quán cafe bên dưới còn được 30% off, recommend trà xoài với trà thơm ngon lắm. Phòng thoáng với chill lắm, khu phố cũng yên tĩnh và có mấy quán ăn gần đó. Thích cái không khí mấy ngày ở lắm luôn, mưa nhìn từ ban công cũng chill lắm. Sẽ quay lại lần sau!

Mình đã có 1 khoảng thời gian nghỉ ngơi chất lg tại đây. Mang lại cảm giác như ở nhà, cách âm tốt, host rất là nice và luôn phản hồi nhanh, đáp ứng đầy đủ những yêu cầu của tôi. Sau nếu có dịp quay lại SG mình chắc chắn sẽ book lại.

giá siêu tốt, phòng siêu rộng, phòng ngủ với phòng bếp riêng mà cả 2 phòng đều thoáng, đều có điều hòa, gần sân bay rất tiện nhen, mình book phòng 10 ngày 9 đêm thì có dịch vụ giặt đồ free 2 lần, bên home support nhanh
10000 điểm
Chỗ ở sạch sẽ và siêu thơmmmmm. Không gian thì rộng rãi, gọn gàng ngăn nắp, nói chung là rất đáng trải nghiệm ạ
Chỗ ở sạch sẽ, thơm, gần trung tâm thuận tiện cho việc di chuyển
Mình có 1 giấc ngủ ngon sau chuyến bay bị delay đến HCM, chăn gối thơm và yên tĩnh 🙌
Home xinh, thơm, gọn gàng, rộng thoáng. Mọi thưa rất thân thiện, sạch sẽ. Home rất có gu và chu đáo nữa 💚

Ha’s place was clean and cozy as I imagined from the pictures.
The male staff members downstairs in the coffee shop were all friendly and helpful. I had a big backpack but they carried that for me to the upstairs.
I also enjoyed her coffee shop and had a couple of fun Matcha drinks with the special discount as an Airbnb guest.
Everyone should try her shop and drinks!
Thank you Ha for letting me stay at your comfy place.

Cozy hidden space for healing souls. Recommend for all guys who love natural and japanese minimalism style. Near by airport and just about 10 mins heads to downtown so good with reasonable price 🤟🏻 the neighbor is so cool but peace and quiet. This was so nice to get great memories here with my partner.

This place was perfect - it has a cafe below, the room was clean, smells fresh, there were fresh flowers, and plants inside the room, and most especially the sun in the morning makes it really dreamy. The host was very helpful to us too. The location is perfect, its near a lot of convenience stores, local food, and very peaceful. We will definitely book this place again. Thank you, Ha! 💓👏🏽🇻🇳

really nice place located in between the airport and downtown. perfect for short stay travellers like me who need to catch a flight to the airport yet also wanna check out the city! the cafe downstairs is legit amazing and there's a discount for guest! highly recommend ❤️

Charming studio in an alley off the main road. If you want a true locals experience with modern amenities, this is the place for you. Loved the design, space, and especially the balcony was perfect to spend time drinking coffee. The cafe downstairs serves amazing coffee and matcha. I couldn't have asked for more. If I'm ever in Saigon again, I'll rebook this in a heartbeat 💓

Ha was very helpful and answered my questions on the Airbnb home very promptly. Ha even went the extra mile and answered my question late at night when I needed some help, and that I really appreciate.
The home is tucked in a small alley above a cafe, but despite that it was generally very quiet and private which was honestly better than I expected. There are some nice restaurants nearby and street food is just a minute walk away.
The key point for me was the location. It's really close to the airport so it helps alleviate some of my anxiety with flight check-in scheduling.
Overall the amenities were in good condition, the light switches did get a bit confusing for me but nothing that couldn't be solved by asking Ha. Overall would stay again!

Ha is an amazing host and always just a message away. If we had any questions, Ha was always there to help. The apartment has a great location, very close to the airport, making it perfect for a long layover. It's located in a small alley, so it's quiet. And there are some interesting restaurants and coffee places nearby.
One tricky thing is the stairs to the second floor; they're a bit steep and can get slippery after rain, so heads up. If you have luggage, the staff from the cafe on the first floor can help you get it to the second floor. Also, the check-in and check-out are easy and smooth since the keys are available for pick up at the cafe on the first floor.
Overall, it's a great pick for the money for a few days before the flight. And thank you, Ha, for being a very responsive and helpful host. Best of luck to you!
Good and simple place, host was really helpful and replies really fast! Staff at the coffee shop was also really helpful in assisting on arrival.
Very local neighborhood away from the over crowded and touristy spots in Saigon!
“Lovely stay! The apartment was clean and cozy, with a cute café right downstairs. Super convenient location, just a short drive from the airport. Highly recommend!”

Great stay in Quận 3. Wonderful location. Very spacious and loveeee the included washer and dryer in the room. 10/10 AC - cold as ice when needed. 10/10 wifi speed. Hot water that is actually hot when needed. The only thing is the road was having construction that bikes and cars had a hard time going through (August, 2025), but I’m sure that’s temporary. Staffs are super nice, thank you for carrying my luggages up and down the stairs!!! Definitely will book again in the future.
I had a fantastic experience staying at this place. The host was incredibly welcoming and responsive. The space was exactly what was describe. I look forward to staying here again.
Chủ nhà thân thiện, hỗ trợ khách hàng chu đáo. Căn hộ xinh, ngăn nắp. Gần nhiều địa điểm tham quan trải nghiệm.

Đây là lần đầu tiên mình ở homestay tại thành phố hồ chí minh, bạn chut nhà phản hồi cực kì nhanh và thân thiện vô cùng, nhà của Virgo khiến mình có cảm giác rất ấm cúng và thoải mái như ở nhà vậy, mặc dù tường cách âm ko đc tốt lắm nhưng đó ko phải là một vấn đề quá nghiêm trọng và Virgo cũng chuẩn bị bịt tai. Mình rất thích nơi này và nếu có dịp mình sẽ tiếp tục ở đây!!!
Chỗ ở siu siu chill, sạch sẽ thoáng mát, thích hợp cho nhóm bạn 4-5 người staycation. Chủ nhà nhiệt tình hỗ trợ khách. Chắc sẽ book thêm vài lần nữa. Rất đáng tiền nhé mng uiiii🩵

Lỡ hẹn mấy lần thì mình cũng book được phòng để trải nghiêm. Về khu vực và tiện ích thì nơi đây gần như là số 1 ở khu vực vì chỉ cần đi bộ là có cà phê ngon, rượu ngon và thức ăn ngon. Không gian sạch sẽ, thoáng đãng như miêu tả cũng như. Mọi thứ trải nghiệm khá tuyệt.
Tình cờ xem qua tiktok và book phòng ở đây, nhà xinh lắm nha mọi người, thích nhất có gác lửng có view cực xinh. Anh chủ hướng dẫn tụi mình rất tận tình luôn! 10 điểm 🥰 ở dưới còn nhiều quán cf nữa🤩
chỗ ở rộng rãi thoải mái tiện nghi
The location of was truly amazing, all the attractions were within walking distance. Our schedule needs early check-in and late check-out, and Virgo helped us with both, thank you so much 😊

ที่พักสวยตรงปก ห้องพักใหญ่สบาย เหมาะกับการมาเป็นกลุ่ม แก๊งเพื่อน 3-4 คน ห้องพักมีที่นอน 2 ชั้น อุปกรณ์ครบ มีหมอนสำรอง ผ้าห่มสำรองเผื่อหนาว ของใช้ครบครันแทบไม่ต้องเตรีนมมา รูปลั๊กไฟเยอะ สถานที่เดินทางสะดวก ผู้คนผ่านตลอดไม่น่ากลัว ที่พักมีเงินสำรองไว้จ่ายค่าลิฟตอนขึ้น (สำหรับการเข้าพักขึ้นลิฟรอบแรก เราต้องจ่ายเงินขึ้นเองก่อน) มีร้านอาหารในตึก และบริเวณรอบๆ เยอะ

The apartment itself is nice, light and tastefully decorated. The downside is the elevator. The apartment is located on the ninth floor of a complex that houses a lot of cafes and is really touristy. Since it’s only one elevator we usually had to wait fairly long to get up to the apartment. We found this  inconvenient.

This is one of the best place i've ever stayed! 💖 The room is amazing! Clean, nice decorated and very spacious. I love everything here. Virgo is so nice! He always answer my messages. He let me leave my luggage at his cafe. I recommend you all to book this room! ❤️

Phòng đẹp y hình và rất tiện. Host cũng rất nhiệt tình trả lời mình. 100đ không có nhưng 😁
Sẽ giới thiệu bạn bè ạ!! ☺️🫶🏻

Loved the place! Very clean and comfy. We loved the hot shower especially. The light and socket next to the bed was super convenient.
The design of the place is also very cool. Despite the location being busy and noisy downstairs, the buzz and noise does not reach the Airbnb at all, so we did not have any trouble resting or sleeping. We didn't even get to use the earplugs we bought specifically for this place 😆
Overall, this is a great place to stay in Sai Gon. Would love to stay again on our next visit!

It was a very interesting experience, which is different from boring hotels and ordinary apartments. The apartment itself is quite nice and clean. The landlord was always in touch. I recommend trying something like this at least once!
Rất sạch sẽ và đẹp. Vị trí cũng rất tiện để di chuyển, sẽ ghé đến lần sau

Host trả lời tin nhắn rất nhanh và tận tình. Airbnb ở trung tâm lun nên đi đâu đi bộ cũng rất tiện ko cần book grab nhìu. Chỉ bị cái là tối cuối tuần sẽ hơi ồn nma airbnb có mút tai nên ko ảnh hưởng nhìu. Nhà thì y hình rất đẹp. Do nhà trong khu chung cư cũ nên có bụi bẩn một số chỗ nhưng ko đáng kể nhé

I had an absolutely amazing stay at this apartment! The place itself is beautiful, clean, and incredibly comfortable — everything you could ask for in a home away from home. It’s located in the iconic Cafe Apartment building, which makes it super easy to find and adds a unique charm to the experience.
Virgo was a fantastic host — extremely responsive and proactive in answering all our questions, not just about the apartment but also with great tips on sightseeing and things to do around the city.
The location is unbeatable. Right on the prime walking street, you’re just a 10-minute walk away from everything you could need — cafes, shops, landmarks, and more.
Highly recommend this stay to anyone visiting the area. Would definitely come back!
Central location for food and close to many attractions. Cute home decor and inside cafe apartment. Good for two people.  Host was very friendly and responsive.
Amazing location and really nice view from the windows. It’s a unique space in a historic building. I highly recommend!

Virgo’s place is a hidden gem in District 1 close to all the major hotspots. Hands down the best Airbnb I’ve stayed in! Everything was perfect from location, to the cute interior and all the other amenities of this house. The split level makes the place playful and fun. I would highly recommend this place and rebook it for sure for future travels to Saigon!

I had a memorable experience at Virgo homestay. The host was so enthusiastic, it felt like she was spoiling me. Although the room wasn't a professional music studio, the warm family atmosphere made me forget all the noise outside. If you're looking for a place to escape the hustle and bustle of the city, Virgo is a good choice.

The location is great and very convenient, situated in the coffee apartment on Nguyen Hue Street. You can take the elevator up to the room, It cost 3k/person.
Everything in the room was exactly as described, just like the photos on the website. We really loved the design and decor, it’s very tasteful! The area is also very quiet at night.
btw There were a few small flies in the bathroom at night, but it wasn’t a big issue.

Came back the city I love I got a chance to stay at Virgo's again! the price can't be more reasonable. the place is beautiful, close to everything. the room was clean, had Netflix too - a must. He is very friendly and responsive, as usual. Highly recommend this host and every place he hosts.

Ngôi nhà hoàn toàn giống hình ảnh, chủ nhà hồi đáp rất nhanh chóng..
Vị trí cực kì trung tâm, nằm trong chung cư cafe nên mọi thứ đều thuận tiện
Thang máy có tốn phí nhưng chủ nhà đã để sẵn tiền trong nhà để mình chi trả, sẽ ghé tới lần sau nếu đến Sài Gòn
This stay was so cozy and comfortable! A great location, very secure, easy to come and go, and very affordable. Overall a very positive stay, I would definitely stay again in the future!

Căn hộ nhỏ xinh ở giữa trung tâm thành phố.
Cực kỳ thích hợp với ai muốn khám phá cuộc sống trong một khu chung cư biểu tượng của TP.HCM.
Khu vực lân cận có rất nhiều quán ăn ngon và các địa điểm tham quan, mua sắm.

Căn hộ nằm ở toà nhà trung tâm phố Nguyễn Huệ. Rất thuận tiện để đi tới các điểm tham quan,mua sắm. Nhiều nhà hàng, quán cafe hay ho ở ngay xung quanh toà nhà. Mình tới c/i muộn và các bạn sẵn sàng hỗ trợ,phản hồi kịp thời. Có dịp mình nhất định sẽ lại ghé đặt qua đây.
Thank you.

Địa điểm ngay trung tâm thành phố, thuận lợi cho việc đi lại mà không dùng tới phương tiện di chuyển, phòng rộng, sạch. Phong cách nhà local nên hợp lí với những người muốn trải nghiệm không gian mang tính địa phương.  Trả lời tin nhắn nhanh, mà phòng mới nên hơi thiếu 1 số thứ như dép đi trong nhà. Nhưng tiện nghi xung quanh nhà thì đầy đủ, an toàn.
vị trí đẹp rất dễ tìm, checkin dễ dàng, phòng ốc sạch sẽ. Mình sẽ còn quay lại lần tới!

Great location! Right on walking street in the iconic Coffee Apartment Building. The apartment has everything you need to feel right at home. We had a small issue with the wifi and the host was quick to get it resolved ASAP. The unit is on the second floor so no need to use the lift, which requires payment for use. If you are staying in HCM highly recommend!!

This location was amazing. The apartment was very spacious and comfortable. I was able to easily walk to nearby bars, restaurants and other stores. When I come back to HCMC I will definitely be booking this place again! I highly recommend

Great stay in District 1! The location was very convenient—close to everything I needed. Check-in was seamless and hassle-free. The host was responsive and helpful throughout the stay. Would definitely recommend this place to others visiting the area.
Home sạch sẽ, vị trí đẹp dễ tìm, giá cả hợp lý

This place is in the ideal location, inside the Cafe Apartments Mall. The room is more spacious than I thought, and it’s pretty clean (given Vietnamese standards for restroom). Please note if you have a lot of luggage, there is a charge to use the elevator (not by host, but the mall). The entrance also closes at 11pm-12am each day, since it’s a mall so disclaimer for your late night travels.

This apartment is in the famous cafe apartment on second floor right next to Poke Saigon .
It's near to many landmarks and has a Circle k (24/7) nearby. Overall it's a good place to stay for short stay but for long stay it can be too pricey because of its location.
Host provides quite a few amenities but place could use a little touch up and bathroom is quite small but for its price range it seems fair .

写真と壁紙の色が違いましたが、清潔感がありました。
リッチもよく使いやすかったです。

Great overall experience. Good communication and flexibility. I am quite sensitive to sound so there is some noise around the apartment, just don't expect absolute silence. But it was totally fine. Would rent again.

The apartment was perfect. I felt right at home. In a busy area, but surprisingly quiet inside. AC was amazing. The shower was hot. Everything was very clean. I would add a hot plate for cooking, but other than that no complaint. The host was very responsive. They answered me right away everytime I had a question. I highly recommend this place. I will be back in a few weeks and hopefully will be able to rent again!

The famous Cafe Apartments is located right in the centre of Saigon literally down the street from the the French-built town hall, around the corner from the Opera House, across the boulevard from the infamous Vietnam War-era Rex Hotel, down the street from the city's newest icon the Bitexco Tower and the Saigon River.
The apartment itself seems like the only available apartment that can be rented in the whole building making it a unique stay while the building is full of small restaurants/cafes.
The apartment is located on the second floor with great high ceilings and designed in a Studio/one bedroom layout, with kitchenette, small oven, fridge, wardrobes and great aircon. Bathroom is very small with a shower next to the toilet. Lounge. There were toiletries available. Balcony views are of a cramped alleyway. The only windows/natural light are from the front door.
The small elevator up costs 3000 Dong to use however I elected to walk up the 2 flights of stairs for the exercise.
Great host, friendly, quick communication, and very helpful. The building could be cleaner, and the lift requires payment to use.
I really like Nu apartment at Ben Nghe, walkable and very spacious. The host is very friendly. Really worth the price!
Apartment is on a great location, in a historic building, in the heart of the city. Great mattress, so I slept long and comfortable. Friendly host.

Très bon appartement très bien placé.
Les photos cependant doivent être changées car la peinture du mur n’est plus la même.(le mur bleu)
Mais sinon c’était un très bon séjour.
Perfect location at the center of nguyen hue street. Walkable to almost everywhere. Host is responsive and helpful. Will definitely come back here if im in HCMC next time.

Place is really convenient to all tourist spots! A clean apartment and responsive host. You can walk from the apartment to ben thanh for 10 minutes. Also host is very supportive on all requests. Thank you!

This studio is located right in Times Square walking street. It's on the 2nd floor facing the back. There's a Circle K right next door. Overall super convenient location. Only thing to note - the main gate to the building closes at 11 or midnight. There's a security guy that stays there so you need to wake up him to get in/get out when later than those times. Not a big deal but something to be aware of. Would stay again for the central location.
Lưu trú tốt, host thân thiện, hỗ trợ nhanh, nhiệt tình.
💯 recommended! Just inside the Café building, plus very spacious and clean!
We really enjoyed our stay and especially it’s location next to the walk-in street. It was really fun.

Giấy vệ sinh hơi dơ và bột, mình đi 2 người mà chỉ có 2 gói dầu gội và 2 gói sữa tắm thì hơi thiếu, khăn tắm thì k hút nước, ổ cắm ở tủ lạnh với tv chỉ có 1 ổ cắm, chỉ dùng dc 1 trong 2 cùng lúc, còn lại thì khá ổn, cô chủ tiệm gội đầu vs a giữ xe rất thân thiện :D
Chủ home thân thiện, luôn trloi tn rất nhanh và giúp đỡ nhiệt tình. Dưới tầng 1 có tiệm gội đầu massage rất ok nha. Vị trí home cũng ngay trung tâm nên rất thuận tiện đi lại
Home nhỏ, vừa phải và xứng với số tiền, hình ảnh đúng với thực tế và đáp ứng được những yêu cầu của khách.
Host rất thân thiện, hỗ trợ nhiệt tình. Phòng sạch sẽ, giống hình. Nếu có dịp quay lại Sài Gòn mình sẽ tiếp tục ở đây
Phòng sạch sẽ, thoáng mát, đầy đủ tiện nghi, được hỗ trợ từ chủ nhà. Vị trí căn nhà rất phù hợp để đi du lịch và công tác
Home sạch sẽ , ngay trung tâm , giá hợp lý , host dth
Chỗ ở sạch sẽ, giá cả hợp lí và vị trí thuận lợi để di chuyển nhưng nơi ở trung tâm

the place was really convenient and the host was responsive. it was a bit tricky carrying a big suitcase to the top floor since the elevator only goes up to the 3rd but the place had everything I needed. i'd still recommend it.
Anh chủ dễ thương, love you 3000!!!

First thing first, this is the first airbnb house in asia which didn’t provide clean drinking water-ps i’ve been travelling since april-. I open up this to host, and he basically said “bottled water is super popular in Ho chi minh. I don’t think this is the right attitude especially while people coming here to get rest and have good time. There were ants all over the place. And there is a distinct noticeable smell which disturbed me. I came very late and had to leave early in the morning. I was too tired to change the room and go another place or make complaints to airbnb. Room is super super small, i couldn’t even able to do morning body stretch(which you don’t need much space). And the ground was not clean. Towels were terrible, i don’t know what kind of material was it but it was unable to dry the water dipping from my body. Worst airbnb experience ever.
place was really nice and accessible. it's clean and the aesthetic is cozy. great place to stay in hcmc. i highly recommend. 🤗
The host is very friendly and the location of the property is good. I think it deserves a five-star rating.
地理位置好 房间干净舒服 隔音很好 很安静
Great deal, great location. Room is clean and have good amenities. Highly recommend.
합리적인 가격에 편리한 위치에 만족합니다.
very clean and tidy  place and very friendly easy to approach host
Great stay. Can't wait to go back.
Friendly host. Reasonable price
Good location for almost everything. Strongly recommend. Host is nice and helpful.
Overall, nice place for the price
좋은 방 가성비

Un super séjour !
La localisation est parfaite !
Phòng sạch sẽ, ấm cúng. Đầy đủ đồ dùng và rất mới nữa. A chủ cũng dễ thương và nhiệt tình lắm ạ 👍🏾 10đ
Ở chung với cô chú chủ nhà nhưng rất thoải mái. Nhà gần khu phố ẩm thực nhưng hẻm rất yên tỉnh. Cơ sở vật chất và nội thất tốt, sạch sẽ.  Rất đáng để trải nghiệm.
Chỗ ở yên tĩnh, dễ tìm, gần chợ, có thể linh hoạt trong ăn uống. Phòng sạch sẽ tiện nghi, rất thoải mái.

This was my second stay at Danh’s Airbnb, and once again, everything was spotlessly maintained and thoughtfully arranged. The space is clearly cared for with a high standard of cleanliness and comfort. Danh and his family were exceptionally kind and attentive; genuine hospitality that really stands out. Highly recommended.

こちらのお部屋での滞在は概ね快適でした。
お部屋の中の設備は掲載どおりで清潔でした。質問に対してのレスポンスも早く、コストパフォーマンスも高いお部屋でした。
ただし、場所が入り組んだところにありますので、タクシーが玄関まで来ることが出来ず、また、3Fですがエレベーターが無かったのでトランクを持って上がるのは大変でした(助けてもらえばよかったのでしょうが)。
ホテル生活のようなものを期待されている方にはお勧めしませんが、ベトナムローカルの生活を体験することを期待されている方にはお得だと思います。
excellent value for money. very nice unit. location is in the middle of one of the most densely populated areas of Saigon for a truly authentic experience

The instruction is clear. Since the house is located in a smaller alley not on the main road, some grab won’t pick you up on the spot so you have to walk for 1-2 minutes. Aunty and uncle are very lovely, friendly, and always there to help. The room is inside the host house but very private. The neighborhood itself is not as chaotic as another part of the city in my pov. Kudos for the host for having full amenities available.

Phòng rất mới, sạch sẽ và đầy đủ tiện nghi. Ban đầu mình cũng k nghĩ là sẽ ở chung với cô chú, nhưng mà cô chú rất dễ thương và nhiệt tình. Trải nghiệm rất xứng đáng, sẽ quay lại nhiều lần nữa. Bạn chủ cũng hỗ trợ rất nhanh nữa, 💯 điểmm

Our three-week stay at this Airbnb was absolutely wonderful, thanks to the incredible host and his lovely family. From the moment we arrived, they were welcoming, friendly, and quick to respond to any questions. Their helpfulness made our trip smoother and more enjoyable.
The property was exactly as pictured—stylish, spotless, and very comfortable. It’s clear a lot of care went into making it feel like a home away from home. We especially appreciated how well-equipped the space was—we had everything we needed.
The location was another highlight! Being close to District 1 made exploring the city super convenient. Free laundry and weekly cleaning during our stay were thoughtful bonuses that really stood out.
This was one of our best Airbnb experiences. The combination of a great space and genuinely kind hosts made our time truly special. We highly recommend this place to anyone looking for a comfortable, convenient, and welcoming stay.

Really one of the better Airbnbs that I've stayed in - super clean, minimalist, easy to access and extremely responsive host
The pics on the listing matched what we saw in real life
Although we reached around 4-5am in the morning, the area was already starting to hustle and bustle, and the host's family was so nice to welcome and guide us into our room.
Even though we came back late at night, accessing the residence was not an issue.
TBH, I'm very sensitive to smells and cleanliness of the room, but I really enjoyed my stay there as it was really really clean.
Additionally, the host offers laundry cleaning at a small fee, which we felt was reasonable as it was neatly folded by the time we reached back to the residence at night - save yourself time and effort from finding laundromats
Host was also very responsive, whenever I texted him, replies was always very prompt. Additionally, his family is always in the residence, so can always reach out to them if there's anything needed.

늘 호스트가 1층에 계셔서 안심. 거리와 달리 방은 매우 깨끗
위치는 전통시장 뒷골목으로 매우 활기참. 엘베는 없지만 몇 층 안 되니...
tốt
Wish we would have stayed longer. This Airbnb is an absolute gem and the cleanest accommodation we had in 3 weeks Vietnam. Awesome! District 4 is the best place to be. No overtoursism. Good job!!
Đã quay lại lần 2 và sẽ quay lại tiếp, đi bộ đến trung tâm gần, đồ ăn và vật dụng cá nhân cần thiết dễ tìm mua ở các cửa hành xung quanh. Mới phát hiện thêm 2 bà mèo ú nu nhưng chưa nựng được 🤣

Phòng mới, hệ thống làm mát tốt, nước mạnh, sạch sẽ nhưng mà cần để ý vệ sinh thêm phần dưới đệm ngồi của bồn cầu ạ. Chủ nhà phản hồi rất nhanh. Xung quanh đồ ăn và cửa hàng tiện lợi, hiệu thuốc rất nhiều. Thuận tiện cho việc đi lại. Sẽ quay lại

Nhà rất xinh va đẹp
Đồ dùng điện tử rat hiện đại
Gia Đình Khoa Danh rất tử tế, lúc nao cũng nhiet tình trong moi tinh huống.
Rat Vui khi ở cùng gd Khoa Danh
Phòng rất đẹp va đầy đủ Tiện nghi
Hi vọng co dịp lần sau ghé thăm
❤️❤️❤️👍
Bean

Nhà mới, mọi thứ đều mới và sạch sẽ. Đồ dùng trong nhà đều hiện đại. Phòng thơm và đầy đủ tiện nghi.
Chủ nhà rất thân thiện và luôn phản hồi thông tin nhanh chóng.
Mình đã có trảu nghiệm lưu trú tuyệt vời và sẽ quay lại nếu có dịp.
Near some great food locations
Fantastic hospitality, Very Fast Response as well from Khoa Dahn, highly recommended :)
호스트 Khoa Danh은 정말 친절하시고 방도 쾌적하고 불편함 없이 편안하게 잘 지냈습니다. 감사합니다
Chỗ ở sạch sẽ ngăn nắp và gọn gàng, mình rất ưng. Có thể chủ động check in check out linh hoạt. Chỉnh chu và chu đáo từng chút một nhé, rát đáng tiền
Amazing place ! Would 100% book again!
Đã quay lại lần 2. Vẫn oke như z. Sạch sẽ và thoải mái, mọi người nên ghé thử nha. Mới phát hiện thêm có 2 bà mèo béo ú, thích quá mà chưa nựng được 😂
gần trung tâm, giá ok, phòng sạch sẽ và bạn host rất nhiệt tình

Căn hộ nằm trong một khu đô thị đẳng cấp tại trung tâm Sài Gòn, Xứng đáng 5 Sao, thật tuyệt vời,  Chúng tôi đã có trải nghiệm tại căn hộ của bạn, xung quanh rất nhiều tiện ích, căn hộ đúng như mô tả trên nền tảng, chủ nhà nhiệt tình, rất chu đáo, Chúng tôi sẽ giơi thiệu cho bạn bè đồng nghệp khi đến công tác, có dịp công tác và nghỉ ngơi chúng tôi sẽ quay lại, Cảm ơn bạn rất nhiều.

Căn hộ đẹp như hình, sạch sẽ, thoáng mát, rộng rãi , vị trí ngay khu landmark81 có nhiều điểm vui chơi, chủ nhà nhiệt tình luôn giúp đỡ khi chúng tôi cần, chúng tôi đã có 1 kỳ nghĩ tuyệt vời tại căn hộ. Rất đáng tiền, chúng tôi sẽ quay lại và giới thiệu bạn bè sử dụng nó. Cảm ơn các bạn đã đón tiếp chúng tôi .

căn hộ sạch sẽ, vị trí thuận tiện đi lại, ngay khu trung tâm thành phố, gần quán ăn và quán cà phê cùng nhiều nhà hàng ngon. Chủ nhà thân thiện, phản hồi nhanh, nhiệt tình, hữu ích. rất đáng để ở. Phản hồi nhanh khi cần hỗ trợ. Lần tới tôi sẽ đến đây tiếp.
Chủ nhà phản hồi nhanh chóng, căn hộ sạch sẽ, gọn gàng. Đặc biệt view buổi nhìn ra Bitexco rất đẹp, thêm điểm cộng cho Chủ nhà. Sẽ quay lại. cảm ơn Jennifer rất nhiều.
Phòng tốt đầy đủ tiện nghi
good host. good place to stay.
Chủ nhà thân thiện, người hỗ trợ nhận phòng rất nhiệt tình và chủ động. Đã 3 lần ở đây và luôn hài lòng.
Chỗ ở dễ tìm, chú bảo vệ thân thiện, nhiệt tình hướng dẫn và giúp đỡ. Sẽ quay lại khi đến sài gòn ♥️
Được sự hướng dẫn nhiệt tình, chu đáo, thông tin chi tiết đầy đủ.
Được hướng dẫn nhiệt tình, không có bất cứ điều gì có thể than phiền được vì quá hoàn hảo
Phòng sạch, đẹp, tiện nghi. Bác bảo vệ ca sáng lẫn tối đều rất dễ thương, mình book gấp nhưng mọi thứ nhận được đều quá oki, chỉnh chu. Nhất định sẽ quay lại
Thanks bean. Great spot with lots of good nearby local food options, away from the tourist hustle

I unfortunately did not stay at this location, I booked for 12 days and when I arrived and took taxi - the driver said he could not drive in to this location and the taxi driver drove me around and around. I contact Bean and he said I have to walk 10m to get to the house. I canceled the Airbnb and was charged $126 dollars for service fee even though I didn’t stay there . I contact bean and told him I had canceled the place bc 10 minute walk to the house is too far and I don’t feel safe. We later talked realize we had misunderstanding. He meant 10 m=32 ft 9.701 in or 10 steps… not 10 mins - he was able to refund my full booking and I appreciate it. If I knew it was only 10 steps I would had stayed. Also think my taxi guy lied so he can drive around longer for fare fee

Unit was spacious and clean. Location was convenient

Host thân thiện, nhiệt tình, có quán cà phê ở tầng trệt ngon và rẻ. Nơi ở khá sạch sẽ, nhưng sẽ ổn hơn rất nhiều nếu phòng không có kiến và cách âm tốt hơn.
这个房源很干净 一尘不染 并且每两天有一次房间清洁 房间还有一个舒服的躺椅 并且顶楼还有免费的洗衣机和烘干机 顶楼有公共空间 可以和朋友一起吃饭聊天 房东回复非常及时，有什么需要帮忙的都能提供

i messaged them the same day i needed a place and they were very quick to assure me that a room would be clean and available. i also had a late check in and it was very easy to get in. i had a good stay.

Very well located, super quiet in busy Saigon in a small street. 7 Eleven is close by which is very convenient. Easy to get to the apartment via Grab - only 20 minutes from the airport. Nice coffee places around.

Very happy with my stay. The communication with the host was easy and uncomplicated. Place was quiet, safe, and clean! Happy to stay there again.

推荐！

Great place! There are plenty of restaurants nearby, a park within walking distance, and it’s close to tourist spots and more. The host is respectful, friendly, and very helpful. Definitely worth the price! ✨

lovely place to stay, by yourself or with friends. Mr Ly downstairs was very kind and respectful with sharing the spaces with us. Thu is very responsive and kind also. Minutes walk away from  main streets and popular areas. definitely recommend!!

IF you are traveling to HCMC & see this property- BOOK IT! I felt lucky I got to this place since the nearby hotels often hike their prices. This property is right at the walking distance of all the D1 goodies. My host Son was super responsive & professional. If I had to come back to HCMC- this is definitely where I will be staying.
とても安価で素晴らしい部屋です。近くにレストランもたくさんあり、コンビニもあってとても便利です。スタッフはとても親切なので、皆さんにおすすめします。

I had a good stay at Dans Wash and Stay. The place is as pictured and quite clean. Centrally located to some nice places. I came on a Saturday night and it was quite lively but that is to be expected anywhere really. It was very quiet for the rest of the week. Host is very professional and is looking to assist you. Room has a window that opens to a wall which allows ventilation. And another one that opens to the commons area. Great place especially for the price and location.

골목안에 위치해 있어 처음에는 약간 찾기가 어려웠으나 주변에 도보로 많은것을 경험할 수 있는 훌륭한 위치였습니다. 그리고 주변에는 훌륭한 음식점들과 바로 앞에 있는 산책가능한 공원까지, 처음 방문한 호치민에서 좋은 경험이 되었습니다!

The hosts were great, their place is very well located in the most happening area of the city. Benthan, Independence Sq, Skydeck, museum etc are walkable, Bui Vien St. was just the backdoor alley. The also have cute cafes and eateries around hosting people with all sorts of budget. The stay is exactly identical to the photos, the tariffs are reasonable for the location, and the hosts treat people well. I would be happy to visit again.
Home sạch sẽ, đơn giản. Gần Bùi Viện nên di chuyển rất tiện, có chỗ để xe máy. Chị chủ nhiệt tình và thân thiện.
Bui vien 중심가의 조용하고 안전한 숙소입니다. 편안하게 잘쉬고 갑니다! 재방문의사 있음

We had an amazing stay at this Airbnb! The place was immaculately clean, which made us feel comfortable and right at home. Its location within District 1 of Ho Chi Minh City was incredibly convenient, allowing us to easily explore all the nearby attractions.
The owner was exceptionally responsive and helpful throughout our stay, always ensuring that we had everything we needed. Their warm hospitality truly made our experience memorable.
This Airbnb is a hidden treasure and undoubtedly one of the best accommodations we've ever rented. We are sure to rent this place again for our next visit and highly recommend it to anyone looking for a fantastic stay in Ho Chi Minh City!

Ich bin mehr als zufrieden mit der Unterkunft gewesen. Alles verlief problemlos, von Check-In bis zur Kommunikation bis zum Check-Out. Super Lage und Gastgeber reagieren sehr schnell auf Anfragen etc. Die Unterkunft ist genau wie auf den Bildern beschrieben. Gerne nochmal. Vielen lieben Dank!
great apartment. perfect location and the self check worked flawless. it was super clean (a few stains on the sheets, hair in bathroom) but overall completely fine. AC also worked perfect

I loved staying here. This probably was my favorite place: clean, the neighborhood was excellent with lots of things to do and close to everything! Tones of restaurants and tour companies etc etc...
I hope I come back...

Cheap and cheerful, good bed, very clean. It’s a great location, safe and friendly down a quiet little lane but right in the middle of everything.  The keyless entry system was super helpful because my flight didn’t land until after 1am. Great communication throughout. There’s a little cafe just opposite the entrance. It doesn’t look posh but the food is really good.

I’m very low maintenance, but the week I stayed here, I struggled and ended up staying elsewhere for two nights. The location is right by the party street so that is convenient if you’re looking for that. I loved that 7/11, family mart and grocery store and bus stations were all steps away. The room had the bare essentials. Only one outlet with two plugs worked by the bed. The desk was small. The bed and bedding wasn’t very comfortable hence me staying elsewhere. Also the towels provided were dirty, one was the color of cream/grey and other had dark spots. Also the drain in the shower did not drain but the water pressure and heat were good. They did have extra towels and other things like toilet paper downstairs so that helped. I struggled with the outside lock and my room lock multiple times each time I entered. If I stayed for only a few nights like two, I would be fine. But if I were to stay longer, I’d look for other accommodations.
The room is clean. In the central area and very close to the place I need. Great experience

Stayed for the second time.  Was here last week and then went to hanoi/sapa.  Had a flight back from hanoi to hcmc and had 9 hours to kill before catching a bus to cambodia so i booked one night to sleep for a few hours.  As always, host was awesome, responded to questions almost right away, and room was spotless just as the first time.  I even had the same room!.
such a good deal for the price!!! host was super responsive and nice. really convenient to have to laundry on the first floor and there is LOTS to do around the area. place was so clean and spacious

This is my second time staying here, and it was just as enjoyable as the first. The location is ideal—quiet, yet only a 2-minute walk from Bui Vien walking street, with lots of nearby restaurants. The room is clean and comes with basic toiletries, free noodles, water, and bikes to use. The 3rd-floor room requires stairs, but it wasn’t an issue for me. It’s a great value for a comfortable and safe stay. Phuong, the host, is friendly and responsive. Highly recommended!
房间布置简洁，价格便宜，位置便利。缺点是床头柜上有灰尘，我已用纸擦了三遍，门锁不是很好用，洗澡热水很小，水量不够，如果把洗澡热水开到最大不会出水。希望能改善。
Very nice place to stay in Ho Chi Minh. Very clean and comfortable room
I had a problem with the air conditioner not working, but the owner responded in good faith even though it was late at night.

Hôm mình đặt nhà đang sửa nên hơi bụi. Tuy vậy phòng của mình thì khá sạch, đẹp hơn trong hình. Đặc biệt bạn nhân viên chăm sóc khách luôn phản hồi rất nhanh, còn cho mình check in sớm.
Vị trí nhà thì dễ tìm và rất trung tâm ngày gần chỗ mình họp.
Lần sau đi SG mình sẽ ủng hộ bạn tiếp

It was a great place for stays in HCM because the location is quite strategic near from everything. Also there's a family mart that open 24 hours so no need to worried. The place is huge very comfortable. The host is helpful and told us a clear instruction for any information. It was a good place to stays.
Great place to stay. Location near park, its good for jogging and other sports to start your day. Near food and other attractions. Host is very responsive. Recommended place to stay. 😊

this place is good if you want to be near the airport (20 mins away). The area has a great coffee shop and a Family Mart. Nearby it's their fitness park so that you can do some exercise if you feel like you eat too much. overall  a great place to stay

I recently stayed at this Airbnb, and it was an excellent experience. The room was exceptionally clean, well-maintained, and neatly organized. The attention to detail was evident, making it a comfortable and pleasant environment. The host's efforts to ensure a welcoming and tidy space did not go unnoticed. Highly recommended for anyone seeking a quality stay!
非常棒的入住体验，房间干净整齐，地理位置非常方便。最棒的是，你可以随时随地洗衣服！！！这个对来说太重要了！Nguyen非常棒，给我们很多旅游建议！

Very spacious and clean unit right in the center of town. You can’t beat this location — walking distance to the metro station, major sights, and lots of food choices. Hosts are also responsive and helpful. Highly recommend and will stay here again.

Anne's and Taylor's property is of of the best that we stayed in HCM. The location is just near Bhen Than and all the major malls like Saigon center and some tourist attractions. It's an old building, but it's very clean. They will also help you with your bags.
The unit is beautiful. A perfect place to just chill down , sleep, and do your laundry, especially after travelling for so long. Everything you need is in the unit. We initially booked for 3 nights, and we decided to extend for another 3 nights.
Anne and Taylor hosted us a couple of times from their other properties, and as always, they are very accommodating and among the best hosts.
We will stay again. Thank you, Anne and Taylor! YOU GUYS ARE THE BEST!
Extending my stay only means one thing, I’m happy with the place. Location and feels like home as always. Thank you Anne and Taylor! See you again soon.
Phòng sạch sẽ, decor xinh xắn, sẽ quay lại vào lần sau

Căn hộ nằm ở vị trí trung tâm, cực kỳ thuận tiện để đi lại và tham quan các điểm du lịch nổi tiếng ở Sài Gòn. Không gian sạch sẽ, gọn gàng. Nệm rất êm và wi-fi nhanh. Chủ nhà phản hồi rất nhanh và chu đáo. Rất hài lòng, xứng đáng 5 sao!
Căn phòng có rất nhiều ánh sáng. Mọi thứ rất dễ chịu.

Rất phù hợp cho ai muốn đến Sài Gòn du lịch hoặc tìm nơi chữa lành giữa Sài Gòn. Home rộng, thơm, đầy đủ tiện nghi, home còn chuẩn bị cả dây cột tóc, bông và nước tẩy trang,… cho các bạn nữa. Tinh tế 100 điểm.
Chị chủ home siêu đáng yêu, take care từ A đến Z. Sẽ còn quay lại đây nữa vì mọi thứ đều tuyệt vời 😭

Home siêu deth ấm cúng luôn. Những bạn thích phong cách minimalistic sẽ thích Meraki Cozi nhen. Chị chủ siêu deth và hỗ trợ tụi mình 24/24 🥹 3h sáng nt chị ấy vẫn trl và hỗ trợ tụi mình check out trễ nữa .
Yêu chị và Meraki Staycation Saigon rất nhìuuuu

Chủ home dễ thương và support rất nhiệt tình, mình để quên đồ home gửi lại mình nhanh chóng.
Phòng rộng sạch đẹp, sẽ thử qua căn ở quận 02 cho lần ở sau.

One of the best AirBnb we have stayed in so far! Great location right next to a main road and a coffeeshop nearby, cute and cozy decor, and the most wonderful host 🤍 Thank you for having us, we will be back!

This homestay was very cozy and I instantly felt comfortable staying there. It was just like the pictures on Airbnb. The staff was nice too, I had struggles to lock the door on my way out, but when I messaged them to help me they replied in seconds so I hadn’t had to wait.
The location was great, there was a Circle K, GS25 and Ministop where I could go whenever I needed it and several cafés nearby. Also I felt quite safe because right next to me was the police station of District 4.
I really liked to stay there, it’s recommended and I hope to get to stay there again ^^

Vị trí, chủ nhà và căn phòng đều tuyệt vời. Căn phòng xinh đẹp và rộng rãi hơn ảnh rất nhiều, từng chi tiết đều cho thấy Ngọc rất có gu và chăm chút cho căn hộ này.
Tôi yêu tất cả mọi thứ và sẽ giới thiệu căn hộ này.

Mình rất hài lòng với chuyến đi lần này. Chỗ ở vô cùng sạch sẽ và rộng rãi. Đi lại cũng thuận tiện vô cùng, xung quanh tiện ích đầy đủ nói chung không có gì để chê cả 🥰 Host Ngọc cũng rất nhiệt tình và thân thiện, các bạn nhân viên cũng thế. Lần sau có dịp vào SG mình sẽ lại book ở đây tiếp. Cảm ơn Ngọc và các bạn nhân viên nhé 🥰
虽然临街但是非常安静，我在这里呆了七天完成了期末考试。附近适合步行，有地道的越南餐馆。房间比照片上大！房东非常和善，会关心身体。（301的房门可以多加一个门阻器）

Nice house and you will get what you see in the pics !
In general, I love my stay here and the host Ngoc did pretty good job to maintain the room clean and comfortable, she was very nice allowed me to check in very late and prepared some bottle water for me .The location also good, you can take walk to some of the interesting places or coffee if you not mind the hot weather. maybe see you next time Ngoc !

Its the best airbnb i have stayed till date. Ngoc is very helpful and very friendly. She is a great host. The room is better than the description . I loved my stay and will recommend fellow travellers to choose this place if u confused about which place to get…its not noisy yet walkable distance from great olaces
Ngocs place was great, close to markets, restaurants and sight seeing. She was very helpful and always available to make my stay comfortable. it's was very pleasant to stay at Ngocs place.

友人と2人で4泊滞在させていただきました。
レビューで「Airbnbで一番良かった」と多くの方が書かれていたのを見て、期待して予約したのですが、その期待をさらに上回る素晴らしい滞在になりました！
お部屋は虫もおらず清潔感があり、シーツやタオルもとても綺麗で気持ちよく使えました。チェックイン時には冷えたペットボトルのお水を2本用意してくださっていて、その心遣いがとても嬉しかったです。
Wi-Fiは高速で、備え付けのテレビでは快適にYouTubeも楽しめました。クーラーだけではなく、扇風機も備えられていて助かりました。ホストの方のレスポンスも早く、丁寧で親しみやすい対応に安心して滞在できました。
シャワーの水圧が弱く、温度も時々冷たかったのですが、それを差し引いても本当に素敵なお部屋で、またホーチミンを訪れる際はぜひリピートしたいと思える滞在先でした。ありがとうございました！

It’s a rare moment during my years on Airbnb.
The photos made me decide to book this stay in the first place. But they cannot capture one thing: the feeling.
People said the feeling is the complex combination of many things, and for this one: the ambient light in the room shielding me from the cold hard rain outside; the decent scent welcoming me upon opening the door; the clean air with every breath. Together, they construct something simple yet profound: warmth.
The warmth on a busy street, in the heart of Saigon, on a raining day.
I find myself already eager for a return, soon.

Had a Great 5 Day stay with Ngoc , the room was very spacious with a big Bathroom . Everything was spot clean . The Bed was very comfortable . And I love that she had an Air purifier in her room which I prefer than open a window. The Location was perfect.
Underneath the Room they running and pawing a Burger Restaurant which is also really tasty.
Ngoc is a very sweet and super friendly Host. I will definitely stay next time at her Place again .
