Ngoc place is a great little find in a spacious room with large en-suite.
She was really helpful with some things I needed doing that relied on local knowledge.
Would definitely stay again.

Had a wonderful stay! Ngoc was a fantastic host — friendly, responsive, and made everything easy. The place was clean, looks bigger than on the photos and is in a great location. Would definitely stay again!

Wonderful experience, great host and apartment 10/10! Delicious burgers, very recommend double bacon onion 😍 Clean and stylish apartment, very big bathroom and TV, window on all wall, very cozy. I think it's the best option in quan 1. Stay at Ngoc's place second time for sure 😍
호스트가 친절합니다. 의사소통도 적극적입니다.  숙소는 고급스럽고 깨끗합니다. 사진과 똑같습니다. 넷플릭스도 이용할 수 있습니다. 주변엔 좋은 식당들과 커피숍들이  있습니다. 매우 만족했습니다. 301호에서 숙박했습니다. 다음  출장땐  201호를 이용해볼 생각입니다.
Ngoc was helpful and friendly. Went the extra mile even for laundry. Highly recommended place ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️.
下次来还住这里，房东人很好，沟通反应很及时，除了没电梯，一切都太好了！！
Very nice and spacious! Really is better in person than it is in pictures. 100% would recommend
很好的房子，房东有求必应，最后一天突发胃炎，Ngoc照顾了我并帮我送来了粥和药品，非常感谢
太喜欢这间民宿了！性价比极高！房东小姐姐热情好客，在我需要帮助的时候热心地给予我帮助。房间也特别干净整洁，卫生间空间也很大，整个给人宽敞明亮的感觉，住的非常舒服，各方面都无可挑剔，房子离着各个景点都很近，出行方便！来胡志明住在这里是最明智的选择！另外一楼餐厅做的汉堡一定要尝一尝，食材新鲜非常美味！我们一家人都非常喜欢！感谢房东的热情招待！祝您及家人健康快乐！好运连连！
이곳은 매우 훌륭합니다. 사진보다 더 넓은 공간이 있습니다.
Exactly what you see from the photos. Very convenient area nearby tourist attractions and convenience, yet quiet and peaceful day and night.

Ngoc's place turned out to be such a gem! It was so well-furnished, clean and spacious the photos don't do it justice. It was also very well-located, in district 1 surrounded with lots of great food choices (it was only 2-3 mins walk from this delicious banh mi place called banh mi thanks, as well as lots of other food choices like pho, and even really nice bars. It's also just a few mins walk to the main shopping street in district 1 (i went crazy shopping here) and just a 2-3 min bike ride to the party streets (so you won't be bothered by the noise at night).
I will definitely be booking this place again when i come back to ho chi minh !! great value for money, super comfy/cosy/clean/spacious and amazing location. LOVE IT !!! Thank you Ngoc for a great stay :)
Room look exactly like the pictures and was very clean with a very good smell. Location was great, walkable to many other places. Definitely recommend!
The place was clean and right in the centre, very convenient to reach. The host was polite and responsive.
Tuyệt vời 💯

I was satisfied with the place. Why should I complain when the price was reasonable, that is, it's proportionate to what I paid for. In addition, the essentials I needed during my stay were within reach (e.g. fast food/restaurant or food stalls, mini-mart, bank, market, transportation, etc. Most importantly, I'd commend John because he's a great host; he's helpful and responsive.
非常实惠、温馨又充满用心的一间民宿。房东 John 热情周到、有求必应，房间干净整洁，设施齐全细致，处处体现用心。虽然空间不大、价格实惠，但体验非常棒，装修风格也很喜欢。这是一个充满温度的地方，希望以后还有机会再次入住，遇见 John！

the place is nice and  clean.  liked the extension cord in the room and the host is responsive. the bed is big. there is a convenience store near the area. the place is quiet except for the neighbors birds at around 5am.

Hallo,
wir sind zu zweit angereist und hatten direkt keine probleme mit dem findender Wohnung, so wie das einchecken.
John Hai,war sehr freundlich bei unserer begegnung.
Das Zimmer sowie auch das Bad waren super!
Außerdem ist John Hai uns entgegengekommen mit dem Geld als wir früher abgereist sind und hat uns den Tag zurückerstattet.
Alles in allem hat es super funktioniert und wir würden es direkt weiter empfehlen.

We loved our stay with John! This room is tucked away through an alley making it super quiet even though you’re on a main road close to everything you could need. John was quick to respond during our stay and answered all the questions we had for him! We wish we could have stayed longer!
Chủ nhà nhiệt tình, hướng dẫn rất dễ tìm. Giá hợp lý cho 1 đêm ở Quận 1. Phòng nhỏ xinh dễ thương, yên tĩnh

John was very pleasant to communicate with and answered all my questions promptly and even gave me some recommendations regarding the area. Check-in was smooth and the room was clean and comfortable, and the area was close to the center yet still quiet and peaceful.

Very good location, easy to check in and John is very helpful and friendly with everything you need.
The bathroom is outside the room, if you don’t read the description you will miss this information.
The kitchen is very helpful with the utensils, we could cook our meals easily.
Thanks John

It’s such a great place to budget traveller. Very afforable! It’s very near to tourist attractions such as Ben Thanh Market, Bui Vien walking street, Nguyen Hue walking street, water bus reviverbank. The room is clean and private, having private toilet inside. The host is pretty nice and friendly. I would book again if I’m back to HCM City again.

Room was incredibly affordable. The place was spotlessly clean and well-maintained, which made for a very comfortable stay. The location is super convenient, it’s close to everything you might need, including Bui Vien street, shops, restaurants, and public transport. The best part was the host, who was incredibly friendly and supportive throughout my stay. I would highly recommend this homestay to anyone looking for a budget-friendly place to stay!

I had a wonderful experience staying at this homestay! It was incredibly affordable, especially for the quality provided. The place was spotlessly clean and well-maintained, which made for a very comfortable stay. The location is super convenient—it’s close to everything you might need, including shops, restaurants, and public transport. The best part was the host, who was incredibly friendly and supportive throughout my stay, always ready to help with anything I needed. I would highly recommend this homestay to anyone looking for a budget-friendly place to stay!
John was very friendly and made for an easy and enjoyable stay.

Good price/performance. Near center, very convenient. The host is very helpful and friendly.
This is suitable for budget travelers, so don’t expect fancy things. Overall, im satisfied
Good place to crash for a night. Great value. If you just need a bed and bathroom it’s a good route to go. Rooftop patio had laundry up and was really usable but other than that - great!

The accommodations matched their description (clean cozy room, AC, hot water) , and John was very welcoming and friendly.
This was a pleasant stay, which I recommend to anyone looking for a place close to the city center, with some privacy.
Le logement était conforme à la description, bien situé et avec un bon rapport qualité-prix. Je recommande pour des séjours de courte durée !

Sehr gut und sehr zentral. Einfach zu finden und man kann seinen Scooter parken. In der k
Küche ist alles vorhanden und die Klimaanlage funktioniert perfekt. Alles wie beschrieben würde wieder kommen :) der Gastgeber ist sehr freundlich
We had a great stay here, thank you!

The room was okay, but the bed was a little bit hard and had some stains. I also noticed a lot of dust under the bed, which was a bit off. The bed is too big giving small space to move. The stairs were extremely narrow, which made it difficult for me as a solo female traveler to carry all my heavy bags up to the 5th floor. In fact, my luggage got damaged because of it.
One unusual thing was that the toilet and bedroom were separate rooms. The toilet was connected to the kitchen, which was a shared space. This meant that when taking a shower, I couldn't just walk back to my room in a towel, as someone might be in the kitchen. It was a bit inconvenient and made me feel uncomfortable.
In terms of maintenance, the place could definitely use some fresh paint, and the kitchen and fridge were in need of a good cleaning.
Despite these issues, the location was great and the price was very affordable. I'm hopeful that the host will address these concerns to ensure the comfort of future guest.
I had an urgent schedule, so I stayed for a short time. Thanks to the host who willingly changed it, I returned home and finished my work well.

For all Moslem Indonesian tourist, i really rekomen this place untuk kalian yang mau berwisata di Saigon. Dekat penginapan ada makanan halal untuk pagi & siang dan masjid (jarak 300 meter). Ke ben thanh market jaraknya cuma 1 kilo yg bisa ditempuh dengan berjalan kaki. Lingkungannya adem, transport online banyak. Deket minimarket dan ada dapurnya. Jadi utk kalian yg mau stay halal untuk makanan bisa masak sendiri disini. (Biar lebih menjaga halal bisa bawa alat makan & pan mini utk masak). Host nya enak diajak komunikasi dan sangat solutif. Aku diberi izin nyuci baju juga. Jgn lupa habisin malam hari di bui vien street. Ke opera house pun menurutku ga jauh ya, mah bisa ditempuh jalan kaki, gak berasa krn sambil ngobrol. Tp balik lagi ke preferensi kalian yaaa.
Good
호스트 친철하고 가성비 좋은곳 입니다.
コストパフォーマンスに優れていた。オーナーとの連絡もスムーズでした。

Quy trình nhận phòng linh hoạt, nhanh chóng. Phòng có muỗi dù không mở cửa sổ. Có sự sai sót về mô tả tiện nghi gia vị bếp, mình đã nhắn tin nhưng không nhận được thời gian phản hồi là bao lâu, sau khi đợi không có phản hồi mình phải chủ động gọi cho sđt liên hệ booking. Tuy là có giải quyết nhanh cho mình nhưng trải nghiệm lần đầu nên khá thất vọng. TV là truyền hình cáp, tuy nhiên remote không mở được, các bạn hỗ trợ thay pin, thay remote mở lên thì TV bị lỗi.
Tóm lại, trải nghiệm lần đầu ở đây hơi thất vọng, nhưng cũng không phải quá tệ.

Very responsive host. Place was slightly difficult to reach because the taxi dropped me at the wrong location. But the host was very helpful. Helped me early check in as well. The apartment is as described and clean and has an amazing wifi connection and good work table etc. But the place has a tired look all over and some mould in the bathroom ceiling. The location is great, close to a lot of eateries and bars. The neighbourhood comes alive in the evenings. Overall a good stay!

Spacious, quiet place in a great location close to bars and restaurants. Place was clean and building was secure with a security guard located at the entrance at all times. WiFi was good and having a kitchen with a fridge was a huge bonus for us. We will stay again if we come back to the area.
Chỗ ở thuận tiện, sạch sẽ, đầy đủ tiện nghi. Xung quanh nhiều chỗ ăn chơi thú vị. Chủ nhà và các bạn hỗ trợ rất nhiệt tình. Sẽ quay lại nữa
Phòng tương đối sạch, nhưng trong phòng quá nhiều muỗi mặc dù không mở cửa sổ hoặc mở cửa phòng! Trong phòng tắm thường xuyên không có nước nóng!
chỗ ở sạch sẽ đầy tiện nghi cùng với dịch vụ nhận và trả phòng linh hoạt. Luôn phản hồi lập tức
Chổ ở sạch sẽ, tiện nghi, phản hồi của chủ nhà rất nhanh, mình sẽ quay lại khi có dịp ghé sài gòn

Hôte réactif et sympa.
Très bon emplacement, entre 10 et 20 min en voiture des lieux d’intérêt, à 25-30min en voiture de l’aéroport.
Un agent de sécurité à l’entrée du bâtiment très gentil et serviable.
Quelques visites inopinées d’insectes : fourmis (attention à ne pas laisser de nourriture ni miettes elles arrivent très vite) et 1 cafard dans la salle de bain après la pluie, mais sinon ça allait.
Des cafés, restaurants et bars à quelques mètres.
Je recommande car niveau qualité prix c’est super, et pour l’emplacement aussi.

Nice stay! AC worked well. WiFi would go in and out but the people who managed this place on-site were really nice. They also did one load of laundry for the 5 day stay. The TV didn’t work for us but they did try to come fix it but we weren’t home that often for someone to fix. Would still need to grab or walk 30 min to city center. Some bars and food downstairs though!
Ben was a great host. The room was really nice to stay in. I look forward to staying in there again. The location was awesome! It had everything I needed.
nơi ở rất tốt , tôi đã có 1 kỳ nghĩ tốt khi ở đây
It was a cozy apartment room and  we really enjoyed our stay. Host was pretty responsive and helpful.

Quite good overall. Friendly staff, good location for traveling and sleeping.
But, there is still lots of ants crawling on the bed and TV hasn't been fixed after required
The team at Auhome dealt with any queries very quickly, and laundry and weekly cleaning were free during the stay. Internet worked well for anyone who is working online while in Vietnam.

The place matches the price. A small issue happens with the fridge and the water heater. The internet is quite slow but works. Overall everything is still good. The location is near to several late night restaurants.

Really enjoyed my stay! It's a great price for thus location, there are lots to do within walking distance. There's also free parking in the basement, which was great when I had a visitor! The room itself is a great space too. Would definitely come again!
One of my favorite areas and places to stay in saigon.
For the price offered its a superb place, they provide a laundry service for free!

Nous avons passé un très bon séjour chez Ben.
Il répond très rapidement à toute nos questions. Le logement est proche de commerces et d'arrêts de bus. C'est très bien desservi.
Nous recommandons vivement !!
Great small place to stay, great price, great host.
4.9/5 Great Host! Nice Place!
Great place, I would stay again!
Highly recommend!
Quiet and nice place to stay
Phòng siêu mới, Host cũng hướng dẫn mình rất kỹ, phòng có thể tự check in nên rất tiện cho những khách bay muộn. Dưới tầng 1 có ngay 1 tủ bán nước tự phục vụ nên rất tiện.
地理位置很好，房间卫生舒适，提供了厨具可以简单的烹饪，房间里还配备了洗衣机。房东回复迅速，强烈推荐。

Chủ nhà thân thiện, phản hồi nhanh chóng và chi tiết. Thêm vào đó, nhận phòng dễ dàng và sạch sẽ, mọi thứ y hệt như những gì mình đã coi trên thông tin về chỗ ở.
Về phần máy chiếu và kem đánh răng thì mình thấy tương đối ổn, nếu chủ nhà cải thiện thêm sẽ rất tuyệt.
Btw, highly recommended cho mọi người nhé 💕💕
Có vài rắc rối nhỏ nhưng chủ nhà đã hỗ trợ mình nhiệt tình, rất biết ơn sự hỗ trợ của bạn, mình sẽ đến đây lần sau nữa nhé

Sạch sẽ, yên tĩnh, đầy đủ tiện nghi, phòng tuy hơi nhỏ nhưng cũng đủ dùng, host thân thiện và phản hồi rất nhanh.
Địa điểm gần trung tâm và xung quanh nhiều shop để đi shopping, giá phòng phải chăng 💯

Phòng vừa vặn, sạch sẽ, ngăn nắp. Đồ đạc còn rất mới.
Giường sạch sẽ không một miếng bụi (mình từng trải nghiệm những nơi để phòng bụi do lâu ngày không có khách); chủ nhà để ý những chi tiết nhỏ chu đáo như bàn chải, kem đánh răng, lược, gương, dầu gội đầu thảo mộc rất thơm. Hướng dẫn vào nhà, sử dụng locker đều có hướng dẫn chi tiết, dễ hiểu.
Xung quanh nhà là gần chợ, có nhiều quán cà phê, quán ăn thú vị,... mình tính trải nghiệm chạy bộ ngoài công viên kênh Nhiêu Lộc nhưng *** quá phải quay về đi vòng vòng trong hẻm, dù vậy vẫn an toàn và thú vị.
Cảm ơn chủ nhà nhe

Hai is such a sweet host who is so responsive and clear in her communication. Just like others’ feedback, the place is superbly clean, especially the bathroom and bed. I stayed there for a work trip and it feels just the right place for me to decompress and have quiet time for work. If i have other work trips in the future, i would definitely book Hai’s place again! Thank you Hai!

Spicehome is absolutely spotless. We stayed in two rooms over four days and they were immaculately clean. The location is about 15 minute drive from tourist attractions and in the middle of a local market, it’s amazing to see daily life. Hai was helpful and quick to respond to all questions we had

- Chủ homestay rất nhiệt tình, thân thiện và dễ thương. Luôn tận tình hỗ trợ và phản hồi giải đáp rất nhanh chóng. Nhiệt tình hỗ trợ và hướng dẫn.
- Homestay sạch sẽ tiện nghi, decor rất là đẹp. Homestay nằm trong hẻm yên tĩnh và cũng gần các cửa hàng tiện lợi.
- Phòng ốc sạch sẽ, thơm tho, đầy đủ đồ dùng và thoáng đãng. Phòng tắm riêng sạch sẽ và rộng rãi, có nước nóng để sử dụng.
- Khu vực bếp chung có cả máy giặt và sấy, dụng cụ ăn uống đầy đủ, có cả tủ lạnh chung và khu vực ăn uống trong nhà cũng như ngoài trời.
- Gửi xe trong nhà đảm bảo an toàn và rộng rãi.
- Điểm cần cải thiện duy nhất là máy chiếu hơi mờ và mạng đôi khi hơi yếu.
Tổng quan là 4.7/5, chắc chắn sẽ ghé lại ❤️

I booked 6 nights there. First night had issue with some noise from neighbor across from me but it was settled after person checked out following day. Overall it was a good stay. I chose this location because it was close to my Aunt’s house and friend’s place . The location worked out perfectly for me in this case.

I had the pleasure of staying at Hai's apartment, and it was a wonderful experience. Hai was an incredibly attentive and helpful host, always responding promptly to any questions or concerns I had. The apartment was not only beautiful but also spotless and well-equipped. I highly recommend Hai's place and would gladly book with him again!

The room was super clean, and there was a Circle K downstairs, as well as a market during the day where we could buy food. However, it was not noisy at all—perfectly peaceful in a lively area. Host Hai was always quick to respond to our needs. I fell ill during the trip, and Hai proactively recommended a nearby hospital and even helped me make contact. I’m very grateful for Hai’s help throughout this journey.
Quá trình nhận phòng rất dễ dàng vì host hướng dẫn rất cụ thể, ngôi nhà nằm trong hẻm cụt rất yên tĩnh. Highly recommend

Der Check in ist flexibel (rund um die Uhr- selbst Check in) und gut beschrieben. Die Lage ist sehr ruhig, weil es in einer Seitenstraße liegt. Dennoch sind Restaurants etc. in der Gegend. Hai ist sehr freundlich. Es war etwas warm im Zimmer, jedoch funktioniert die Klimaanlage gut.  Es war alles sehr sauber und das Zimmer hat eine tolle Ausstattung. Zusammenfassend eine tolle Unterkunft!

The location is exactly as shown in the photos—charming, cozy, and impeccably clean. The atmosphere is inviting and perfect for relaxation, making it an ideal getaway. Furthermore, the host is very friendly and exudes warmth, creating a welcoming environment that makes you feel right at home. 🥰❤️🫶🏻
Homestay sạch sẽ, chị chủ dễ thương, nhiệt tình, sẽ ghé lần sau
Đã ở 2 chỗ của chị luôn. Chỗ nào cũng okeee. Chắc chắn sẽ quay lại :3

Overall, our stay at Hai's place was really nice and price worthy! ☺️
We were assigned in Room #222, which is the topmost room in the house. Although there is no elevator, Hai carried our luggages for us which I appreciated so much.
Location is near convenience store and other coffee shops, restaurant and local non-food shops.
With regards to our room, the interior is very nice and perfect for us. When we arrived, the place is very clean and smells really nice. The common space is also very clean and complete with everything.
If I come back to HCMC, I'd definitely choose Hai's place again ☺️😍

Great location, close to everything so would save you a lot of cost to travel around. Host is very responsive and helpful. However they don’t have elevator so think twice if you have heavy luggage. Otherwise, great value for the stay.

We had absolutely nooo problemes during our stay. Hailed was open minded and super friendly. She also provided help caused to an delayed bag back from an airport who should have send to Vietnam, before our arrival.
Will come back on my next trip to Vietnam.
#puplictransports
#localmarket
#supermarket
#bubbletea
- are all nearby
:>
Phòng mới, sạch sẽ và anh chị chủ rất nhiệt tình

My second visit to Ho Chi Minh City for the last three weeks, and all I can say about this place is worth every paid pennies. I feel like home when I first walked into the house. Spacious living room and kitchen with full equipment for a business or leisure trip, or even a family trip. The host is very responsive, and helpful. Highly recommend.
Host is superb! you will never be disappointed staying at Hai's place!
Chỗ ở rất ấm cúng

Place is good for the price but projector in our room wasn’t of any use as it cannot project anything on the distance it was fixed. Room was filled with ants or termite here and there. Over all the experience was good. Rooms are on 1 and 2 nd floor there is no lift if you have heavy luggage kingly request for 1st floor preferably. Host attitude was great though checkout was really strict though she allowed us long enough in waiting area. 🙂 it was a happy experience excluding Ants / Termite issue ( I had few red bumps on my legs in morning )
Chỗ ở rất yên tĩnh

My friend had a 3-week trip in Vietnam, and near the end of it, we found this lovely place with a fully equipped kitchen (not just the bare minimum like many other spots). If you’re looking for a place that feels like home, don’t hesitate to choose this one. I just wish we had found it at the beginning of the trip
I booked the apartment for a friend visiting Vietnam and stayed 3 nights there.  Apartment was clean and quiet with nice convenient store and coffee very close. It was perfect.
No complaints. Very well equipped appartment.
Amazing place, possible to rent bike, welcome beer...
Nice place to stay.

The host was an extremely nice and friendly person. He assisted so well with any request I had. He helped me a smooth check in and check out also. I really love the bed, was so so comfy. I love the location, with lots of eateries next door. Definitely recommend and will definitely consider to return when I am in town again! Don't hesitate, Book it ! :)
Chủ nhà thân thiện, liên hệ qua app phản hồi nhanh

The stay inside was a dream, perfect in terms of amenities and comfort. The place is located in a very crowded and messy place. There are a lot of meat vendors in the entire street, adding to noise, smell and a lot of dirty puddles to get through. There is not a lot of space for a car to get through to drop you at the location.

The hosts were really nice and helped us a lot. The house itself is located in a pretty busy area but is close to the city center. The room was clean, with modern interior and stylish furniture.
Thank you, I loved it 💕
房间很干净，房东很热情贴心，房东妈妈非常温柔贴心。女孩子一个人入住也完全没问题，住的地方非常靠近居民区，比较本土化。
Phòng đẹp, sạch sẽ, riêng tư. Bố mẹ bạn host nhiệt tình, dễ thương.
The place was great for a short stay.  The room was new and clean, and the host was very friendly  :)
The host is very flexible , and accommodating. Make me felt right at home. Will definitely stay again in the near future.
Chỉ tiếc là k book thêm để nghỉ ở đây , mình thấy rất ổn

a cozy accommodation located in an alley away from the chaotic noise of Ho Chi Minh. I was able to rest well whenever I got back from a day of sightseeing. Khoa's family were welcoming throughout my stay but never intruded in any way. Any questions I had were quickly answered. A nice alternative if you dont want to stay in district 1. It's a 15-20 minute to district 1 if you do want to be relatively near the d1 nightlife.
很棒的體驗，特別是房東跟房東的家人，服務很熱情而且親切，因為我有騎車，也提供很安全的停車空間，住宿環境很安靜，值得推薦。
I stayed again, He and his family are really kindness, room is new clean, beside seafood street and can walk to District 1, Thank you for stay memorial days.

I had a wonderful stay at this Airbnb located on Doan Van Bo Street in District 4, Ho Chi Minh City. The apartment was clean, stylish, and exactly as described in the listing. The space was cozy and well-equipped with everything I needed — a comfortable bed, strong Wi-Fi, and a modern bathroom.
The location was ideal — just a short ride to District 1, but tucked away enough to enjoy a quieter, more local vibe. There were lots of local eateries, convenience stores, and coffee shops nearby, which made exploring the neighborhood really fun and convenient.
The host was super friendly and responsive. They provided clear instructions for check-in and were available to answer any questions throughout my stay. I especially appreciated the small touches like bottled water, toiletries.
Overall, I highly recommend this place if you’re visiting HCMC and want a mix of comfort, local charm, and easy access to the city’s hotspots.

The room is located on the 2nd floor of the owners house. To reach it you have to walk through the living room. The owner is super nice and very friendly, she gave us some recommendations for food and supplied us with water. You’ll find a lot of good food options just outside of the door.
If you want to go to District 1 it’s a 20 minute walk, or you can just book a grab or take the bus.
All in all we had a very good stay and would highly recommend to stay here as well

Overall super great place. The host was really responsive and supportive. He offered to carry my (super heavy) luggage up and downstairs. I had a tiny problem with hot water in the first day but it was quickly resolved :) highly recommend this place
這是我住過最舒服的房間之一。裝修十分精緻。只是需要步行大概200米的路，對面就是市集。總體值得！性價比拉滿
phòng ở riêng tư, thoáng mát
Chủ nhà siêu thân thiện, tốt bụng, tâm lý và nhiệt tình, luôn phản hồi liên lạc của mình rất nhanh, siêu linh hoạt hỗ trợ checkout muộn, phòng nghỉ cũng tiện nghi và sạch sẽ
The room is fresh and clean 👍

The place was clean and nice
Recommended!
Tout était parfait, a l’expérience du vacarme causé par la construction/réparation effectuée (de 8AM À 17PM) à l’intérieur du logement ont perturbé mon séjour.
Khoa is very helpful and friendly. The place is quiet and private. Spacious bathroom is a plus. There is no lift so it’s a bit inconvenient if you have too much luggage.

Das Zimmer war super, der Gastgeber war überaus freundlich und hat spontan und rasch reagiert auf Wünsche.
Sehr flexibel.
Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt und können es gerne weiterempfehlen!
Auch das graue Zimmer, welches wir für einen weiteren Tag gebucht haben ist toll gewesen.
Good

Phòng rất đẹp và sạch sẽ. Phòng khá rộng so với mình tượng tượng.
Chắc chắn sẽ quay lại.
Great host cute property
中心地に位置しており、どこに行くにも便利な場所です。部屋も綺麗で快適に過ごせました
房间住的很舒服，环境卫生，出行方便😊

Stayed at this location for about a week. Located in a apartment (Resgreen) which is safe for nighttime checkin. The place is nice and neat with mostly daily utilities is available for renter. Also noted that you going to share the place with the host but it wasn’t a big deal since they really nice couple and they not staying at the place most of the time. So definitely recommended!
Quá đã

Căn hộ ngay trung tâm quận Tân Phú bao bọc xung quanh rất nhiều các quán ăn đủ loại và tiện lợi. Phòng nhỏ gọn xinh đối diện ngay wc trước cửa nên thuận tiện, ước gì wc ở bên trong phòng thì sẽ hoàn hảo hơn. Hồ bơi trong khu siêu sạch , nhưng với mức giá thì quá tuyệt vời để nghĩ ngơi trong 1 nơi an ninh và đầy đủ tiện nghi
Очень красивая комната, шикарный вид, отдельный санузел, приватная комната в общей квартире, вид компенсирует
Definitely recommended!
Everything was great, the room as cozy as your home. And the view in the room is so beautiful.
Good stay

Hey I would write a book if I need to describe the apartment literally, but this is the place that you want to be in if you are looking for calm, safety, privacy, nice balcony with strong AC and fast Wifi, it is close to attractions by grab.
The host is very reactif and respond to you in seconds not even minutes, It will be no brainer to come back here next time in HCMC.
Thank you so much for all and keep it up :).
이 가격에 이 정도 퀄리티 숙소를 찾는 것은 쉽지 않습니다. 1군과 거리가 멀다는 단점이 있으나 오히려 번화가와 가깝지 않아서 조용하고 편하게 쉴 수 있다는 장점이 더 부각되는 거 같습니다. 다음번에도 호찌민에 오게 된다면 또 방문 할 거 같아요

호스트의 친절하고 유용한 안내 덕분에 편하게 쉬다가네요. 직원인 타오 역시 잘 대해 줘서 고마웠어요.
주변환경이 조용해서 쉬기에는 좋은 숙소입니다. 사이공의 관광명소와는 거리가 있지만 그랩이 있으니 문제가 되지는 않았어요.

Great place to stay. The apartment looks like in the pictures and is a very good deal for the price. The neighborhood is quiet and safe. The host is very accommodating, helpful and responsive (which tends be rare in Vietnam so it's very appreciated!!). Definitely recommended place to stay.
Chỗ ở hợp lý, giá cả tốt. Sẽ quay trở lại lần sau

Unfortunately, I ended up leaving early and not completing my stay after my second day of waking up with ants in my bed and finding 2 roaches in the kitchen the night before. The host was very communicative and friendly which I really appreciated. When I told them about the ants I found in bed with me the first morning, they sent someone to clean the floor and change the bedding. The ants just happened to be very stubborn and they returned right away. Finding 2 roaches on the kitchen counter the night before I left was essentially the thing that made me realize I just couldn't do it anymore. I'm very grateful that the guy who did the cleaning left some bug spray behind when I asked him to
Spacious, warm and cozy place with full of amenities. The host is friendly and responsive. Highly recommended.
The location is highly convenient with easy access and direct car entry. Complimentary water and beer are also provided, adding a thoughtful touch to the overall experience
非常好！房东特别热情，各种各种设施设备齐全！
Host is friendly and responsive. The place is peaceful, full-equipped.
Far surpassed what I expected, absolutely worth every cent
Friendly owner and staff. Would visit again
Great place to stay
Good
Thank you for being very responsive.
Everything was ok, but the air conditioner wasn’t cold.
good
Một không gian tốt để trải nghiệm🥰
The same feelings as the last time i was here, best location, clean, i had a great time here, thanks for all
wonderful cozy place with everything you need. I felt right at home!! it's a home away from home!!
IGO place is nice and near many touristy sites. Thank you
Host rất thân thiện và nhiệt tình. House rất chill và rất ấm cúng nheee 🫶

Just loose a star because we asked for an extra keycard to allow in and out because there was two of us and also the towels were so so small for the shower. The shower wasn’t the best also. But comfy bed and cool design

房间位于胡志明市中心范五老街附近一个巷子里，不靠路边，所以完全没有马路上汽车和摩托车的声音，非常安静。房间的家具是不同风格的组合，用起来都很不错。我们是因为那张大桌子可以两个人一起处理工作的事情，特意选了这间房间。大桌子用起来真的很不错👍。床和沙发也很舒服👍。
这间房间唯一的小问题是，卫生间没有卧室的部分那么精致和完美，当然基本的功能没有问题，热水也非常好。只是卫生间整体相对房间要简单一些。跟房主进行了沟通，房主表达了会尽力改善。
总的来说，在胡志明的市中心，如果你想白天惬意的步行去很多景点，吃各种美食，晚上又想睡个安静的好觉，这里绝对是性价比最优的选择。
感谢房东给我们提供了这么美好的选择，让我们度过了舒适、愉快的三天。

cant really complain much about the place. Probably just the vent for the toilet blows out to the main stairwell, which there's a cafe below which to me its funny as heck!
not bad place to stay if you take grab car and know the roads, you can avoid the very bad traffic areas.
Một nơi tuyệt vời và đáng để quay lại. Matcha ở quán coffee bên dưới rất rất ngon.
房间的风格温馨而有特色，位于市中心的闹市区，却又十分安静，楼下咖啡店的抹茶拿铁非常好喝，店员们都十分友好，是一次极佳的住宿体验

The room was beautifully designed and very comfortable. There is a cafe on the ground floor which brings a cosy vibe.
Google maps/grab cannot direct perfectly to this location but the host gave helpful directions beforehand.
I recommend this place if you want to stay in a busy not too touristy area but close to everything.
优秀的地方，地理位置优越，位于市中心，楼下有很多咖啡厅和美食街，房东热情周到，房间很大很宽敞，我在这里住的很舒服，如果再来西贡，我一定会再次入住
Great place, responsive host, central location. I'd stay here again next time I'm in Saigon. Thank you!

Virgo's place was exactly as pictured in the listing.
He was friendly and responsive, and very flexible with check-in/check-out times.
He kindly let us leave our luggage at his cafe after check-out while we explored and waited for our flight, which was a huge help.
Virgo offered great recommendations, and we especially loved his cafe – the matcha was the best we’ve ever had!
The interior design of the property was well thought out with stylish furniture.
The only thing to note is that the shower’s drain was slow, causing a puddle while showering. It was manageable.
Overall, we had a wonderful stay and would definitely return!
One of the best AirBnB i have stayed
A really nice place just above a coffee shop in a perfect location in hcmc. I would recommend staying here to any other traveller's.

Very cozy place with great location, look just like in the photo, unfortunately upon on our arrival the toilet really smelled badly and it wasn’t flushed so it had really strong urine smell, could solve that with one flush from me. I know, but the smelled was still there, just less stronger, even after 4 nights of my stay. I also need to mention that bathroom has strong chlorine smell too. But other than that It was nice place to stay, close by to good Phở place, also near Circle K, and very easy and cheap to get to walking center, it only cost 15k Đông (0.50 USD) with Grab Bike to get to city center. Anyway I have to give kudos to owner’s projector and wifi speed. Projector was very good quality, great for movie night or just for listening to music. The wifi speed I had was around 150mb/s, thanks to that I could work remotely. So if you don’t mind the smell of chlorine, then I would really recommend it. Anyway, the smell of chlorine also tells us that bathroom is disinfected and clean

Очень красивая комната, стильный интерьер, много света (всё это редкость для данной цены в городе).
Есть шторы black out, проектор с Netflix - очень уютно проводить время перед сном. Удобный стол для работы для двух человек, wi-fi отлично работает.
Расположение не на шумной улице, но при этом всё рядом: кафе, супермаркет, рынок, парк. Пешком можно дойти до большинства достопримечательностей и торговых центров.
Заселение по сути бесконтактное, инструкции хозяин предоставил очень понятные.
За окном решетки, электронный замок на входе в здание и в комнату, - всё это дает ощущение безопасности.
Благодарим за гостеприимство и рекомендуем это место!
Nice place，and convenience
We enjoyed a lot. Thank you.
Good experience. Would stay again.

Every time I return, it feels just as amazing as the first! The host is always incredibly welcoming and supportive. The apartment is cozy, quiet, and thoughtfully designed, with a breezy balcony and a super convenient location near the city center. Every little detail feels carefully curated, making it feel like a true home away from home. Thank you for always keeping the place in such great shape. I’ll definitely be back!
超棒的房間，謝謝這麼用心的一切，如果可以真的很希望長住，地點非常方便步行就可以到范五老街，晚上晚回去也很方便，並且感覺很安全，超級推薦❤️❤️❤️

The place is nice. Very close to Bùi Viện street minus the chaotic sound at night. There is a free motorbike-parking space which is always a huge advantage. The balcony is photogenic. Amenities are well equipped.
The only disadvantage I could think of is the quite steep stair and climbing 3-floor of thin steel (inside) may cause discomfort for those afraid of height.
Very helpful host, provided great local recommendations and instructions for check-in. The apartment was lovely, very private and in a quiet street amongst the city. Would stay here again!!

We had a great stay here. The apartment was clean, spacious enough for two people, and equipped with air conditioning. The host was very responsive and flexible with the check-in. Just a note- the building doesn't have an elevator, so it might be a bit challenging if you're carrying heavy luggage.
Very great host and house, we had everything we needed including early check in since we arrived in the morning and needed to drop our bags. I recommend it and I will come back!

Very nice place! Beautiful decors, all necessary items you need are provided.
The host is super responsive and helpful. I would recommend this place for anyone need central stay, clean and cozy within budget. Thank you for welcoming us!

The hostess was very gentle and gave useful tips to help my stay in Saigon. The area has a lot of options for food, leisure and it is close to all tourist attractions.
The house is exactly as announced and the place is quiet. I truly recommend this place.
房間非常乾淨以及舒適，很高興在第一次來胡志明遇到了這樣的房間。房東也非常的友好。

La Sol Home is a fantastic place to stay in Ho Chi Minh City. The apartment is clean, cozy, and perfectly located, just a quick Grab ride to all the main attractions. Yen greeted us warmly and made sure we had everything we needed. She even gave us helpful local tips. The neighborhood is lively with lots of restaurants, cafes, and shops nearby. We especially loved the local coffee spot right downstairs. We felt truly comfortable and at home during our stay. Highly recommended for anyone visiting HCMC
Very beautiful room, also clean and in great place. Yen is so helpful and kind, answer so quickly. Recommend!

La Sol Home truly felt like a perfect home away from home. Yen is an outstanding host, always responsive, caring, and ready to help with anything we needed. I really appreciated how she shared local tips and made sure we were comfortable throughout our stay. The apartment itself is in a great location, close to everything you might need, and comes fully equipped with all the amenities. We were even able to check out a bit late due to our travel schedule, which was a huge help. Thank you, Yen, for the warm hospitality and a wonderful experience

I had a wonderful stay at La Sol Home. Yen is an incredibly thoughtful, friendly, and attentive host. From the moment I arrived, she made me feel truly welcomed and went above and beyond to ensure everything was perfect. She responded quickly to any questions and gave great local tips. The apartment itself was spotless, well-equipped, and located in a perfect spot to explore the city. I felt completely at home during my stay. If you’re looking for a cozy, comfortable place with an amazing host in HCMC, La Sol Home is the one
Stayed 10 days, super quiet, comfortable and well designed space. No elevator on fourth floor, if that doesn’t bother you highly recommend the space. Very kind and responsive host.

Highly recommend for those who first time visit vietnam Ho Chi Minh to stay here because walking distance you can get whatever you want. Foods, entertainment, pharmacy and public transport. Had a fun time with friends! It was only a few steps to Bui Vien but the noise was barely heard in the bedrooms. The place itself was clean and cozy. Definitely would be willing to stay here again! You won’t regret staying here.
Great place to stay. Great location and close to all the top spots in the city! Would definitely recommend!!!
The room is cozy, easy to access and location is right in center of the city. Highly recommend 👍

Wir hatten eine schöne Zeit in der Unterkunft. Hatten wir Fragen, wurde uns schnell geantwortet und auf unsere Bedürfnisse eingegangen (Check-Out um 12 Uhr).
Der Balkon könnte Stühle haben, dann würde man draußen noch schöner sitzen. Wir haben uns die schweren Stühle rausgestellt und nach Benutzung immer wieder reingetragen (bzgl. der Regengefahr).
Die Bettwäsche ist etwas gewöhnungsbedürftig. Sie war aus Seide oder etwas ähnlich rutschigem.
Einfache Baumwollbettwäsche wäre sehr viel angenehmer (auch bei den Temperaturen). Durch die Klimaanlage und den Ventilator konnte die Wohnung schnell gekühlt werden und Abends hatten wir sogar die Balkontür auf und es kam schöne frische Luft hinein.
Immer wieder gerne :)

Had a delightful stay here for 3 nights!
Indeed as many past guests have mentioned, its extremely quiet and all external street noise is blocked off despite being in the heart of the city and near the bar street. Its surreal.
Love the balcony tranquil vibes, little bench with quilt and sound of birds tweeting in the morning. We did like the projector for watching netflix. The host is also extremely helpful and responsive, such a pleasure to talk to.
Some minor things to note is that its quite a climb to the 3rd floor for guest who struggle with climbing stairs. Also, there may be other guests living on the bottom floor can be quite loud if they are travelling in a big group. But all in all, the stay was still definitely worth every bit, delightful, convenient and we dont regret it one bit. Will come again!
Great location in the centre of District 1. Perfect and peaceful place to stay in the busy city! Thank you!!

One of our best Airbnb stays! La Sol is newly and beautifully renovated, everything felt fresh, clean, and thoughtfully designed. We stayed on the top floor and loved the privacy and calm atmosphere. The room looked exactly like the photos, maybe even better, with high-quality amenities and a cozy, welcoming feel.
The location is perfect: tucked in a quiet alley but just a short walk to Bui Vien and many of Saigon’s main attractions. It’s peaceful but super convenient.
Yen was an amazing host, very responsive, kind, and helpful throughout our stay. You can really feel the care put into every detail. We’d absolutely stay again and highly recommend La Sol to anyone visiting HCMC

Appartement qui correspondait à nos attentes .
Nous recommandons l'appartement fortement !!
房間很乾淨整潔，與照片上一致！很舒服的環境，推薦！
Great communication and a friendly host. The place was very clean, highly recommended!

Home gần trung tâm thành phố nên di chuyển thuận tiện, an ninh tốt. Phòng giống trên hình, gọn gàng ngăn nắp, mọi thứ rất ổn. Chị chủ thân thiện, hỗ trợ nhanh chóng. Mình đã có một chuyến đi tuyệt vời ở HCM 😍😍😍
phòng ở sạch sẽ đầy đủ tiện nghi đi lại thuận tiện chị chủ nhiệt tình lắm ạ
Phòng rộng rãi dễ tìm phù hợp giá tiền. Chủ nhà hướng dẫn chi tiết
Really good host, highly recommend !!
Phòng đẹp sạch sẽ, anh chủ siêu thân thiện, sẽ ghé lại khi tới Sài Gòn

Nothing but praises! I had the best stay in this air bnb! Both my host kelvin and collin are very helpful gave me so much recommendations and very easy to deal with. If you have questions regarding the city they’re the perfect people to ask for advice. My room is very spacious with the balcony and the tub I couldn’t ask for more.
I’ll definitely stay here again when i visit Ho Chi Minh city!

Colin and Kelvin are super super helpful hosts and are amazing! We checked out late and still were accomodated and they got the room ready extra fast for us. Great hosts. Must recommend if youre in hcm.
all great! very pleasant experience. Hope to stay again!
ห้องพักสะอาด แต่อยากให้ปรับปรุงกลิ่นห้องน้ำ ตรงชักโครก

I had a great stay here 👍
The location was super convenient — it’s very close to the dental clinic I needed to visit, which made things so much easier for me.
The host also provides access to a laundry room on the ground floor, which was a big help. I was able to wash and dry my clothes easily, especially since it’s currently rainy season. Even though there’s a balcony, it’s not really practical for drying clothes when it rains, so having a dryer was a lifesaver 👍
Thanks so much for the comfortable stay 😊 🙏

The room has all the essentials and then some. The kitchen is fully stocked and the host provides everything I needed. The host and staff are very attentive. The location isn't very walkable since its a small alley, but its not far from Landmark and district 1. Great place to stay imo.

I had a wonderful stay at this Airbnb in Ho Chi Minh City. The location is right in the city center, making it incredibly convenient to access all the major attractions and essential places. The host was very accommodating and allowed me to check in early, which was a great help.
The support staff was exceptional—they assisted us with our luggage both during check-in and check-out, ensuring a smooth experience. Their hospitality truly stood out.
Overall, I had a fantastic stay and would definitely choose this place again when I visit Ho Chi Minh City in the future!

The whole team was extremely friendly, helpful and respond super fast. Equipped with Washing machine and dryer is practical. Found some nice local spot around the place. Cucai Bakery is highly recommended. I am impressed and deeply fell in love with this city. Thanks again the whole team providing such a great host✨
Place fit my needs, good sized desk, good lighting, and staff was helpful and very responsive
Everything was perfect! The owners were very helpful and welcoming. The location is very convenient and peaceful
깨끗하고, 완비된 준비물, 친절한 호스트. 편리한 위치. 친구에게 추천하고 싶네요.
I have been to this place 4 times, back and back again, the price is very reasonable, and this place is super clean, love it.

Exceptional Stay in the Heart of Saigon – Highly Recommended!
I had the most incredible stay at this Airbnb in Binh Thanh District, and I can’t recommend it enough! From the moment I arrived, the hospitality was beyond anything I’ve experienced. The host was exceptionally attentive, always checking in to ensure I had everything I needed and even offering room cleaning whenever necessary.
The location was absolutely perfect—right in the heart of Binh Thanh, with easy access to key areas in Saigon. Whether it was exploring the city, finding great food spots, or just enjoying the local atmosphere, everything was within reach.
What truly set this stay apart was the host’s kindness and thoughtfulness. Their commitment to making my experience smooth and enjoyable was unmatched. It’s rare to find such genuine hospitality, and I’m incredibly grateful for it.
Without a doubt, I will be staying here again when I return to Saigon and I wholeheartedly encourage others to book this Airbnb.
Ok
A great experience! The landlord is very nice! I look forward to staying here next time.

Quy trình nhận phòng và trả phòng dễ dàng, phòng ngủ phòng tắm đều rất sạch sẽ, thơm tho ❤️ Ở home còn có mấy bé mèo siêu đáng yêu ạ.
Nói chung là rất xứng đáng với giá tiền, chất lượng rất tốt ạ ❤️ Nếu có dịp quay lại Sài Gòn chắc chắn sẽ book phòng ở home tiếp nạaa

I had a great stay at Mochi’s place. She was extremely responsive, and the space was very clean and well-maintained. The location was excellent as well. I would definitely consider staying there again.

Mochi is a great host, very helpful and kind! She has 3 beautiful and super sweet cats that make the place even cozier and more welcoming. I felt very comfortable there and Mochi is super helpful eith whatever you need! Definitely recommend staying there as it's close to a lot of restaurants, street food and parks. I'll definitely stay here again while in HCM!
Chị chủ nhiệt tình ,nhà có 5 em mèo đáng yêu . Chỉ hơi bất tiện không có nam nữ tách riêng . Vẫn sẽ quay lại ❤️

我在Mochi这里住了整整十六天，房间里很干净而且有一种好闻的气味。胡志明市的天气一直很热，但是房间内空调24小时都开着，始终都很凉爽，甚至睡醒会感觉有点冷，所以怕冷的人可以提前找Mochi要一张额外的毯子。入住期间一切的问题Mochi都会贴心地给你解决，遇到问题随时联系她就可以了。房间里的大家也都遵守入住守则，所以即使是多人间也没有出现因为噪音导致睡不着的情况。Mochi这里养了五只可爱的猫，要注意有一只黑色的小猫你最好只摸它的上半身，它不喜欢有人摸它的尾巴。

Same as the first time, our stay here was excellent. Mochi was very accommodating and made sure we felt at home. She was responsive, and it was affordable, but that doesn't mean the home wasn't clean. I would love to stay here again if I visit HCM. Thank you, Mochi!
The location is near to the noisy area. The bed is very clean. But very very hard… and the pillow is very high… there were cats and dogs barking at night with the noisy music.
Chủ nhà tuyệt vời
Giá cả hợp lý, dịch vụ tốt
nơi ở thuận tiện, giá rẻ

Mochi is such an awesome host. I would ask her tons and tons of questions and she still replies and accommodates me. She is very kind and helpful for sure. I also love the smell of the room itself. Even if it’s shared, the room still smells divine! Same with the bathroom. It was very clean even if it was shared. The internet is reliable as well. :) If you need to work, the internet surely would not let you down. All in all, I like my stay in Mochi’s place. I didn’t have any issues at all. :) If I comeback to Saigon on a budget, I would definitely stay here again. (It’s literally near everything! ☺️) This accommodation is definitely worth it.

It would have been nice to know they have cats in the building as I have an allergy and was sneezing quite a bit although I do love animals it was worth petting them. Hosts are very kind. I brought in fermented squid that stuck up the whole place , I do apologize. The bathroom in my room was a bit dirty. Otherwise common areas and sleeping areas were immaculately clean. For the price and location it was definitely worth the experience.
Mình thấy bạn chủ đã nhiệt tình trả lại tiền cho mình khi nhu cầu ko phù hợp với mình
I needed a quick and cheap place to stay overnight, the hostel was ideally close and convenient, I recommend it

Very peculiar hostel style focused on being clean and quiet to have a good reste rather than social hostel. Please be mindful that there is no reception or common areas to sit down and socialize.
I really like this context of hotel for a day or two when you need to focus on your well being and to rest and recharge your social batteries. The dormitory rooms are spacious with a couch, a private toilet with shower and small kitchen. The only thing I notice was missing was the chairs and the table as in the pictures. I just assume those were removed to provide the room with more "manoeuvrability"
The beds are very comfortable, there is a charger and a light and the bunk bed has a curtain for privacy, a shelf to place your belongings and even a small closed locker private to you and within the sleeping area, already with a key so you do not need a locker.
Also all the doors do not make any noise when they close! The place is very clean, easy checkinand a few guests appear to be locals

What stood out in Mochi's place is the attention to detail on everything and how safe the place is inside with security cameras to ensure the safety of the guests and their belongings.
Good mattress, powerful A/C, shelves in the bunk bed to put your belongings and a locker right next side to your private bed.
Internet also works very well
Location is great, the place is secluded from the noise and traffic so very very quiet.
It appears that some locals are staying there but there was no problem.
For a place to have a serious rest, be safe, quiet and private, this place is ideal!
Thank you

Tout était propre, clair, et pratique au niveau du logement (style dortoir, mais confortable). Possibilité de cuisiner mais avec peu de place pour celles et ceux qui veulent. Je n'ai pas aimé le quartier mais c'est personnel (bruyant et ambiance touristique le soir)
Great prime location. Very considerate and responsive host. Cute cats in the house as well in case you don't like humans.
我非常非常喜欢这次的住宿体验以及这个地理位置，这是我第一次来越南，我特别喜欢胡志明这个城市，非常有自己的文化特色，而且很热闹，东西也很好吃，店家也很好，当时看到我来了还帮我拿行李，我真的特别开心，这一次我很难给人这么长的评论，但是我这次非常开心，谢谢店家，下次我来胡志明了还住你这！~❤️🫶🏼

The place is amazingly clean and convenient. It is nearby pubs and restos. The owner is very responsive, helpful, and flexible. Although I only stayed for few hours just to leave my luggage and rest for a while. I highly recommend this place. Price is a great deal for the place

Auto check in và auto check out rất tiện lợi
Chị chủ nhà rất thân thiện đáng yêu
Ngày nào cũng được dọn rác trong phòng
Mình rất thích bộ quy tắc chủ nhà nêu ra để đảm bảo không gian riêng tư cho mọi người, tại nhà bếp, tủ lạnh và phòng tắm đều có chỉ dẫn rất chuyên nghiệp giá lại mềm cực kì. Chắc chắn mình sẽ giới thiệu cho bạn bè ng thân
Nice location. Reply is quick, the family offers helpful advice!
Very nice hostel. Very clean and safe. Excellent location and definitely worth the price. Perfect for my short stay
mochi’s place is near to main attractions and accessible by bus and walking. had a pleasant time here. thank u so much!

Het appartement lag ver van het centrum, waardoor je wel steeds een taxi nodig had, er was wel veel lawaai in het gebouw en ook buiten was er veel lawaai. De accommodatie was niet heel proper en er waren wel enkele problemen in de woning( geen verlichting in de badkamer, waardoor we een nachtlampje hebben moeten gebruiken om te kunnen douchen) ook waren er kakkerlakken, we hebben dit gemeld en de eigenaar zou dit wel aanpakken.
Communication is on point!!!! I appreciate the clear step by step instructions for both check in and check out :)
Absolutely outstanding service from start to finish. Every detail was handled with care and professionalism.
너무 감사히 잘이용했습니다
Hungさんの部屋は記載通りで、快適でした。
Had a great stay & the host was always responsive.
Good place, simple but had everything.  Near bus stop to head into city sights and we loved the gym and pool.  Great stay

Great place to stay not far from District 1 with an awesome view.
Lots of coffee and restaurants around.

호스트는 최고입니다
이말뿐이 할말이없을정도에요
아주 만족스러운 숙소였다. 다시 방문할 용이가 있다
Very accommodating and responsive!
다음에 또 방문할께요
좋은숙소입니다
非常好
좋았음

Vị trí ngay trung tâm Quận 3, thuận tiện để di chuyển Quận 1 và các địa điểm tham quan. Có nhiều nhà hàng quanh khu vực. Chủ nhà thân thiện, phản hồi nhanh chóng bất cứ lúc nào bạn cần. Hướng dẫn nhận phòng linh hoạt, dễ dàng. Căn hộ rất rộng rãi, thoải mái so với giá tiền và các căn hộ khu vực. Sạch sẽ, đầy đủ tiện nghi. Nếu có thời gian, tôi sẽ quay lại. Đánh giá cao, đề xuất với mọi người.
Chủ nhà thân thiện, hỗ trợ mọi lúc khi cần. Nhà sạch sẽ, khu vực trung tâm. Dễ dàng nhận phòng và trả phòng, độc lập, tách biệt khi lưu trú tại đây.
Chủ nhà phản hồi rất nhanh. Mọi giải đáp được trả lời ngay lập tức. ...Nhà sạch, rộng rãi....
很棒，遇到問題房東都有協助處理

Fine apartment, cheap, ok neighbourhood. Bad things were that AC was not powerful and smell of paint and noise because of renovation
Check-in and communication was good.

Michel est un hôte qui a su répondre à toutes mes questions très rapidement, nos échanges ont été fluides et les problèmes rencontrés ont été réglés très rapidement.
L’emplacement du logement est idéal, il n’est pas trop près de la route principale ce qui permet d’échapper au bruit de la ville mais reste tout de même à proximité de nombreux services.

I stayed for a week. PROS: I really liked the location, you're tucked in a back alley, but the surrounding streets will surprise you, there's so many great coffee shops and restaurants (Awesome vegetarian options too – also check out Phaya Thai Spa for excellent massage). The room is clean, with good aircon & wifi, and looks better than the photos. The host is super responsive and friendly. All up, good value for money. CONS: The room is a little dark, the bathroom has a slight smell. There were a few small issues (ants in the bedroom, someone smoking inside, trying to access the main door) but to be fair, the host was very quick to find a solution.
Căn phòng rất dễ thương, sạch sẽ và đầy đủ tiện nghi. Bạn admin chủ nhà hỗ trợ cũng rất nhanh và nhiệt tình ạ. Rất thích nơi này, ngay trung tâm đi tới mọi nơi đều rất gần. Sẽ quay lại nữa 💯

Schöne, ruhige und gut gelegene Unterkunft, wenn wir wieder kommen dann sicher wieder hier
Vielen Dank für Alles

Michel is one of the best hosts I've met, going out of his way to meet my needs, and super responsive. The location is about 30-40 mins walk (1.5-2km) to city center (Nnuyan Hui promenade, Vincom mall, Train station, etc.) and it's close to Tan Dinh market and the pink church. The neighborhood is very local, for an authentic experience, but if you are looking for sth new, modern and international, you should considerD2/3 instead. There are tons of cafes, restos, supermarkets, massage parlors nearby. 20 mins to airport by car. The building has a locked gate downstairs so it feels safe, and it's quiet at night. For a 5-star review, I'd give Michel 10, my only complaint is the place is bit old and lack of maintenance, amenities look old and worn (such as the drain, sinks, aircon, etc.) and there's a certain stale smell which didn't change after they used air refresher. Overall it's good value for money for solo travelers/couples.

A really nice simple little studio located in a cute neighbourhood with lots of great little cafes and food options nearby (there's a friendly couple who sell banh great banh mi just outside the apartment which I highly recommend). It's pretty much the perfect distance from the busy city centre.
There's a gym just across the river called Rạch Miễu Gym Center which does cheap day passes if you need a place to workout during your stay, and there's also Le Van Tam Park if you want to go for a morning/evening run (you can also jog along the river).
Recommended for both tourist and longer stays.

It was lovely to stay there! Great communication and cute interior, nicely situated
Would stay again ;-)
Great place to stay, and Michel was always helpful and responsive. Highly recommended. Thank you Michel!
Clean, spacious, air conditioned room. Michel is very responsive and helpful, thank you!
Very active host and well instruction

I'm grateful to have stayed here, we fell in love with the place the moment we entered! It's one of the best we have stayed in HCM, not just squeaky clean and spacious, but also in a pretty vicinity with great local vibes. So many cafés and restaurants within walking distance, a good and big gym nearby, and it's possible to take a straight bus to Ben Thanh. The host Michel is super responsive and proactive, he really worked hard to make us feel comfortable here. I will recommend him and this place over and over! Merci beaucoup de nous recevoir, a bientot!

Clean & spacious room with cozy decor, look simple but there are all facilities for my needs. Locate at a quiet alley, and just 2-3km to the center in district 1. You can easily find a lot of good restaurants/coffee shops near by within 10 minutes walk.
The host, Mic, is super friendly and supportive, made me feel like home.
Would love to stay here again & again every time I reach Saigon ♥️

Best spot in Saigon to see the city and most importantly eat! Best food ever within walking distance and great access to the river for coffee every day. Cannot recommend this place enough as a base from which to explore.

we stayed all over Saigon during our two week holiday and this was our favorite place. the best host we had by far, beautiful apartment for the cheapest price. safe entry for our selves and our motorcycle. the river street has the best food and coffee. we cannot rate this place high enough!
朝の5時にホストに声をかけて、空港へ帰るバイクタクシーを手配してくれました。現地のアプリや言語がわからなかったので、とても助かりました。
The accommodation itself felt like home and was super cozy! The host was super responsive too. We loved our stay and we'll be back! :)

Clean and cute place to stay , I must say the host was amazing always helpful and well connected
Loved the stay
Will definitely stay again
They are so friendly. This place makes me feel like my home.
Beautifully furnished interior. A little oasis in the middle of Phu Nhuan district.
Nice room! Recommended !
Good choice
Great host responsive as well
great host and great deal.

Địa điểm thuận tiện
Mọi thứ trong căn phòng đều được phối hợp hài hoà, hơn mong đợi và đi theo đúng định hướng tên của căn phòng
Hỗ trợ và phản hồi luôn nhanh chóng, trải nghiệm tuyệt vời ^^
Phòng đúng như ảnh, tiện nghi xứng đáng với giá tiền, không gian rộng rãi và thoải mái, có dịp mình sẽ quay lại

Tôi đã đặt phòng của cô ấy lần thứ 2. Căn hộ sạch sẽ, rất đẹp mà giá khá rẻ, dễ dàng đi tới các điểm tham quan.
Thật sự nơi đây rất chill, đặc biệt là bay window với cửa sổ lớn. Chủ nhà cực kỳ nhiệt tình, thân thiện. Tôi muốn cho bạn 10 sao 🤩

honestly I never wanted to leave the place. it was so comfortable and felt like home honestly after long day of being outside when we came it felt like home peaceful and can cook anything we want. lots of walkable juice places which was much needed in that heat was there and cafe and 7 eleven was in walkable distance so it was perfect. and the host was so sweet she even left us cup noodles in that busy time so that we don't have any issues.

This was one of the nicest airbnbs I’ve ever stayed in! Such a cool space, feels very chic and spacious for a studio, and had everything you need to cook, chill etc.
Host was super helpful and responsive too! Only thing was sometimes the water pressure in the shower was not great but cannot fault anything else! I’ll be back if I’m in Saigon again 🙏🏼

Место очень интересное, аутентичный вьетнамский дворик посреди мегаполиса и тучи мопедов. Внутри квартиры всё красиво и цивилизованно, хотя вход на первый взгляд может насторожить. До достопримечательностей можно дойти пешком, если не боитесь мотоциклов и мопедов. В целом всё здорово, рекомендую!

We stayed here as a group of four friends on our first visit to Saigon, and this unit made our trip even more memorable. We arrived at midnight but getting here was easy since it’s just a bridge away from District 1. The residential complex felt homey, safe, and peaceful, with plenty of great food options nearby, plus a convenience store and ATM just around the corner. The space itself is beautiful — exactly as shown in the photos and very clean and well-maintained. The only minor challenge we had was that it’s on the 3rd floor with no elevator, so we had to carry our luggage up, but we didn’t really mind. Mekong Lounge gave us a cozy, comfortable home base throughout our trip. The host, Le Thi My, is warm, kind, and very responsive — she helped us with all our questions, gave great local recommendations, and made us feel welcome. We truly appreciated her hospitality and would happily stay here again and recommend her place to friends visiting Saigon!

We loved our stay at Mekong Lounge! The studio apartment was very spacious and had everything you could possibly need. Bathroom was clean and had a separate shower (not a wet one which was important to us)!! Water pressure is a little weak but nothing we couldn’t work with. Check in instructions included a video that made it super easy. Security was great as we were in a little communal area off the main road and the gates closed as night. Location was close to District 1 and so it was easy to get around via grab (5 minute ride or 15 minute walk but it’s really hot). Also super close to Com Tam Calamette which was our favourite meal during our time there!!! Overall we’d recommend :)

We had a great stay here! The place was so cosy & lovely & in a safe area. It was also really good in terms of sound- compared to many places around the city, it was very peaceful.
It was so awesome having a full set up for movies & games.
We did run in to the problem of having ants all over the kitchen & bathroom but the owner was so prompt & came over to clean & spray the areas within the same morning!
Also, the shower pressure wasn’t good but I can’t really fault it for that.
We had an amazing stay, if we’re back in the city we would absolutely stay again!
Thanks so much!

짐 많으면 계단이라서 들고 올라가기 힘들지만 한번 올라가면 집 너무 좋아서 후회없어요!
1군이랑도 가깝고 위치도 굳굳!
아쉬운건 그냥 베트남 수업이 안좋은거 하나에요!!
남자들끼리 오면 게임하고 너무 좋을거같은 집이에요!

The only complain i have is I can't give a 6 star review. :] Place was exactly like the pictures and host was extremely responsive and friendly. It was simple to check in with clear instructions given by the host! Definitely will consider coming back to stay again!

One of the best air bnbs I’ve stayed in! Very clean, spacious and beautifully decorated with all that you need. It’s also close to attractions in a cute neighborhood! Le Thi My was an absolutely amazing host that was so kind and welcoming. We even received a new years gift which was so thoughtful! I couldn’t recommend this air bnb enough! If you’re ever in Saigon this is the place to stay :)

what a sweet place. I enjoyed my stay here. the whole apartment is cleverly designed in a way that makes it super fun to be there,  its quiet, while still in a non touristy area, in a very Vietnamese surrounding. lots of restaurants around. would book it again in a heartbeat. communication was easy, pleasant and prompt.
Chủ nhà thân thiet nhiệt tình và rất tốt bụng ! Tôi sẽ quay lại khi có cơ hội đến HCM

Staying at these apartments was an absolute pleasure! The space is roomy, cozy, and perfectly located just a short walk from the center of Saigon. The price is more than fair for what you get.
The real gem here is the gaming setup — not only can you play on the TV, but there's also a full arcade machine packed with classic retro games! It's a super fun and nostalgic experience, and the controls are intuitive. We'd love to see a small booklet with tips and descriptions of the top games — that would make it even more awesome ^__^
Everything else was great too: very clean, high-quality shampoo and shower gel in the bathroom, well-functioning air conditioner, and a large desk that's perfect for remote work. The only minor downside is carrying your luggage up to the third floor, as there's no elevator — not a dealbreaker, just something to be aware of.
Highly recommend this place to any gamer or anyone who appreciates a fun and comfortable place to stay!
The location is good and we can experience local life here. And the room is spacious and clean. The host is very helpful and can respond to us very quickly! What a great experience to stay here!

I love this place, I was happy to find it available and went back to it in a heartbeat. Fun and well designed apartment, cozy and comfortable in D4 that's a bit away from the where all tourists roam, but its a 20-30 minute walk to anywhere or a 5-10 minute grab bike ride. As I  got to know the area more, I liked it more and more, walk around the narrow streets and immerse yourself in the real Vietnam

Host thân thiện và phản hồi nhanh, luôn cố gắng hỗ trợ mình hết mức, mình rất hài lòng.
Phòng mới sạch sẽ, thơm tho, toilet CỰC KỲ SẠCH, không gian yên tĩnh, vị trí thuận tiện di chuyển đi các quận mà lại còn riêng tư và an toàn. Có nhiều tiện ích xung quang, trong phòng còn có máy chơi game và các thiết bị cần thiết, nhóm của mình rất thích và nếu có cơ hội chắc chắn sẽ quay lại đây vì các dịch vụ quá là tuyệt vời nàyyy
Very well-decorated and close to the city center, I had a good time

We had a fantastic time staying here, delightful, friendly neighbours, cafe, communal outside gym & little social space plus restaurants & shop downstairs. This is a genuine, local and residential setting, you’ll feel like a local. The decor was so fun and unique, some really cool stuff. Everything we needed was to hand, umbrellas, sun hats, needle & thread etc…
Loved sitting on the balcony, filled with plants & bonsai, over-looking the communal area below.
Loved the arcade game & big screen TV & super comfy sofa. This place made our stay in Saigon unforgettable.

Everything was great! The apartment was clean and cozy. The owner is very kind and helpful. Location and sound isolation could have been better, but this downside is applicable to almost all Saigon apartments
I can recommend!

5일 동안 묵었습니다.
문제사항이 있어 문의 드리면 바로바로 연락이 되어 편했습니다.
주변 이웃분들도 좋아보였습니다!
넓어서 지내는 동안 불편함 없이 편하게 잘 지냈습니다👍

This is a perfect stay - communicative & vibrant location with a cozy yard in front.
The apartment is very spacious and big, very well taken care of - with a lot of attention to detail - it makes you feel like home straight away!
There was everything you might need (even small things like umbrellas/sun hat :))
The host is more than friendly and took the time to help me with some local recommendations I needed.
Thank you for the lovely week stay! I have pinned this location to visit again for sure!

Lovely apartment in a strategic location. If you love food there are plenty of places to eat here.  The host went above and beyond to provide us with what we need. Aside from the grumpy and not so friendly security guard downstairs, i would highly recommend Le’s apartment!

Phòng có view rất đẹp nhờ có ban công phía trước tạo cho phòng và bếp bên ngoài tạo không gian thoải mái, có thể chill và thư giãn buổi tối, còn buổi sáng khá nóng và ồn, nhưng chỉ cần đóng cửa phòng là yên tĩnh ngay.
*Rep nếu bạn đang là sinh viên cần không gian view đẹp, chill, có thể nấu ăn, không gian vui vẻ... với bạn or người yêu* 🤭
Các bạn yên tâm đặt phòng và trải nghiệm ủng hộ Moga và hẹn Moga dịp khác, mình sẽ còn quay lại ở dài dài 💓
Đặc biệt, ở đây chủ phòng rất rất nhiệt tình, hướng dẫn, giải đáp và hỗ trợ mình rất nhiều khi đặt phòng và ở đây, nếu các bạn có gì thắc mắc thì cứ nhắn bên Moga sẽ hỗ trợ các bạn hết á nên đừng có ngại nha 🥰

The best home I've ever stayed in HCMC, it's super airy, bright, clean, fragrant with pretty large balcony, the toilet is tidy and large in the standard of hotel facilities.
Accessing to the home is easy and the area is not too busy but full of conveniences.
The host is kind and quick!
I will absolutely come back.

A chill and cozy place to stay for the weekend. The host is super friendly
Will comeback next time
Tout était parfait ! Un super logement, je recommande à 100%. Le propriétaire est très gentil et très aidant. Allez y les yeux fermés !!
Khu vực trung tâm thành phố, đi lại rất thuận tiện. Host support tụi mình rất nhiệt tình
Chỗ ở sạch sẽ, tiện nghi và đúng như mô tả. Vị trí thuận tiện, dễ dàng di chuyển. Chủ nhà thân thiện, hỗ trợ nhiệt tình. Đặc biệt máy chiếu xem phim rất okkkk. Sẽ quay lại nếu có dịp!

Virgo is very responsible and nice person to communicate. The place is ok, but unfortunately that was an average experience. Shower is leaking and flow isn’t good enough. Bathroom in general looks like it’s time for renovation. Roaches detected. Have to say it’s the only place where I saw the hdmi projection. That’s cool but I didn’t tried.

Exactly like the pictures, very nice neighborhood and close to an amazing pho place. The host is responsive and he allowed us to leave our luggages after check out. The cafe downstairs is also great and convenient. The bathroom could use some upgrades but honestly everything else is amazing! :)

Everything was good, the place is nicely decorated and Virgo is really reactive!
The thing I would have to say is about the cleanliness, that was not great, especially in the bathroom in the shower.
Also, note that the AC turns off when you leave so it takes a moment for the room to get fresh when you come back.

One of the best airbnbs ive stayed at in my life, felt very at home here and Virgo was extremely helpful. The cafe downstairs makes really good coffee and next door there’s a pizza place where I had the best pizza I’ve had in asia. Really close to the ‘strip’ if you’re into that but far away that you don’t get any of the chaos. Will def stay here again when Im back in Saigon.

Room look exactly like in the pictures. Host is attentive and helpful, he always respond immediately. Only downside is no elevator so if you have big luggage it might be a bit inconvenient. There’s one coffee shop right on the 1st floor, probably owned by the Airbnb owner as well, they serve pretty good drinks and open 7am-11pm so its pretty nice.
Nếu Airbnb thêm khăn tắm/bàn là thì sẽ OK hơn. Phòng đẹp chill như ảnh, nếu có hành lý nặng thì hơi bất tiện vì ko có thang máy. Quanh quanh Airbnb cũng nhiều quán ăn khuya.

My stay at Virgo's was by far the best Airbnb experience I've had to date. As an artist and interior designee I truly appreciate his high standards which are evident in his tasteful selections used in the textiles, furniture chiloices and layers of lighting used to create a space that is both comfortable and homie.
All in all, the apartment provides an understated esthetic appeal that delights.
Everything is in good working order and Virgo is a most reliable host.
Next time, I hope to return for a much longer visit and to stay again in one of Virgo's well curated appointments 💯% thanks 🌻
房东很热情，给与了很多帮助，房东审美很高，房间布置的很有格调，艺术成分很高，如果卫生间更新后就更完美了！总体来说是很不错的体验～全五分好评～

- great place to stay - - things to explore are in walkable distance.
- the host was really friendly and always responsive
- the room was as described
Идеальный вариант для краткосрочного проживания в центре Хошимина, спальня действительно уютная и даже есть рабочее место. Но состояние ванной довольно удручающее.
nice cozy room located in 2 floor. Downstairs is a cute small coffee shop, definitely come back next time. Virgo is supportive and responsive host 😊
很好
Nice place
A very wonderful place. Quiet, easy access to accomodities. 10/10.
陈设很美的小房间，木百叶窗很有法式氛围。房东回复消息很及时
Liên hệ với chủ nhà rất nhanh, phòng giống như hình mô tả, trang trí phòng rất đẹp mắt và sạch sẽ, chỉ có 1 điểm đó là dốc lên chỗ gửi xe khá trơn và cao, mong chủ nhà cải thiện

Overall, it’s a great place—clean, comfortable, and in a convenient location. Just note that it can be a bit noisy at night, so those sensitive to noise might want to keep that in mind. The street is one-way, and you’ll need to cross it to catch a cab, which can be tricky during rush hour. Also, there’s no elevator, so be prepared if you have heavy luggage.

Excellent place overall, very fun to stay in and a good location near a lot of fun things. If you have any issues, talk to the host, they are very friendly and willing to work with you. We got to check in very early and they let us keep our bags there all day after we had to check out. Would recommend.
Đẹp, đầy đủ tiện nghi, host nhiệt tình.

I really love this place.Very close to the market (just a cross the street)and around here have alot restaurant.
The maneger friendly.
The room is clean ,just like the photo when you booking.
I going to the beach this weekend,then back here to stay 2 more night before head back to America.
definitely come back here to stay if I back to VietNam again.
Không gian ở thoải mái, dễ chịu. Host hỗ trợ nhanh
Phòng rất sạch sẽ, mọi thứ đều giống với hình ảnh mô tả. Vị trí dễ tìm, giờ giấc tự do.
The lace was beautiful and our host was super accommodating. We came kinda late and night and they helped us open the door and get our luggage’s to the room they were so attentive.
great stay overall, matched the photos and responsive host, just note that there are 3 flights of stairs to reach the place :) other than that i love the projector function with netflix

Everything is perfect in Hana place but The only thing is that apartment is in 2nd floor with no elevator,,, so kind of doing cardio in up and down….. thanks Hana for to be responsive and solve all our enquiries… I want to stay next time also ….

Lovely host and beautiful space!
Pros:
- Great location, easy to get around
- Cosy set up, feels just like home
- Amenities such as toothbrush & shampoo provided — feels like what a hotel would provide
Cons:
- Aircon was not cold
- Heater for shower was not consistent
- Mattress was flat
- No lifts, only stairs to the apartment
Overall, value for money place — you get what you pay for :)
Phòng mới, vị trí thuận tiện dễ di chuyển q1, Bình Thạnh
Chổ ở thuận tiện, phòng mới rất sạch sẽ nhé mn
Sạch sẽ lắm, phòng mới cón luôn.
Host was very responsive and accommodating. The room itself was beautiful and clean. Loved the place!

The air-conditioning takes a while to cool the room, putting it on powerful mode helps. The traffic noise is a little jarring as the windows are not sound proof, but Hana mitigated that with ear plugs which softened the harsh sounds. Water heater is a little erratic, occasionally having hot water but more days we only had cold water. Use the kettle for warm baths. The service is really the best thing about the place honestly, as Hana and the building manager were very responsive to our every need. Otherwise, location is in the middle of a street that’s way too busy all the time. If you’re not on a budget, booking a hotel nearer to Takashimaya would be nicer. However for budget travellers, this airbnb does just fine,

Hana is quick to respond. There is washing machine and dryer for use, so you can wash your clothes conveniently. They do not provide detergent, but you can buy it yourself at the nearby convenience store.

場所も中心街から近く、部屋もとても清潔でかつ写真で見るのと同じかそれ以上でした。
旅の最後に泊まった場所なので、とても気持ちよく旅を締めくくることができました。
またサイゴンに来る際には利用させてください！

Room looks like photo, easy to find. Building manager is very responsive & helpful. Great location
However do take note that there is no lift & room is not sound proof while the building is on a busy street.
Worth the price paid!

位置方便，比较宽敞 ，卫生间也漂亮。其他配置也齐全 。房东服务很好。
但有三点可改善：
房子是临街的，完全不隔音，晚上整晚都很吵。窗帘完全不遮光。睡眠差的完全睡不好。
没有电梯，四楼提行李非常不方便。虽然房东很热情 帮忙提了
床品质量不好，不是纯棉的。整个材质睡起来很不舒服。枕头不舒适。被子甚至没有被套，感觉这样不干净。
A very cosy stay with lots to do around! Hana was also super helpful answering all our questions :)
Had a great and comfortable stay, best way to end our trip to vietnam, the appliances are too cute and varied and the space offered is worth its rate:)

Good location, in a normal Vietnam-style building, 25-30 min walk to center or quick Grab ride.
The flat was spotlessly clean and everything worked well. Host was super friendly, met us personally and helped with everything.
Main drawback: NOISE! Apartment faces an extremely busy road with non-stop traffic. The older AC unit adds more noise at night. We actually left after two nights because sleep was impossible.
If you're not noise-sensitive, this place offers excellent value. For light sleepers like us, bring serious earplugs or consider elsewhere. The host did mention she will try to address it, so maybe contact her to find out more.
Best airbnb I have stayed in city! Prime location easy to find! Cute aesthetic, good hygiene! Little projector was good surprise
Phòng sạch sẽ, đầy đủ tiện nghi như hình và còn rất mới. Chủ nhà thân thiện. Lần tới nếu có dịp sẽ lại đặt tiếp 💕

I had a wonderful experience staying at Casa Azariah. The space was clean, stylish, and had everything I needed for a comfortable stay. Yashen was a fantastic host—friendly, responsive, and genuinely helpful throughout my visit. I really appreciated the warm welcome and local tips. Highly recommend this place to anyone visiting the area!

Good value for money, decently equipped place in a useful enough location. Communication was always fast and check in was easily arranged. The internet works very well and the bed and pillows are comfortable. The place was also very clean. It is also very useful having a washing machine and small area to cook basic things. The building is also very safe and secure compared to many places to HCM having a modern lock code to enter the main gate. It would be useful to have a sponge for the kitchen though. Nonetheless, it is a nice place to stay that I can recommend.
Hỗ trợ rất nhiệt tình. Vị trí và giá phòng hợp lý

Amazing stay—super clean, stylish, and in a perfect central location. The host was friendly and helpful, and check-in was a breeze. Everything we needed was there. Highly recommend and would definitely come back!

⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ Amazing Stay at Casa Azariah!
Casa Azariah was the perfect retreat, clean, beautifully styled, and incredibly comfortable.
Yashen was a fantastic host: friendly, responsive, and genuinely thoughtful. He made sure everything was just right. The location is peaceful yet convenient, and I felt completely at home. I couldn’t have asked for a better experience.
I highly recommend and would love to return!

Effortless check in. Super responsive and accommodating host. Quiet neighbourhood. Good restaurant options at a walking distance.
Clean and quiet place. Top notch new facilities. 5 star experience.
Highly recommend!

Yash was an incredible host—friendly, responsive, and made sure everything was perfect. The place was spotless, cozy, and exactly as described. Highly recommend staying here for a smooth and comfortable experience!
Clean room, great support, tranquil and great food around. Convenient. Good hospitality. Thank you!

I stayed here two nights. My stay was pleasant enough. I think for the price paid it's ok. The room stays cool, it's not sweltering. It's also quite dark in the room at night which is a plus. It also wasn't super loud here. I had some minor issues with the toilet not flushing and some issues with the gate (the gate keycode is very difficult to figure out), and the electrical outlets are in inconvenient places. Because of the three matters above I would rate my stay a 3.5 or a 4. The location in d5 was fine, quite close to d1. If I needed to stay in d5 for a short time I wouldn't be shy about staying again seeing as the price is quite reasonable.

5 Stars – Highly Recommended!
I had a fantastic stay at this Airbnb! The place was exactly as described—clean, comfortable, and beautifully decorated. The bed was super cozy, the kitchen was well-equipped, and the Wi-Fi was fast and reliable, which made working remotely a breeze.
