The location was perfect—close to everything but still quiet enough to relax.
Our host was incredibly friendly and responsive, offering great local tips and making sure we had everything we needed. Check-in was smooth, and everything felt easy from start to finish.
I would definitely stay here again and highly recommend it to anyone looking for a stress-free, enjoyable trip!
Casa is a great host! Instant responsive & helpful even at 2 am. Local pov Recommendations & tips suggestions for my next locations was a 10/10. Great host overall!
Absolutely loved my stay! The location was perfect, the space was cozy and well-equipped, and the host made everything easy. Would definitely book again!
Fantastic stay! The place was spotless, stylish, and exactly as described. Check-in was smooth, and the host was responsive and helpful throughout. Highly recommend!
Perfect and met all expectations.The host was very helpful and even gave us suggestions of things to do in the area, would definitely visit again

I had an amazing time staying at Casa Azariah. The place is peaceful, beautifully decorated, and had everything I needed to feel comfortable and relaxed. It really felt like a hidden gem—quiet, cozy, and thoughtfully designed.
Yashen, the host, went above and beyond to make sure I had a great experience. He was super friendly, helpful, and always around if I needed anything. You can tell he takes pride in running Casa Azariah, and it shows in all the little details.
What made it even better was that Yashen helped me rent his own personal moped for a really good price, which made getting around so much easier and more fun.
Truly grateful for the experience—I highly recommend staying here!

⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ Absolutely Wonderful Stay with Yashen!
My stay at Yashen’s Airbnb was truly exceptional from start to finish. He was an incredibly welcoming and attentive host, always quick to respond and eager to help with anything I needed.
The apartment was spotless, stylish, and exactly as described — even better in person! I especially appreciated the thoughtful touches Yashen added to make the space feel like home. The location was perfect, and I felt safe and comfortable the entire time. I couldn’t have asked for a better experience.
Thank you, Yashen, for making my trip so memorable! I’ll definitely be back.
sehr gute Lage und ein gutes Leistungsverhältnis :) Casa Azariah ist sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit

I stayed in a private room here on June 11 and really enjoyed it! The location is perfect — right in the heart of District 1, super convenient for exploring the city, but still surprisingly peaceful. The room has a clean, modern style that made it feel like a little retreat from the busy streets outside. Everything was well-maintained and thoughtfully set up. A great mix of comfort and convenience — I’d happily stay again!
ห้องตรงปกมากๆ สวยประทับใจ เจ้าของน่ารักเป็นกันเอง มีแค่เสียงรบกวนจากภายนอกที่ทำให้ตื่นเช้าไปหน่อย

Huong was a great host. They were very responsive with every message sent to them. They also were very accommodating with my check in and check out process. I would recommend this area for everyone just because of how convenient it was with grab bike to get everywhere. No where ever took over 15 mins and to get to when going from there. Also the AC in the room works over time you’ll. I may have been roasting in the Saigon heat but sleeping at night felt like winter back in the states definitely gets chilly in there when sleeping🤣🤣

Thanks for our stay! The property is in a great location and the rooftop pool was lovely, however is quite abit older than in the pictures, some fixtures are not the same. The bathroom was not clean and is missing tiles in the shower so we were sandals for safety and sanitary reasons. The host is prompt with messaging though and was available to answer questions as needed.

Le logement est dans un très mauvais état : la clim est très compliquée à régler, la salle de bain est dans un état déplorable, le logement est très mal isolé (bruit du quartier, bruit des autres logements dans l'immeuble), le vidéo projecteur avec netflix fonctionne très mal... On devait y rester 4 jours, après une nuit dedans on a finalement opté pour un logement en face dans un hotel de meilleur standing... On a très mal dormi malgré le grand lit, donc on a pris nos affaires et on est parti voir ailleurs... En 3 semaines au Vietnam c'est le seul logement qui a été dans cet état là ! On est vraiment très déçu... Pour le prix en plus on s'attendait à un meilleur standing. Bref ! Passez votre chemin !
location is great , the only thing is the building and inside is old , thanks and communication very well

여기는 내가 호치민시에 살았던 예전처럼 편안한 나의 숙소이었다
시내중심에서 약간 벗어나 시내집입이 수월하고, 근처에 렌드마크81도 있고, 바로 건물뒤에는 현지 로컬을 체험 할 수있는 시장 및 현지인 주거지역이다. 또한 숙소 근처에는 놀이공원 및 동물원, 그리고 사이공 강, 공원 등등 부족함이 없다.

Ưu điểm: phòng sạch sẽ, view tầng 16, có máy chiếu, có đầy đủ cơ bản các thiết bị cần dùng, chủ nhà reply khách nhanh chóng là một điểm cộng.
Nhược điểm: khăn tắm có nhiều vết lởm đen, máy sấy tóc không hoạt động.
Tóm lại vẫn rất đáng tiền khi thuê ở đây vì tụi mình ngủ siêu ngon giấc!

Huong is a very nice host. Clean studio flat and cozy and basically have everything you need. Quick response and helpful. This is the place where you can escape from the noise of the city, but still close to the center and most area you may want to visit in HCMC. Safe place and the guards are polite. Nice pool and have the beautiful view from sunshine to the night. Highly recommended place for everyone!
Chỗ ở tiện nghi. Vị trí thuận lợi. Phòng sạch sẽ. Nhưng phòng hơi cũ.

Amazing place. Definitly want to book again when im in HCMC - i feel super good in Theres, the View is amazing, the Location quiet but everything nice to Reach by Grab. Good service and very secured comfortable Area. Love it Like a Home far from Home.

Huong was a great host. She usually replied within minutes. The place had a broken bathroom door handle but overall it was pristine, and the price was reasonable for this great location in HCMC. Definitely check out the swimming pool on the 25th floor while you are there.

John est un hôte très disponible, il a toujours répondu très rapidement à nos nombreuses questions. Le logement est bien situé dans une petite rue au calme. La chambre est très petite mais pour 2-3 jours ça fait l’affaire. La climatisation est très appréciable et silencieuse. Nous avons eu accès à Netflix. Johnさんはとても親切で、常に早いレスポンスがありました。おすすめのレストランも教えてくれたので、食事も楽しめました。
バスタオルは常に2枚以上手配してくれ、回答も的確、質問にも積極的に解決しようとしてくれたため、とても快適でした。
部屋は1Fにあり広さも設備もコンパクトなので、冷蔵庫の物を取りに行くのに最上階まで上がらないといけなかったのは手間でしたが、特にデメリットには感じませんでした。
周りにはコンビニや美味しいレストランなどが豊富にあるので、環境も良かったです。それでいて値段もだいぶ安いのでリーズナブルに長期滞在したい人にはおすすめです！
Good communitation and very easy check in and out. It was also thoroughly clean at arrival.
Great location in district one,  quiet room,clean and tidy, good value for money. Highly recommended.
Hải is friendly, quickly respond. The bed is comfortable, quiet AC, tv with Netflix, the toilet is clean and inside the room. Good location, the house is located in the center near walking street…

John/ Hải the host is so friendly and cool host, quickly respond. The bed is comfortable, quiet AC, large tv with Netflix, the toilet is clean and inside the room. The house is located in the center near Bui Vien walking street, i like this room.

nice location good and quiet area the owner is very responsible person
thanks i will come again and again thanks bro

John/Hải is a kind and responsive host, ensuring a smooth and enjoyable stay. The room is conveniently located on the ground floor, making it easy to access, and features a comfortable bed, quiet air conditioning, and a clean private bathroom. The large TV with Netflix adds to the comfort, making it perfect for relaxing after a long day. The house is ideally situated in the city center, within walking distance of the walking street, coffee shops, restaurants, and convenience stores. Public transportation and ride-hailing services are also easily accessible from this location. I had a fantastic experience and would gladly return for my next trip. Highly recommended for travelers seeking comfort and convenience on a budget.
Nice place! Highly recommended

Mình nhận phòng khá trễ sau 23h,  lúc nhận phòng mình có gọi chủ nhà hướng dẫn lại dù trước đó chủ nhà đã hướng dẫn cách nhận phòng, chủ nhà nhiệt tình,  phòng sạch sẽ, tiện nghi, ngay trung tâm, tiện để mình đi lại. Sẽ quay lại lần sau.

Amazing Airbnb. So clean, new and cozy. The decor is beautiful and made me feel right at home. The Airbnb is very very spacious, feels like your own little apartment. I highly recommend staying here if you can. The staff at the Cafe downstairs were very welcoming and helpful during my stay as well. I really enjoyed my time here.
The best accomodation I had in my 3 months of travelling Vietnam. Book here, you won't be disappointed.

Exactly described in the photos. Loved the decor, definitely a vibe. Everything was clean and comfortable. Hair dryer was strong and the fridge stayed very cold unlike most places in Vietnam. Grateful for the iron which is also rare. Very convenient that there’s a cafe on the ground floor. Being in the 3rd floor gives great exercise everytime you go up haha. Safe hidden gem. Walkable to restaurants and cafe yet a little on the outskirts of downtown district 1. Would recommend!

Lucia and Dang have been great hosts. They are very kind and generous hosts and to reply promptly to all messages.
The apartment is decorated and finished to a very high standard and the bathroom is very lovely.
The accommodation was in a great location and in walking distance to many great places in the city.
We really enjoyed our stay at the accommodation and would recommend.

The place is located in Nguyen Trai, district 1. One of the liveliest and most vibrant areas in HCM. It’s surrounded by restaurant, coffee shop and many of the must visit spots on our list making it incredibly convenient. In terms of both location and cleanliness, this place is tryly top notch.
The check in process was smoothly with clear instructions provided. Host also quick to respond to any question, which made the whole experience even better.
If I visit HCM city again, we will book their place right way!
Nice and cozy Airbnb. We had a great stay, thank you for hosting us.
Clean & Nice. Good location

Homestay rất đẹp, sạch sẽ và giống y hình. Vị trí thuận tiện, dễ tìm và gần các địa điểm ăn uống, tham quan. Không gian yên tĩnh, phù hợp để nghỉ ngơi hoặc làm việc.
Chủ nhà rất thân thiện và hỗ trợ nhiệt tình trong suốt thời gian lưu trú. Từ lúc đặt phòng đến khi check-out đều nhanh chóng và chuyên nghiệp.
Mình đặc biệt thích nêu chi tiết bạn ấn tượng, ví dụ: decor vintage , có sẵn bếp nấu ,free trà cà phê
Đây là lần thứ 2 mình quay lại. Rất đáng tiền, chắc chắn sẽ quay lại nếu có dịp!

Cảm ơn 2 vợ chồng, mình đã có 1 trải nghiệm ấm áp ở home của 2 bạn. Mình nhìn thấy sự chăm chút cho từng chi tiết trong căn phòng mình ở.
Mọi thứ đều được tính toán dựa trên trải nghiệm của khách hàng.
Mình đã có những ngày công tác tại Sài Gòn rất mệt, nhưng nhờ có home, mỗi tối mình đều ngủ rất ngon.
Cảm ơn 2 bạn lần nữa.

Chuyến công tác ở Sài Gòn lần này suôn sẻ một phần là nhờ chỗ ở quá ưng. Phòng rộng, sạch, sáng sủa, ở rất thoải mái. Không gian yên tĩnh, decor đơn giản mà có gu. Anh chị chủ dễ thương, hỗ trợ nhiệt tình. Lần sau có dịp quay lại mình vẫn sẽ chọn ở đây.❤️❤️
Phòng xinh như hình, chị chủ nhà siêu nhiệt tình. Highly rcm mọi người thuê ở đây nha

The stay was excellent and matched the photos perfectly. The bed is comfortable and the desk is ideal for long use. The garden offers a relaxing retreat and has a security camera, which I was aware of, and it provides added reassurance, especially for solo travelers. Austin and Vanessa were responsive, friendly, and accommodating throughout my stay. Overall, a great experience blending style, comfort, and thoughtful details.

Tôi hoàn toàn rất hài lòng
Chủ nhà rất thân thiện và nhiệt tình.

AVHome#4 was the perfect spot for my work trip. The place is cozy and well-maintained, and the working desk setup was exactly what I needed. It’s tucked into a quiet corner with good lighting, a comfortable chair, and strong Wi-Fi.
What really made the stay special was the host. Super friendly, responsive, and genuinely helpful from check-in to check-out. You can tell they care about making guests feel at home. If you're working remotely or just want a peaceful place to stay, this listing is a great choice!

Austin and vanessaz place is amazing!! It was high above expectations..its luxurious and feels like home..you dont have to buy anything from outside and everything is so well organized and managed…they are super friendly and helpful…just like a human AI. Do not even thnk twice before you book…you will definitely not regret staying here…even the neighbours are very good,friendly and social…i stayed for 3 nights and i felt sad to checkout but we are travellers and this is the beauty of traveling

이번이 두번째 이용입니다.
첫번째 이용 후 좋았던 경험을 공유하고 싶어서 친구들 두 명과 함께 방문하였습니다.
오스틴과 바네사는 매우 친절합니다.
청소를 위해 오시는 직원분들도 매우 친절하십니다.
A&V홈에서 지내보면 로컬에서 경험 할 수 있는 새벽 5시가 되기 전에 분주히 하루를 시작하는 베트남을 느낄 수 있습니다.
베트남에서의 경험은 제 삶에 긍정적인 영향을 주었습니다.
감사합니다.

Austin & Vanessa were very responsive, friendly and accommodate when it came to leaving the luggage before or after checkin. This is rare with Airbnb that hosts help keep the luggage outside of the booking hours. The place was cosy, felt straight at home with everything you need and very private, peaceful street, local neighbourhood. Amazing stay, thanks for everything!

머무르는 동안 집처럼 너무 편안하게 지내다 갑니다
출장 올때마다 오스틴 집에 머무르는데
이번 숙소도 너무 좋네요^^
다음 일정도 꼭 다시 찾아올거 같아요

We spent almost two weeks in their place which is very clean (the most important to me), spacious and well accommodated. The room is on the top floor that needs you to stair up a bit but it is just like a daily exercise for me. Last but not least, the host is nice, friendly and responsive :)

写真通りのとても良い部屋でした。
ふかふかのベッド、長時間座っても疲れないデスク、プライベートバルコニー、部屋の雰囲気などどれも最高でした。
部屋以外にも共有スペースで洗濯や食事、読書などを楽しめる。これは空間の贅沢な使い方だと思いました。

Apartment was accurate to the photos and was clean upon checking in. However, 2 things, the home can be quite hot in the day as it is on the highest floor but there are aircons, also there is a hidden camera at the corner of your private balcony that is not mentioned anywhere prior in the listing description or any communications, so that has impacted the quality of my stay as it was somewhat an invasion of privacy as the balcony was said to be private and accessible only to us (and it's proximity to the semi glass wall shower), which made us quite uncomfortable.

host was really responsive throughout, made everything so much better. place was fantastic, felt really local and location was about 10-15 mins from everything touristy! everything you need in the apartment as well. only thing is that the water pressure from the showers is really really small but everything else was fantastic! stairs are steep and youll have to climb 4 levels so take note too
I can see the owner is really putting their heart and soul into this room. Everything is attention to detail. I feel right at home once I settle in.

Amazing place. Good location, near multiple districts. Everywhere I wanted to visit is within 15-20. Hosts accommodated all needs and communication was easy. Would love to rent all rooms next time with a group of friends or family

We absolutely loved staying at A&V Home! It’s conveniently located close to both the airport and the city center. The apartment is cozy, stylish, and spotlessly clean. The kitchen is fully equipped with everything you need for cooking, and there’s free laundry with a dryer available. If you need extra space, there’s also a shared common area. The Wi-Fi is fast and reliable. Austin and Vanessa are amazing hosts — very responsive and always ready to help with any questions.

This is the perfect place for an extended stay! It’s conveniently located within walking distance of restaurants and the local market. The people here are incredibly friendly and always willing to help. I absolutely loved the room’s interior design—cozy and stylish. Highly recommend!
非常不错的一次住宿体验，房东非常友好有帮助，入住指南如果认真看的的话是非常容易就能找到具体的位置的。房间很漂亮，比想象中要大很多，我们住的是顶楼的小花园房间，早上在阳台吃早饭非常惬意。唯一的遗憾就是距离市区需要打车，并且没有电梯，所以行李太多的可能需要考虑一下了。但是总体来说非常棒，下次还会过来！

The beautiful A&V house has everything you need to feel at home. And more. The more is Austin and Vanessa’s hospitality and kindness. Although they don't live in the house, they were very fast in responding to all of my messages and requests. Highly recommended!

I had an amazing experience at Austin and Vanessa’s place! The room was not only comfortable and clean but also exceeded my expectations in every way. Also you have entire floor to yourself including a private kitchen which is a plus for me. Despite the affordable price, the quality of the stay was excellent. Austin was incredibly responsive, making the entire experience smooth from beginning to end. Their recommendations and suggestions for restaurants and tourist spots were spot-on! I would highly recommend staying here, and I hope to return soon!
I can’t believe how much of a deal this is, it’s beautiful and clean such a vibe!
awesome! thank you so much for everything austin and vanessa !! 👌 👏 👍 😍 💖
Nice place that is close to all the food spots in D1. Host was a pleasure to work with.
Good location, everything is new, checkin by myself is very easy. Will come back
Return customer, great as usual
Nice host and lovely place
Good place

I spent 3 night at Saigon Hideout during my time in Ho Chi Minh City, and it was wonderful. The hosts, Amelia and Vinh are always responsive and ready to help whenever needed. The stay was located in a good location, a few minutes away from key attractions like Independence Palace and Ben Thanh Market. There are many local food options and nice cafes in the area too!

Các chị dọn phòng dễ thương, xử ký vấn đề nhanh.
Toilet bé, máy chiêu bị mờ, còn lại mọi thứ hợp lý vs giá tiền

Everything about this place was perfect for our little get away. Our hosts were ON IT!!!! They were responsive and caring and absolutely so kind. It was pleasure to stay here and have all of the recommendations that were provided. They checked on us all the time and made sure everything was okay and that we were enjoying our stay. 10/10 recommend
What a stay! So grateful for Hannah, she was so helpful and amazing! Would definitely recommend staying here if you are in Ho chi minh, they make you feel right at home!  Will be back! (:

Отлично! В комнате было все необходимое. Рядом множество хороших заведений, но на самой улице достаточно спокойно и тихо. Мне было удобно находить места для работы и пешком добираться до главных улиц с развлечениями. Персонал сразу же посоветовал, чем стоит заняться в городе, где поесть и выпить кофе. Большое спасибо!

Really great choice, especially for a place at a good price point. The unit is easy to get to as it's on the first floor. What mattered most to me were the little things that ensure guests are cared for; bathroom is well stocked, indoor slippers, well functioning hair dryer, clear instructions and communication. Ideal place for a simple and fuss free trip.

Had a wonderful stay here. Hosts very responsive and gave us loads of detailed information & recommendations. Private & quiet place, with a great AC, perfect to come back to after a long day in the sun!

Bed is comfy, location is convenient, lots of cafes and eateries around. The "Pho Muslim" nearby is a good breakfast place, they serve cheap but tasty pho and coffee. Aircon is located at the top, in front of your face, so it can be an issue if you have allergic rhinitis like me. Toilet is small but it's okay. Lock sensitivity is quite a hassle. We stayed at Room 102, you need to go up. Was supposed to stay at the third floor, since it's bigger and host initially said it was available but not anymore a day before we check in. Hosts are responsive. Location can be pinned on Grab, so that's cheaper than availing the airport pickup service. Overall, we recommend the place, just manage expectations and be flexible. :)
Great hosts especially Hannah. Always responsive and helpful. Location is perfect. Highly recommended.

Host was really nice and took very good care of me. I feedback that there were mosquitoes at night and on the day itself they left a can of repellent on the doorstep. The place was also conveniently located yet not filled with tourists. The fridge is not that cold so don't expect to put anything inside. The water pressure was also not very strong but good enough. Overall a good stay, complains were handled swiftly and I felt very welcomed by the team.

Hannah & the team were amazing. When I had to go to hospital due to being very sick, I was unable to pack my belongings and check out in time and Hannah went above and beyond to help me, sending a sped up video of her packing all my things up for me while I was sick in the hospital on fluids. I felt so comfortable and cared for in that moment and there was no expectation of money, though I made sure to show my appreciation with a tip and when I had been resting and unable to go out, she helped me set up the projector and made sure I could use the netflix. The place was great and in future I’ll be back and staying in one of the bigger places when i’m back with my partner. The team were so responsive and the extra attention to detail when I was sick was such a relief for me. 10/5 stars for me. Looking forward to seeing Hannah when she comes to Australia! 💖

Our stay at this Airbnb was nothing short of exceptional ✨😊
From the moment we arrived, we felt completely at ease.
The space is absolutely beautiful – tucked away in a peaceful, quiet location that’s perfect for relaxing and recharging.
Everything was spotlessly clean, thoughtfully arranged, and clearly cared for with love and attention to detail ✨❤️
What truly made this experience stand out, though, were the hosts. They were so friendly, warm, and incredibly supportive throughout my stay. You can tell they genuinely care about their guests’ comfort and happiness. From thoughtful touches in the room to helpful recommendations and warm conversations, they made me feel like more than just a visitor – we felt truly welcomed.
Whether you’re staying for a short break or a longer escape, this place is a little sanctuary. It’s the kind of stay that leaves you feeling refreshed and grateful. We can’t recommend it enough, thank-you so so much again 😊✨🙌🏼

Les hôtes ont été très accueillant, la chambre était comme sur les photos.
On s'y sent vraiment confortable et alaise.
Je reprendrais volontiers ce logement si j'avais à revenir

Siagon hideout was PERFECT!! For district one the location was amazing. Really quiet but well within walking distance of loads of great places to eat, coffee shops & local boutiques. Walking distance into the main areas too. The room was small but it was still perfect for me and my partner. We had such a lovely time here and will 100% stay next time we’re in Ho Chi Minh. The host was lovely when greeting us and was such a nice person. She gave recommendations for the city and was super responsive to requests we had during the stay.  Would absolutely recommend this place
Excellent service, someone's always available. Would book again.
Puțin dificil să vizionezi ceva pe proiector deoarece este amplasat prea sus, dar în rest un apartament cozy, intim, recomand
Très bon séjour à Hô Chi Minh, emplacement parfait du logement, hôte réactif à toute heure ! Merci beaucoup pour le séjour !
great area close to the center. cant complain about anything for this price. perfect to get home and chill with netflix
Room real comfy, cozy and very adorable which shows that the owner really do care. Hosts are friendly and very helpful. Highly rec

Good communication and always answer quickly, room exactly as advertised, 15-20 min walk from the market. The self check-in works fine and makes it easier to organise your arrival. I really liked it
A lovely place to stay in Sai Gon, easy to find and check-in with auto-lock door. Sai Gon treat me well, and Sai Gon Hideout too. One more thing: the candy in the room is great, I love it!!!
Great stay! Quiet and cold. Slept great here.
